target: Slaying and striking down on earth Mahodara like to a portion of a mighty hill severed that son of the Sun appeared resplendent in his own effulgence and became irrepressible like to the Sun.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एवमुक्त्वा ततो बाहुं प्रगृह्य पुरुषादकः। अभ्यद्रवत संक्रुद्धो भीमसेनमरिंदमम्॥
target: Vaishampayana said : Having said this, the cannibal, outstretching his arms, ran in great wrath towards that chastiser of foes, Bhimasena.

source: दह्याम्यनिशमद्यापि चिन्तयानः पुनः पुनः। हीनां पार्थिवसिंहैस्तैः श्रीमद्भिः पृथिवीमिमाम्॥
target: Thinking that this Earth has been deprived of many foremost of kings, all of whom enjoyed great prosperity, I burn continually to this day.

source: चर्यमाणं तपस्तीव्र संतापयति राक्षसान्। देवदानवयक्षेभ्यो गृहीतश्च वरस्त्वया॥
target: The fierce austerities of vow-observing saints, performed at particular sacred spots, try the Rākş asas sore.

source: जनमेजय उवाच एवं बहुविधं धर्मं प्रतिबुद्धैर्निषेवितम्। न कुर्वन्ति कथं विप्रा अन्ये नानाव्रते स्थिताः॥
target: I see that those twice-born ones whose souls have been awakened, pactise various kinds of duties. Why it is that other Brahmanas do not practise those duties but observe other kinds of vows and rites?

source: एवमुक्त्वा महातेजा गौतमो दुष्टचारिणीम्। इममाश्रममुत्सृज्य सिद्धचारणसेविते। हिमवच्छिखरे रम्ये तपस्तेपे महातपाः॥
target: Having said this the highly energetic Gautama of rigid austerities, forsaking this hermitage, began to carry on penances on the romantic summit of the Himavat, inhabited by Siddhas and Caranas.

source: ततोऽस्मै प्रासृजद् धोरमैषीकमपराजितः॥ अस्त्रमप्रतिसंधेयं तदद्भुतमिवाभवत्।
target: Then the one, who had never sustained a defeat, shot terrible weapons in the shape of blades of grass, which were incapable of being withstood and a strange effect they had.

source: चतुर्दश सहस्राणि रक्षसां भीमकर्मणाम्। निहतानि जनस्थाने शरैरग्निशिखोपमैः॥ खरश्च निहतः संख्ये दूषणः स्त्रिशिरास्तथा। शरैरादित्यसंकाशैः पर्याप्तं तन्निदर्शनम् ॥
target: And fourteen thousand Rākşasas of terrible deeds were slain by him in janasthāna with shafts resembling the flame of fire. Khara Düş aņa as well as Tricira were slain by him in conflict with arrows resembling the Sun-this was a sufficient proof (of his power).

source: चतुर्भिः सारथिं चास्य चतुर्भिश्चतुरो हयान्। तमाचार्यसिभिर्बाणैर्बाह्वोरुरसि चार्पयत्॥
target: He wounded Drona's charioteer with four and his four steeds with another four arrows. The preceptor then pierced the right arm of his adversary with sixteen arrows.

source: अभ्यवर्तन्त संक्रुद्धाः समरे शाल्वकेकयान्। सात्यकिश्शेकितानश्च सौभद्रश्च महारथः॥
target: Satyaki, Chekitana, and the of Subhadra endued with great prowess, all invincible in battle, rushed against the Shalyas and the Kaikeyas.

source: क्व नु त्वं कितवच्छित्त्वा वस्त्रार्धं प्रस्थितो मम। उत्सृज्य विपिने सुप्तामनुरक्तां प्रियां प्रिय॥
target: 'O gambler, O beloved one, did you tear off a half of my cloth and flee away forsaking your dear and devoted wife sleeping in the forest?

source: बलं कस्माद् वर्धयित्वा परस्य निजान् कस्मात् कर्शयित्वा सहायान्। निरुष्य कस्माद् वर्षपूगान् वनेषु युयुत्ससे पाण्डव हीनकालम्॥
target: Why after having increased the strength of your enemy and after weakening your own friends and after having lived in exile in the forest for a series of years, are you now desirous of fighting, O son of Pandu, after the proper time.

source: संविच्च धार्तराष्ट्राणं सर्वेषामेव केशव। शमे प्रयतमानस्य तव सौभ्रात्रकाक्षिणः॥
target: Actuated by brotherly feelings as you are attempting to establish peace between the two parties and are seeking the good of the sons of Dhritarashtra, O Keshava.

source: चारुदंष्ट्रो नरव्याघ्रो विचित्रकवचध्वजः। मृगं व्याघ्र इवाजिघ्रंस्तव सैन्यमभीषयत्॥
target: Then like a huntsman slaying dcer, that foremost of men, viz., Satyaki, graced with beautiful teeth, cased in exceilent armour and owning a beautiful standard, slew the Kaurava troops and struck terror into their hearts.

source: तुष्टेर्न किञ्चित् परमं सा सम्यक् प्रतितिष्ठति। विनीतक्रोधहर्षस्य सततं सिद्धिरुत्तमा॥
target: There is nothing superior to contentment. To the Yogin who has controlled anger and joy, contentment is the greatest success.

source: तस्माद् रक्षत संग्रामे द्रोणमेव महारथम्॥ इत्युक्त्वा भरतश्रेष्ठ पुत्रो दुर्योधनस्तव।
target: Therefore protect (carefully) the mighty car-warrior Drona in battle." Thus addressing (his soldiers), your son Duryodhana, 0 foremost of the descendants of Bharata.

source: ध्वजं चैवास्य कौन्तेयः शरैरभ्यहनन् भृशम्। शीघ्रकृद् रथवाहांश्च तथोभौ पार्ष्णिसारथी॥
target: The son of Kunti, with arrows, struck his flag-staff, his two horses and her driver that protected his flanks.

source: नित्यमेतान् नमस्यामि कृष्ण लोककरानृषीन्। लोकज्येष्ठान् कुलज्येष्ठांस्तमोघ्नॉल्लोकभास्करान्॥
target: I always bow to those Rishis. O Krishna, who are the creators of the universe, who are the elders of the universe, who are the eldest members of the race or the family, who are dispellers of the darkness of ignorance, and who are the best of all persons in the universe.

source: येषां चाराश्च कोशश्च लयश्च जयतां वर। अस्वाधीना नरेन्द्राणां प्राकृतैस्ते जनैः समाः॥
target: O you best of conquerors, those kings whose spies, exchequer and morality are not free, are like the common head.

source: अथाब्रवीद्वानरेन्द्रः सुग्रीवः पुत्रमङ्गदम्। नानिमित्तमिदं मन्ये भवितव्यं भयेन तु।४।।
target: Thereat, the lord of monkeys, Sugrīva, spoke to his son, Angada "I do not deem it without cause. This may have come to pass through sheer fear.

source: बाढमित्येव तां वाणी प्रत्यगृह्णामहं ततः। आस्यप्रमाणादधिकं तस्याः कायमपूरयम्॥
target: Saying, Well,' I accepted her speech, increasing my body at will more than the capacity or her mouth;

source: चित्रसेन उवाच विदितोऽयमभिप्रायस्तत्रस्थेन दुरात्मनः। दुर्योधनस्य पापस्य कर्णस्य च धनंजय॥
target: Chitrasena said : O Dhananjaya, I knew long before the (real) purpose of the wicked Duryodhana and the wretched Karna in coming here.

source: एवमुक्तस्तु पार्थेन शिखण्डी भरतर्षभ। अभ्यद्रवत गाङ्गेयं श्रुत्वा पार्थस्य भाषितम्॥
target: Thus spoken to by Partha, and having listened to the former's worlds, Shikhandin, O foremost of the Bharatas, rushed against the son of Ganga.

source: दिक्षु प्रज्वलितास्याश्च व्याहरन्ति मृगद्विजाः। अत्याहितं दर्शयन्तो वेदयन्ति महद् भयम्॥
target: Animals and birds, on all sides, utter harsh cries with their mouths burning like fire. This forebode fearful evils.

source: सर्वान्समागतान्दृष्ट्वा सीता काषायवासिनी। अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यमधोदृष्टिरवाङ्मुखी॥
target: There upon beholding all people assembled there, Janaka's daughter, wearing a red cloth, with her face and looks downwards and folded palms said.

source: हिरण्यनाभ शैलेन्द्र परितुष्टोऽस्मि ते भृशम्। अभयं ते प्रयच्छामि गच्छ सौम्य यथासुखम्॥
target: Greatly delighted am I, O lord of mountains, O you having golden peaks. 'No fear' I do declare to you. Proceedest you therefore, at your ease, O gently one!

source: स राजमार्गं वपुषा प्रकाशयन् सहस्ररश्मिर्धरणीमिवांशुभिः। जगाम तत्राञ्जलिमालया वृतः शतक्रतुर्गेहमिव स्वयंभुवः॥
target: Illuming the highway with the splendour of his person, like the thousand-rayed (Sun) discovering the earth with his rays, (Kumbhakarna) went on, engirt around by joined hands resembling wreaths, like Śatakratu* going to the abode of the Self-sprung. *Lit. him of an hundred sacrifices-an appellation of Indra.

source: कर्णस्य सैन्यं सुमहदभिहत्य शितैः शरैः॥ प्राविशद् भारती सेनामर्पयन्तां च सात्यकिः।
target: Then Satyaki afflicting Karna's mighty host with his sharp arrows, plunged into che infinite host of the Bharatas.

source: कृतमेव तु कल्याणं सर्वं मम भवेद् ध्रुवम्। यदि स्यान्मम वार्ष्णेयी महिषीयं स्वसा तव॥
target: If your this sister, this lady of the Vrishni race, become my wife, then certainly do I win prosperity in everything.

source: तत्र धर्मार्थकामा हि मोक्षः पश्चाच्च कीर्तितः। मर्यादा विविधाश्चैव दिवि भूमौ च संस्थिताः॥
target: In that work the authors discoursed on Religion and Profit and Pleasure, and subsequently on Liberation also. The various restrictions and limitations were also laid down in it for the Earth as also for Heaven.

source: एवमुक्तः सुमन्त्रेण राजवेश्मनि लक्ष्मणः। प्रविश्य सीतामासाद्य व्याजहार नरर्षभः॥
target: Hearing the words of Sumantra, Laksmana, the foremost of men, approached Sītā in the inner apartment and said.

source: उद्यतायुधनिस्त्रिंशो रथे सुसमलंकृते। कालाश्वयुक्ते महति स्थितः कालान्तकोपमः॥
target: With upraised weapons and scimitars, he, resembling the Destroyer himself, was mounted on a mighty car yoked with black steeds, and ornamented (on all sides).

source: अनुबन्धश्च पापोऽत्र शेषश्चाप्यवशिष्यते। शेषों हि बलमासाद्य न शेषमनुशेषयेत्॥
target: In the end the result is that a surviver gives a lot of troubles and in the end collecting an army puts an end to what remains.

source: सम्पूर्णकोशाः किल मे मातरः पितस्तथा। भयात् सर्वेषु लोकेषु नाधिजग्मुः परायणम्॥
target: My mother and the other women of our race, each in a state of advanced pregnancy and my father also, though exceedingly afflic did not get a protector in all the world.

source: ग्रहनक्षत्रताराणां प्रमाणं च युगैः सह। ऋचो यजूंषि सामानि वेदाध्यात्म तथैव च॥
target: Planets, stars and constellations and the length of the duration of the four Yugas and it further more contains Rik, Saman, Yajur Vedas, the Adhyatma.

source: जगत्यनित्ये सततं प्रधावति प्रचिन्तयनस्थिरमद्य लक्षये। भवत्सु तिष्ठत्स्विह पातितो मृधे गिरिप्रकाशः कुरुपुङ्गवः कथम्॥
target: This transient words is ever flying (towards death); considering this I always regard everything as unsteady. When you were all present here, how could that foremost of the Kurus (Bhishma), who resembled a mountain in steadiness, be slain in battle?

source: एवं परम्पराप्राप्तमिमं राजर्षयो विदुः। स कालेनेह महता योगो नष्टः परंतप॥
target: Coming down thus, from generation to generation, it became know to the royal sages. But, O terror of foes, this yoga was lost to the worlds by long lapse of time.

source: अनेन व्यवसायेन सहास्माभिर्युधिष्ठिर। अक्षानुप्त्वा पुन तमेहि दीव्यस्व भारत॥
target: O Yudhishthira, O descendant of Bharata, with such stake, play with us again by throwing the dice.

source: सांख्ययोगौ तु यावुक्तौ मुनिभिर्मोक्षदर्शिभिः। संन्यास एव वेदान्ते वर्तते जपनं प्रति॥
target: Sages who knows the means of attaining to Liberation have spoken of two methods, viz., the Vedanta and the Yoga. Amongst these, in the Vedanta System Renunciation has been described as the result of silent recitation. The declarations of the Vedas hold that absent of rites, yields tranquillity, and secures Brahma.

source: यातेषु कुरुष क्षत्ता दाशार्हमपराजितम्। अभ्यर्चयामास तदा सर्वकामैः प्रयत्नवान्॥
target: The Kurus having departed, the Khattva Vidura paid due honours to the scion of the Dasharha race who had never met with a defeat and then made special endeavours to meet all his wishes.

source: तस्मात् सत्यं ब्रुवन् साक्षी धर्मार्थाभ्यां न हीयते। कश्यपस्य वचः श्रुत्वा प्रह्लादः पुत्रमब्रवीत्॥
target: Therefore a witness should always tell the truth. A witness should always tell the truth never loses his religious merits and earthly possessions.

source: हन्त लक्ष्मण पश्येह सुमित्रा सुप्रजास्त्वया। भीमस्तनितगम्भीरं तुमुलः श्रूयते स्वनः॥ गजयूथानि वारण्ये महिषा वा महावने। वित्रासिता मृगाः सिंहै: सहसा प्रदुता दिशः।।।।। राजा वा राजपुत्रो वा मृगयामटते वने। अन्यद्वा श्वापदं किंचित् सौमित्रे ज्ञातुमर्हसि॥
target: Ha! Lakşmaņa, in whom Şumitrā has been blest with a worthy son, hark! A tremendous and dreadful uproar resembling the rumbling of clouds is being heard; and in the woods and mighty forest, deer and buffaloes and herds of elephants being accompanied by lions are suddenly scampering away in all directions. O Sumitrā's son, it behoves you to learn whether any king or prince is hunting in the forest, or any ferocious beast is (ravaging the woods).

source: यावच्च मार्दवेनैतान् राजन्नुपचरिष्यसि। तावदेते हरिष्यन्ति तव राज्यमरिंदम॥
target: So long as you treat these, O king, with kindness, they will deprive you of your kingdom, O you chastiser of your foes.

source: नारायणेन कौरव्य तेजसाऽऽप्यायितस्तदा। स गतो नृपतिः क्षिप्रं पुत्रैस्तैः सर्वतो दिशम्॥ अर्णवं खानयामास कुवलाश्वो महीपतिः।
target: O son of the Kuru race, thereupon that ruler of men, supplied with the energy of Narayana went speedily in all directions with all of his sons. Kuvalashva, excavated that sea of sands.

source: नाभ्यां कण्ठे च शीर्षे च हृदि वक्षसि पार्श्वयोः। दर्शने श्रवणे चापि घ्राणे चामितविक्रम॥ स्थानेष्वेतेषु यो योगी महाव्रतसमाहितः। आत्मना सूक्ष्ममात्मानं युङ्क्ते सम्यग्विशाम्पते।॥ स शीघ्रमचलप्रख्यं कर्म दग्ध्वा शुभाशुभम्। उत्तमं योगमास्थाय यदीच्छति विमुच्यते॥
target: That Yogin who, carefully practises high vows, properly unites, O king, his sentiency with the self Soul in the navel, the throat, the head, the heart, the chest, the sides, the eye, the ear, and the nose, burns all his mountain-like acts good and bad, and having recourse to excellent Yoga acquires Liberation.

source: ते तं भुक्त्वा स्वर्गलोकं विशालं क्षीणे पुण्ये मर्त्यलोकं विशन्ति। एवं त्रयीधर्ममनुप्रपन्ना गतागतं कामकामा लभन्ते॥
target: And having enjoyed the pleasures of the extensive heaven, when their merit is exhausted, they again enter into the mortal world. Those that wish for the objects of desire, and act according to the doctrines of these Vedas, obtain going and coming (births and deaths).

source: यक्ष उवाच किं नु हित्वा प्रियो भवति किं नु हित्वा न शोचति। । किं नु हित्वार्थवान् भवति किं नु हित्वा सुखी भवेत्॥
target: The Yaksha asked What is it, the renunciation of which makes one dear? What is that which if given up, does not lead to misery? What is that renouncing which one become wealthy? And what is it the renunciation of which makes one happy?

source: अभ्यासेऽप्यसमर्थोऽसि मत्कर्मपरमो भव। मदर्थमपि कर्माणि कुर्वन् सिद्धिमवाप्स्यसि॥
target: If you are not able even to have continued application, let your actions be performed for Me with your highest aim. For, by performing acts for My sake, you will attain to perfection.

source: प्रहरन् सर्वशत्रुभ्यः पाण्डवानां महारथः। अदृश्यत महेष्वासः सवज्र इव वासवः॥
target: That mighty car-warrior of the Pandava host smiting all his opponents, appeared like Vasava the wielder of the thunder bolt.

source: सर्वास्ता विहृता दृष्ट्वा किंनरीषिसत्तमः। उवाच रूपसंपन्नां तां त्रियं प्रहसन्निव ॥
target: Beholding the Kinnarīs repairing to a distance, Buddha the foremost of ascetics, smiling said, to the beautiful Ila:

source: तस्य तच्छासनं श्रुत्वा मन्त्रिणोऽभ्यागमन् द्रुतम्। ततः स मन्त्रयामास राक्षसैः सचिवैः सह ॥
target: Hearing his mandate, those Raksasas, his counsellors, swiftly presented themselves. And then he consulted with his Rākşasa counsellors.

source: तं प्रयान्तमभिद्रुत्य राधेयः कङ्कपत्रिभिः। अभ्यवर्षन्महाराज मेघो वृष्ट्येव पर्वतम्॥
target: Then as he was proceeding, the son of Radha assailing him began to shower shafts furnished with wings of Kanka-feather on him, like clouds showering rain on the mountain.

source: एते नदन्ति संहृष्टाः पाण्डवा जितकाशिनः। शक्रोपमाश्च बहवः पञ्चालानां स्थव्रजाः॥
target: These Pandavas, filled with ecstasy and desirous of victory and these numerous carwarriors of the Panchalas equal to Shakra in prowess, are (all) roaring.

source: कैरातं वेषमास्थाय योधयामास फाल्गुनम्। जिज्ञासुः सर्वदेवेशः कपर्दी भगवान् स्वयम्॥
target: The exalted lord of all the gods, Kapardin (Shiva) himself, having assumed the disguise of a Kirata, fought with Falguni (Arjuna) to test his prowess.

source: तौ तमाश्रममासाद्य द्रुमैबहुभिरावृतम्। सुरम्यमभिवीक्षन्तौ शबरीमभ्युपेयतुः॥
target: Getting at that charming hermitage covered on all sides with trees and casting their looks around they beheld that female mendicant-Savari.

source: ततः स हरिशार्दूलो लङ्कया ताडितो भृशम्। ननाद सुमहानादं वीर्यवान् मारुतात्मजः॥
target: That tiger-like monkey, the energetic offspring of the wind-god, on being lustily struck by Larkā, emitted a tremendous roars.

source: तत्तिष्ठद्वसुधां रक्षः शूलं जग्राह पाणिना। त्रासनं सर्वभूतानां युगान्ताग्निसमप्रभम्॥ दुरवापं महच्छूलं रुद्रदत्तं भयंकरम्। जाज्वल्यमानमाकाशे संहारास्त्रमिवापरम्॥
target: He then again rose up with a dart in his hand creating terror to all creatures and resembling the Fire of Dissolution in resplendence. It was a terribly huge dart conferred on him by Śiva, shining in the sky in its native brilliance and like to another weapon of destruction.* *This refers to the weapon used by Śiva for destruction-for Siva, according to the Hindu Mythology is the God of destruction.

source: अश्वत्थामेति हि गजः ख्यातो नाम्ना हतोऽभवत्। कृत्वा मनसि तं भीमो मिथ्या व्याहृतवांस्तदा॥
target: The elephant known by the name of Ashvatthaman having been slain, Bhima spoke of Ashvatthainan's death. Knowing the true fact in his mind, Bhima then spoke what was false.

source: उद्धृतेन च वस्त्रेण तस्याः पीतेन रावणः। अधिकं परिबभ्राज गिरिर्दीप्त इवाग्निना॥
target: And on her yellow cloth streaming up, Rāvaņa looked surpassingly graceful like a hill aflame with fire.

source: वैदेहो जनको राजा महर्षि वेदवित्तमम्। पर्यपृच्छत् पञ्चशिखं छिन्नधर्मार्थसंशयम्॥
target: Once on a time, Janaka, the king of Videhas, questioned the great Rishi Panchashikha, who was the foremost of all persons conversant with the Vedas and who had all his doubts removed about the object and meaning of all duties.

source: अपूपान् सक्तुपिण्डांश्चं प्राश्नन्तो मथितान्वितान्। पथि सुप्रबला भूत्वा कदा सम्पततोऽध्वगान्॥ चेलापहारं कुर्वाणस्ताडयिष्याम भूयसः।
target: When shall I, surrounded by my countrymen, muster strong on the high roads, fall upon the passers by, carry away their robes and attires and beat them repeatedly?

source: सहस्रस्तम्भां हेमवैदूर्यचित्रां शतद्वारां तोरणस्फाटिकाख्याम्। सभामग्यां क्रोशमात्रायतां मे तद्विस्तारामाशु कुर्वन्तु युक्ताः॥
target: “Build with all care as soon as possible an Assembly-hall of the most beautiful description to be called” crystal-gate palace” with one thousand pillars and one thousand gates, decked with gold and Vaidurya gems and extending two miles in length and two miles in breadth".

source: तान्प्रेक्षमाणः सहसा निकृत्तान्निकृत्तभोगानिव पन्नगेन्द्रान्। लङ्केश्वरः क्रोधवशं जगाम ससर्ज चान्यानिशितान्पृषत्कान्॥
target: They suddenly severed like powerful serpents cut.off, Lanka's lord came under the away of passion, and discharged other whetted arrows.

source: महाभूतानि पञ्चैव सर्वभूतेषु भूतकृत्। अकरोत् तात वैषम्यं यस्मिन् यदनुपश्यति॥
target: These five elements are in all existent things. The Creator of all things, however, has made an unequal distribution of those elements for serving different ends.

source: ततः प्रत्युपयातेषु पार्थिवेषु ततस्ततः॥ तत्रागमद् वासुदेवो वनमाली हलायुधः। कृतवर्मा च हार्दिक्यो युयुधानश्च सात्यकिः॥ अनाधृष्टिस्तथाक्रूरः साम्बो निश एव च। अभिमन्युमुपादाय सह मात्रा परंतपाः॥ इन्द्रसेनादयश्चैव रथैस्तैः सुसमाहितैः। आययुः सहिताः सर्वे परिसंवत्सरोषिताः॥ दशनागसहस्राणि हयानां द्विगुणं तथा। रथानामयुतं पूर्णं नियुतं च पदातिनाम्॥ वृष्ण्यन्धकाश्च बहवो भोजाश्च परमौजसः। अन्वयुर्वृष्णिशार्दूलं वासुदेवं महाद्युतिम्॥
target: There came Vasudeva, decked with garlands, Halayudha, Kritavarman, Hridika, Yuyudhana, the son of Satyaki, Anadhrishti, Akrura, Samba, Nishath-all these repressors of foes came there with Abhimanyu and his mother. Indrasena and others came with their cars-having lived there for one whole year. There came also ten thousand elephants and ten millions of horses, ten billions of cars and one Nikharva of infantry and many other highly energetic Vrishni, Andhaka and Bhoja heroes-following the highly effulgent Vasudeva-the foremost of Vrishnis.

source: सा ददर्श विमानाग्रे रावणं दीप्ततेजसम्। उपोपविष्टं सचिवैर्मरुद्भिरिव वासवम्॥ आसीनं सूर्यसंकाशे काञ्चने परमासने। रुक्मवेदिगतं प्राज्यं ज्वलन्तमिव पावकम्॥
target: And she saw the effulgent Rāvaņa in front of his palace, surrounded by his counsellors, like Vāsava surrounded by the Maruts; scated on a supreme golden seat resembling the sun, and like to a flaming fire on a golden dais kept alive by sacrificial offerings.

source: देवद्रव्यविनाशेन ब्रह्मस्वहरणेन च। कुलान्यकुलतां यान्ति ब्राह्मणातिक्रमेण च॥
target: By destruction of the wealth of the celestials, stealing the wealth of Brahmana and by the transgression of conduct of them, persons belonging to the high family comes into a low category.

source: उपयुज्याशु कर्मेदं साधयेत्सितमात्मनः। महाभ्रघनसंकाशं तं भुक्त्वामृतमानय। महागिरिसमप्रख्यं घोररूपं च हस्तिनम्॥
target: (After eating them), accomplish the task you desire to perform. Eating the fearful elephant which looks like a huge mountain and a huge mass of clouds, go and bring the Aimbrosia.

source: ते पतन्ति जले नित्यं सूर्यस्योदयनं प्रति। अभितप्ताः स्म सूर्येण लम्बन्ते स्म पुनः पुनः।॥
target: Day after day at sunrise, these Rākşasas heated (by solar rays) and struck dead by Brahmā energy,* again and again (hang on the crags). *The commentator explains: energy darted from the three orders.

source: अभिषेक्ष्यन्ति काकुत्स्थमयोध्यायां द्विजातयः। अपि मे देवताः कुर्युरिमं सत्यं मनोरथम्॥
target: The twice-born ones will sprinkle Kākutstha in Ayodhyā. May the deities realize this desire of mine!

source: धर्मवादी शठो भर्ता श्लक्ष्णवादी च दारुणः। शुद्धभावेन जानीषे तेनैवमतिसंधिता॥
target: Your maintainer speaks most morally; but is crafty for all that: he speaks blandly, but has a crooked heart. Him you take as of blessed condition, and therefore are gulled.

source: अवेक्षमाणस्तां देवी देवतामिव नन्दने। ततो बहुविधां चिन्तां चिन्तयामास वानरः॥
target: And beholding the worshipful damsel, living in the forest of Asoka, like to a celestial damsel in the garden of Nandana, the monkey-entered in a maze of anxious thoughts.

source: एवमुक्तः स्मयन्निन्द्रमभिवीक्ष्य स भार्गवः। जग्राह विधिवत् सोममश्विभ्यामुत्तमं ग्रहम्॥
target: Having been thus addressed, the son of Bhrigu smilingly looked at Indra and he then took up in due form some excellent Soma juice to offer it to the Ashvins.

source: एवमुक्तः स रामेण न्यायेनोपजगाम हा दुर्योधनमुपागम्य कृतोस्त्रोऽस्मीति चाब्रवीत्॥
target: Thus addressed by Rama, Karna came away, having duly taken his permission. Arriving then before Duryodhana, he informed him, saying-I have learnt all weapons.

source: बिभेद राजन् वलोण भुवि तन्निपपात ह। पतता तु तदा केशी तेन शृङ्गेण ताडितः॥
target: O king, cut it down with his thunderbolt and it fell on the ground. Keshin himself was wounded by that falling mass of rocks.

source: ततः सर्वे नारदं विप्रसंघाः सम्पूजयामासुरतीव राजन्। राज्ञः प्रीत्या धृतराष्ट्रस्य ते वै पुनः पुनः सम्प्रहृष्टास्तदानीम्॥
target: The assembly of Brahmanas there present became filled with great joy, and desirous of pleasing king Dhritarashtra, o monarch, themselves worshipped Narada with great respect.

source: भीमसेनं रणे क्रुद्धो द्रोणपुत्रो न्यवारयत्॥
target: The son of Drona opposed in that battle the angry Bhimasena.

source: भैक्ष्यचर्या न विहिता न च विट्शूद्रजीविका। क्षत्रियस्य विशेषेणधर्मस्तु बलमौरसम्॥
target: It is not proper for you to lead a life of mendicancy or the life of Shudra. Prowess and energy constitute the special virtue of the Kshatriya.

source: एतत् स्वार्थे च कौन्तेय धनं धनवतां वर। धाता ददाति मर्येभ्यो यज्ञार्थमिति विद्धि तत्॥
target: The Creator gives wealth to mortals for the sake of Sacrifices. Know this, O Son of Kunti, foremost of all wealthy persons.

source: प्रज्ञाविज्ञानयुक्तेन बुद्धिसंज्ञाप्रदायिना। वचनं श्राविता नूनं मानुषाः संनिवर्तत। शोको द्विगुणतां याति दृष्ट्वा स्मृत्वा च चेष्टितम्॥
target: Addressed thus by the vulture gifted with wisdom and knowledge and capable of giving intelligence and awakening the understanding, those men were about to go away from the crematorium. Grief becomes two-fold two-fold on seeing its object and on remembering the acts of that object (in life).

source: दिवि सूर्यस्तथा सप्त दहन्ति शिखिनोऽर्चिषः। सर्वमेतत् तदार्चिभिः पूर्ण जाज्वल्यते जगत्॥
target: When the time for universal dissolution comes twelve Suns, and Agni with his seven flames, begin to burn. Wrapt by those flames, the entire universe begins to blaze forth in a huge fire.

source: तडागं सुकृतं यस्य वसन्ते तु महाश्रयम्। अतिरात्रस्य यज्ञस्य फलं स समुपाश्नुते॥
target: That man in whose wellmade tank water lies in the season of spring, acquires the merit of the Atiratra sacrifice.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एवमुक्तास्ततः सर्वे भ्रातरो विपुलौजसः। वार्ष्णेयः पाण्डवेयौ च प्रतस्थुर्मागधं प्रति॥
target: Vaishampayana said Having been thus addressed (by Yudhishthira) all the three brothers, the two Pandavas and the Varshneya (Krishna), all possessing great prowess, started for the kingdom of Magadha.

source: स तत् कबन्धः प्रतिपद्य रूपं वृतः श्रिया भास्वरसर्वदेहः। निदर्शयन् राममवेक्ष्य स्वस्थः सख्यं कुरुष्वेति तदाभ्युवाच ॥
target: Regaining his pristine beauty and shining in grace and effulgence that Kabandha, who was on the sky, fixing his looks upon Rāma, and pointing out to him his way, said Do you make friends with (Sugrīva).

source: राघवो रावणं तूर्णं रावणो राघवं तथा। अन्योन्यं विविधैस्तीक्ष्णैः शरवर्ववर्षतुः॥
target: With various sharpened arrows Rāghava assailed Rävaņa, and he again assailed Rāma in return.

source: क्षत्ता यदब्रवीद् वाक्यं जनमध्येऽब्रुवन्निव। त्वया च स तथेत्युक्तो जानीमो न च तद् वयम्॥
target: "What Khattwa (Vidura) said to you in the midst of many people, so indistinctly as if he said nothing and what you said similarly (in reply) is not understood by us.

source: एवं संनोद्य सर्वाणि स्वान्यनीकानि पार्षतः। भीमसेनस्य जग्राह पाणिं सत्पुरुषैर्वृतः ॥
target: Thus urging all his troops, the Prishata prince surrounded by many great warriors went to protect one of the wings of Bhima's troops.

source: ततः स राक्षसैर्वाचा प्रतिषिद्धः प्रतापवान्। मा मैवमिति सक्रोधैर्भर्त्सयद्भिः समन्ततः॥
target: Thereupon that powerful hero was forbidden by the Rakshasas, saying “Don't do it” and from all sides they began to abuse him in anger.

source: अशोकवनिकाभ्याशे तापसाश्रमसंनिभे। भर्तृस्मरणतन्वङ्गी तापसीवेषधारिणी॥
target: Situate within the Ashoka garden, resembling an asylum of ascetics. (And there) with her body reduced to a skeleton thinking of her husband and wearing the garb of ascetics.

source: प्रतिबुद्धः स वार्ष्णेयो ददर्शाग्रे किरीटिनम्। स तयोः स्वागतं कृत्वा यथावत् प्रतिपूज्य तौ॥
target: The son of Vrishni, having awakened, first saw the one wearing a crown and welcomed them and did them due honours.

source: बाणपातान्तरे रामं पातितं पुरुषर्षभम्। स तत्र लक्ष्मणो दृष्ट्वा निराशो जीवितेऽभवत्॥
target: Seeing Rāma, the foremost of men-down within arrow-range, Laksmana despaired of his life.

source: वारिवेगेन महता भिन्नः सेतुरिव क्षरन्। दुर्बन्धनमिदं मन्ये राज्यच्छिद्रमसंवृतम्॥
target: I do consider this kingdom infested with thieves, difficult to govern, as it is difficult to reconstruct a bridge broken down by a powerful current of water.

source: यं लेभे वासवाद् राजा वसुस्तस्माद् बृहद्रथः। बृहद्रथात् क्रमेणैव प्राप्तो बार्हद्रथं नृप॥
target: It (the car) was obtained by the king Vasu from Vasava (Indra), From Vasu it was obtained by Brihadratha; from Brihadratha it was in due course obtained by the king (Jarasandha), the son of Brihadratha.

source: सोऽपश्यत् सरितं पूर्णां प्रावृटकाले नवाम्भसा। वृक्षान् बहुविधान् पार्थ हरन्ती तीरजान् बहून्॥
target: O Partha, (in course of his wandering), he saw a river swollen with the waters of the rainy season, it was sweeping away many trees and plants that grew on its banks.

source: उवाच स महातेजा ब्रह्माणं परमेष्ठिनम्। कृतं मयेदं भगवान्काव्यं परमपूजितम्॥
target: Then addressing Brahma, the greatly glorious Vyasa thus said: "O Divine Brahma, a poem, which is greatly respected, had been composed by me."

source: ततो रामः परिष्वज्य सुग्रीवं प्रियदर्शनम्। प्रत्युवाच महाप्राज्ञो लक्ष्मणानुगतं वचः॥
target: Thereupon embracing Sugrīva, of a pleasant countenance and like to Lakşmaņa, the highly wise Rāma spoke to him, saying,

source: तस्मिन्नार्जवसम्पन्ने देवि देवोपमे कथम्। पापमाशंससे रामे महर्षिसमतेजसि॥
target: How, O respected one, can you ask for this that will bring you sin, touching Rāma endowed with candour, and energetic like to a Maharsi, and resembling a celestial?

source: स्वयोनि भजते सर्वो विशस्वापोऽविशङ्कितः। अहं त्वां वर्धयिष्यामि ब्राझैर्मन्त्रैः सनातनैः॥
target: Everything accepts that which comes from it, enter the waters without any fear. I shall make you strong by reciting eternal hymns relating to Brahma.

source: परिक्रम्य कुरुक्षेत्रं कर्णेन सह कौरवः। शिबिरं मापयामास समे देशे जनाधिप।॥
target: The of Kuru having traversed Kurukshetra in company with Karna placed his camps in a plain, O ruler of men,

source: तं विरूपाक्षयूपक्षौ दृष्ट्वा निपतितं भुवि। तौ जातरोषौ दुर्धर्षावुत्पेततुररिन्दमौ॥
target: Seeing him down on the earth, those irrepressible subduers of enemies, Virūpaksa and Yupaksa, waxing wroth, sprang up.

source: ततः शरशतेनैव युयुधानो महारथः। अविध्यद् ब्राह्मणं संख्ये दृष्टरूपो विशाम्पते॥
target: Then, O ruler of men, with a cheerful appearance, the mighty car-warrior Yuyudhana, pierced in that that battle that Brahmana with a set of hundred arrows.

source: धनुश्च्युताः शरास्तस्य शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः। आकाशे प्रत्यदृश्यन्त शलभानामिवायतीः॥
target: Arrows shot from his bow then, in hundreds and thousands, were seen to range through the welkin, like flights of locusts.

source: सैनापत्येन तं देवाः पूजयित्वा गुहालयम्। शशंसुर्विप्रकारं तं तस्मै तारककारितम्॥
target: The gods in time invested Agni's son born a solitary forest with the command of their arıy. And they also informed him of the oppressions made upon them by the Asura Taraka.

source: भैमसेनिर्महाराज हैडिम्बो राक्षसेश्वरः। मतो मे बहुमायावी रथयूथपयूथपः॥
target: That lord of the Rakshasas, the son of Bhimasena, born of Hidimba, is endued with great powers of illusion and in my opinion is a commander of leaders of groups of chariots.

source: इदं च तीव्र मम शोकवेगं रक्षोभिरेभिः परिभर्त्सनं च। ब्रूयास्तु रामस्य गतः समीपं शिवश्च तेऽध्वास्तु हरिप्रवीर॥
target: Do you narrate to Rāma this my terrible sorrow and the affliction by the she-demons. May good betide you, on your way, O foremost of the monkeys.'

source: क्व नु तेषाममर्षश्च वीर्य तेजश्च वर्तते। न परीप्सन्ति ये भार्यां वध्यमानां दुरात्मना॥
target: Ah, where is their wrath, the prowess and the energy when they cannot protect their wife from being thus insulted by a wretch.

source: सत्त्वयुक्ता हि पुरुषास्त्वद्विधाः पुरुषर्षभ। अविमृश्य न रोषश्य सहसा यान्ति वश्यताम् ॥
target: O chief of men, persons endowed with the quality of goodness, like to you, do not suffer themselves to come under the sway of passion, without (at first) heedfully revolving matters.

source: आत्मा ह्येको हि धर्मार्थो कामं चैव निषेवते। एतैश्च विप्रयोगोऽपि दुःखं परमनन्तकम्॥
target: The soul is one, but it has to serve Dharma, Artha and Kama. By simultaneous pursuit of these, great misery is occasioned.

source: शक्यं पुनररण्येषु सुखमेकेन जीवितुम्। अबिभ्रता पुत्रपौत्रान् देवर्षीनतिथीन् पितॄन्।॥
target: That man only is capable of leading a solitary life of happiness in the forest who cannot support sons and grandsons and the deities and Rishis and guests and Pitris.

source: पुत्रौ दशरथस्येमौ भ्रातरौ रामलक्ष्मणौ॥ उत्तमौ रूपसंपन्नौ सीतायाः पदमागतौ। एतौ सागरमासाद्य संनिविष्टौ महाद्युते॥ बलं चाकाशमावृत्य सर्वतो दशयोजनम्। तत्त्वभूतं महाराज क्षिप्रं वेदितुमर्हसि॥ तव दूता महाराज क्षिप्रमर्हन्ति वेदितुम्। उपप्रदानं सान्त्वं वा भेदो वात्र प्रयुज्यताम्॥
target: And those two sons of the king Dasarathathe brothers Rāma and Lakşmaņa, gifted with great beauty, coming to rescue Sītā, have stationed themselves on the shore of the ocean, O you of great effulgence. The army of Rāma extends over the sky and ten yojanas. I have come, O great king, to acquaint you with the real truth. And, knowing everything, it behove your emissaries, O king, to settle whether to render back Sītā, to adopt measures of conciliation, or to sow dissension's in the enemy's camp.

source: ततो निर्याय नगरात् प्रययौ पुरुषोत्तमः। मन्त्रयामास च तदा कर्णेन सुचिरं सह॥
target: Having gone out of the town that best among men departed and began to consult Karna for some time.

source: युधिष्ठिरस्तु मद्रेशमभ्यधावदमर्षितः। स्वयं संनोयदन्नश्वान् दन्तवर्णान् मनोजवान्॥ तत्राश्चर्यमपश्याम कुन्तीपुत्रे युधिष्ठिरे। पुरा भूत्वा मृदुर्दान्तो यत् तदा दारुणोऽभवत्॥
target: Then filled with rage, Yudhishthira rushed against the king of the Madras, himself driving his horses white as ivory and fleet as mind. We then saw some thing wonderful in Yudhishthira, the son of Kunti, for though very mild by nature he then 'ecame highly terrific.

source: जयद्रथेन च तथा कुरुभिश्चापि सर्वशः। ततः सर्वैर्महाबाहुभ्रातभिः परिवारितः॥
target: Also Jayadratha and all other Kurus. Then the mighty armed hero, surrounded by all his brothers,

source: अर्जुन उवाच एवं सततयुक्ता ये भक्तास्त्वां पर्युपासते। ये चाप्यक्षरमव्यक्तं तेषां के योगवित्तमाः॥
target: Arjuna said Of those worshipers, who constantly adore you and who mediate on you as Imperishable and Unmanifest, who are the best acquainted with devotion?

source: स्वाहाकारवषट्कारौ गोषु नित्यं प्रतिष्ठितौ। गावो यज्ञस्य नेत्र्यो वै तथा यज्ञस्य ता मुखम्॥
target: The sacred Mantras, Svaha and Vashat, are always established upon kine. Kine are the chief conductresses of Sacrifices. They form the mouth of Sacrifice.

source: न त्वेव वचनं किंचिदनिमित्तादिहोच्यते। सुविनीतेन शास्त्रेण न व्यवस्यन्त्यथापरे॥
target: Some hold that no scriptural text has been written without a reason, Others again, even if they properly understand the scriptures, never follow them.

source: नमस्ते त्रिषु लोकेषु नमस्ते परतस्त्रिषु। नमस्ते दिक्षु सर्वासु त्वं हि सर्वमयो निधिः॥
target: Salutations to you who are the three worlds to you who are above the three worlds! Salutations to you who are all the directions. You are all you are the one refuge of All.

source: बभूव रजनीमुखे। घोरचटचटाशब्दः शस्राणां पततामभूत्। मृदङ्गानकनि दैर्झर्झरैः पटहैस्तथा॥
target: There arose a dreadful clanging noise of the clashing weapons. In consequence of the sounds of Mridangas, Anakas, Vallakis and Patahas.

source: यदीदं कत्थनाल्लोके सिध्येत् कर्म धनंजय। सर्वे भवेयुः सिद्धार्थाः कत्थने को हि दुर्गतः॥
target: If, O Dhananjaya, people in the world were to succeed owing to boasting then all would have their objects gained for who would be slow to boast.

source: मार्कण्डेय उवाच एवमुक्त्वा धुमत्सेनो विरराम महामनाः। तिष्ठन्ती चैव सावित्री काष्ठभूतेव लक्ष्यते॥
target: Markandeya said : Saying this, the high-minded Dyumatsena ceased; and Savitri thus remaining (without food) looked like a wooden doll.

source: रक्षितं वालिना यत् तत् स्फीतं मधुबनं महत्। त्वया च प्लवगश्रेष्ठ तद् भुङ्क्ते पवनात्मजः॥
target: "O chief of the monkeys, the great and extensive orchard, Madhuvana which was (so) carefully preserved by Bali and is well-guarded by you also, is being pillaged by the son of Pavana,

source: चक्रव्यूहो महाराज आचार्येणाभिकल्पितः। तत्र शक्रोपमाः सर्वे राजानो विनिवेशिता॥
target: The circular array, O monarch, was then formed by the preceptor, in which were duly stationed kings, each equal to Indra himself.

source: ततोऽन्यं रथमास्थाय नकुलो रथपुङ्गवः। सहदेवश्च तेजस्वी भ्रातरौ शत्रुकर्षणौ॥ तुरगैरर्य्यरहोभिर्यात्वा भीमस्य शुष्मिणौ। अनीकैः सहितौ तत्र भ्रातरौ समवस्थितौ॥
target: Nakula, the great chariot holder and valorous Sahadeva just then rode of their chariots and joined Bhimasena immediately. They began fighting after joining the army led by Bhimasena.

source: सागरस्येव मे वेगो मारुतस्येव मे बलम्। न च दाशरथिर्वेद तेन मां योद्भुमिच्छति॥
target: My impetuosity like the Ocean's, my strength like the Wind's, Dācarathi does not know, and therefore it is that he desire to fight with me.

source: शोकं विसृज्याद्य धृतिं भजस्व सोत्साहता चास्तु विमार्गणेऽस्याः। उत्साहवन्तो हि नरा न लोके सीदन्ति कर्मस्वतिदुष्करेषु॥.
target: Do you take heart renouncing your grief and engage with energy of Sita. Persons of high energy are never exhausted on the earth in quest even in the face of arduous works.

source: स्वयमेव मनश्चैवं पञ्चवर्गं च भारत। पूर्वं ध्यानपथे स्थाप्य नित्ययोगेन शाम्यति॥
target: One succeeds, O Bharata, by directing one's mind and to the path of senses meditation, in controlling them perfectly by steadfast Yoga.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततो द्रौणिर्महाराज प्रययावर्जुनं रणे। तं पार्थः प्रतिजग्राह वायुवेगमिवोद्धतम्।
target: Vaishampayana said Then, Drona's son, O king, encountered Arjuna in battle. Partha then faced him, moving like the wind.

source: संजय उवाच प्रभातायां च शर्वर्या भीष्मः शान्तनवस्तदा। अनीकान्यनुसंयाने व्यादिदेशाथ भारत॥
target: Sanjaya said When night passed away and morning dawned, the son of Shantanu Bhishma, therefore grand-sire of the Kurus gave the order for the Kuru army to be ready for fight.

source: लोमश उवाच उक्त्वा स पितरं श्लक्ष्णं यवक्रीरकुतोभयः। विप्रकुर्वनृषीनन्यानतुष्यत् परया मुदा॥
target: Lomasha said: Having thus replied to his father in sweet words, Yavakrit began fearlessly to take pleasure in wantonly injuring the Rishis.

source: महामखेष्वाङ्गिरसी दीप्तिमत्सु महामते। महामतीति विख्याता सप्तमी कथ्यते सुता।॥ यां तु दृष्ट्वा भगवतीं जनः कुहुकुहायते। एकानशेति तामाहुः कुहूमङ्गिरसः सुताम्॥
target: O high-minded one, his seventh daughter was named Mahamati; she was always present at sacrifices of great splendour and that adorable daughter of Angiras whom they called matchless and about whom me cried kuhu, kuhu, in wonder was called Kuhu.

source: सप्तमी चान्वगात् तासां भगीरथरथं तदा। भगीरथोऽपि राजर्षिदिव्यं स्यन्दनमास्थितः॥ प्रायादग्रे महातेजा गङ्गा तं चाप्यनुव्रजत्। गगनाच्छंकरशिरस्ततो धरणिमागता ॥
target: And the seventh followed Bhagiratha's car. And that royal saint, the exceedingly puissant Bhagiratha, mounted on a superb car, went before; and Gariga followed him. And she descended from the welkin upon Sankara's head, thence alighting upon the earth.

source: युधिष्ठिरं च राजानं भीमादींश्चापि पाण्डवान्॥ उपगम्य महातेजा विनयेनाभ्यवादयत्।
target: Going then to king Yudhishthira and Bhima and the other Pandavas the mighty prince of Munipura saluted them all with humility.

source: ततः परमसम्भ्रान्ताः सर्षिसङ्घाः सुरासुराः। विश्वामित्रं महात्मानमूचुः सानुनयं वचः॥
target: Thereupon, in trepidation, the saints and the celestials and the Asuras humbly addressed the high souled Viśvāmitra thus.

source: यं लब्वा परमं लाभं नाधिकं मन्यते बुधः। यां सूक्ष्मां परमां प्राप्तिं गच्छन्नव्ययमक्षयम्॥
target: You are the greatest object of acquirement. The person that is truly wise, who by acquiring you, thinks that there is no higher object of acquisition. By attaining to you who are greatly subtile and who are the highest object of acquisition, the wise man becomes immortal.

source: पश्चिमे युगकाले च यः स ते सम्प्रकीर्तितः। सर्वलोकस्य विदिता युगसंख्या च पाण्डव॥
target: O son of Pandu, I have now narrated to you everything. I have told you the periods embraced by the several Yugas, that which is known to all.

source: पुष्पेषूपहतेष्वेवं रावणो राक्षसेश्वरः॥ अवतीर्णो नदी स्नातुं गङ्गामिव महागजः। तत्र स्नात्वा च विधिवज्जप्त्वा जप्यमनुत्तमम्॥ नर्मदासलिलात्तस्मादुत्ततार स रावणः।
target: Flowers being thus collected, Rāvana, the king of Rākşasas descended into the Narmadā for bathing like a huge elephant into the Gangā. And having bathed he got up, reciting excellent incantations.

source: उपाश्रिताश्चेदिकरूपषकाश्च सर्वोद्योगैर्भूमिपालाः समेताः। तेषां मध्ये सूर्यमिवातपन्तं श्रिया वृतं चेदिपतिं ज्वलन्तम्॥
target: Formerly did assemble the kings of the Chedis and the Karushas with all their preparations and among them stood the king of Chedis, with his blazing beauty and scorching (sight) like the sun.

source: दुर्योधनापराधेन कुलं ते विनशिष्यति॥ स्वस्ति चेदिच्छसे राजन् कुलस्य कुरु मे वचः। वध्यतामेष दुष्टात्मा मन्दो राजा सुयोधनः॥ कर्णश्च शकुनिश्चैव नैनं पश्यतु कर्हिचित्। द्यूतसंघातमप्येषामप्रमादेन वारय॥ अभिषेचय राजानं धर्मात्मानं युधिष्ठिरम्। स पालयिष्यति वशी धर्मेण पृथिवीमिमाम्॥
target: O king, if you wish for the well being of your family, act according to my advice. Renounce this wicked king, Suyodhana, and let not either Karna or Shakuni by any means see him. Stop their gambling too, and anoint the pious king Yudhishthira. That one of controlled senses will righteously govern the Earth.

source: ततः सोऽभ्यद्रवद् देवान् रुद्रो रौद्रपराक्रमः। भगस्य नयने क्रुद्धः प्रहारेण व्यशातयत्॥
target: Meanwhile, Rudra of terrible prowess rushed against the celestials. Filled with anger, he tore out the eyes of Bhaga.

source: प्रजापतिसुतस्त्वासीत् कुशो नाम महीपतिः। कुशस्य पुत्रो बलवान् कुशनाभः सुधार्मिकः॥
target: And there was a king named Kuša, the son of Prajāpati. And Kuśa's son was the powerful and pious Kušanābha.

source: एतत् ते कथितं पुत्र मयाऽऽख्यानमनुत्तमम्। यथा हि विजितो मृत्युर्गृहस्थेन पुराभवत्॥
target: I have now recited to you, my son, this excellent story as to how Death was conquered in days of yore by a householder.

source: पुरस्ताद् दारुणो भूत्वा सुचित्रतरमेव तत्। अनुगृह्णाति भूतानि स्वेन वृत्तेन पार्थिवः॥
target: First becoming exceedingly stern, a king then shows mercy and does good to all creatures by his acts. This is certainly very wonderful.

source: कैलासशृङ्गसंकाशो श्वेतमाल्यानुलेपनौ। सोमोऽप्यनुचरौ प्रादान्मणि सुमणिमेव च॥
target: Soma also gave him two companions, viz., Mani and Sumani, both of whom looked like summits of tea Kailasa mountain and always used white garlands and white unguents.

source: यच्च ते प्रार्थितं ब्रह्मन् कृतं तदिति चिन्त्यताम्। दिष्ट्या प्राप्तोऽसि विप्रर्षे महान् मेऽनुग्रहः कृतः॥
target: O Brahmana, consider that to be already accomplished which is in your heart. O best of the twice born, as the fruit of our good luck we have obtained you.

source: बृहद्रथो महातेजा भूरिभूतिपरिष्कृतः॥ गोलाङ्गलैर्महाभागो गृध्रकूटेऽभिरक्षितः।
target: His name is Brihadratha. Possessed of great energy and endued with numerous accomplishments, that blessed princes has been protected by wolves and the mountains of Griddhrakuta.

source: तन्मां किमभितप्यन्तं वाक्शरैरेव कृन्तसि। अशक्तः सिन्धुराजस्य भूत्वा त्राणाय भारत॥
target: Since I myself am tormented with grief, wherefore are you piercing me with words (poignant) as an arrow, you who failed to rescue the king of Sindhu, O Bharata.

source: तमहं बलसम्पन्नं राक्षसं रणकोविदम्॥ परिघेणातिधोरेण सूदयामि सहानुगम्।
target: With my fierce mace I destroyed that mighty Rākşasa, versed in the art of war, along with his retinue and surrounded by a band of terrible and grim-visaged demons.

source: शेषास्त्वन्ये महाराज शेषानेव महारथान्। ततः प्रववृते युद्धं घोररूपं भयावहम्॥
target: The rest of the warriors, O mighty monarch, engaged with other great car-warriors of the hostile party. Then commenced an awful engagement whose aspect was indeed terrible.

source: स्वेन वृत्तेन मे वृत्तं नाधिगन्तुं त्वमर्हसि। उभयोरन्तरं वेद सूनृतानृतयोरपि॥
target: It is not proper that you should judge of my conduct to you by your own conduct; know that the difference between us two is the same as the difference between truth and falsehood.

source: स चेन्ममार सृञ्जय चतुर्भद्रतरस्त्वया। पुत्रात् पुण्यतरस्तुभ्यं मा पुत्रमनुतप्यथाः। अयज्वानमदाक्षिण्यमभि श्वैत्येत्युदाहरत्॥
target: O Srinjaya, when even such a sovereign, who was superior in respect of the four cardinal virtues to you and consequently to your son, had to suffer death you should not lament of your son who performed no sacrifices and made no sacrificial gifts, saying 'O Shvaitya'. were

source: यदग्ने ते शिवं रूपं ये च ते सप्त हेतयः। तेन नः परिपाहि त्वमान्न् वै शरणैषिणः॥
target: O Agni, we are in (great) distress. Protect us with your auspicious form and with your seven flames. We pray for your protection.

source: ततः कृतप्रतिज्ञो वै स पक्षी प्रहसनिव) तमग्निं त्रि:परिक्रम्य प्रविवेश महामतिः॥
target: Having thus made up his mind, the great bird, with a smiling face, thrice went round that fire and then entered its flames.

source: दैत्या हिंसानुरक्ताश्च अवध्याः सुरसत्तमैः। राक्षसाश्चापि लोकेऽस्मिन् यदोत्पत्स्यन्ति दारुणाः॥ तदाहं सम्प्रसूयामि गृहेषु शुभकर्मणाम्। प्रविष्टो मानुषं देहं सर्वं प्रशमयाम्यहम्॥
target: When fearful and vicious-minded Daityas and Rakshasas, that are incapable of being killed by even the foremost of the celestials, are born on earth, I then take my birth in the families of virtuous men. And assuming a human form, 1 restore peace by destroying all evils.

source: भरद्वाजसखा चासीत् पृपतो नाम पार्थिवः। तस्यापि दुपदो नाम तदा समभवत् सुतः॥
target: Bharadvaja had a friend, named Prishata who was a king. He had a son, born to him, named Drupada.

source: दृष्टमेतत् पुरा भद्रे ज्ञातं च तपसा मया। ब्रह्मभूतं हि सकलं पितुस्तव कुलं भवेत्॥
target: It was ordained of yore by destiny, O lovely damsel. I have known it all by my penances. All the descendants of your father will be endued with Brahmanic virtues.

source: तं चाप्यतिक्रमन्तस्ते ददृशुर्वालुकार्णवम्। अवैक्षन्त महाशैलं मेरुं शिखरिणां वरम्॥
target: Crossing the Himavat, they saw a vast desert of sand. They then saw the powerful mountain Meru. The foremost of all highpeaked mountains.

source: प्राणीनामेवमन्येषां स्यादपीति विनाशनम्। शोकाग्निना दह्यमानो धम्यमान इवाशये॥
target: And also having argued that the other creatures would be of the similar fate, Dhritarashtra, the lord of men, was burnt by the fire of grief and looked like a burning serpent.

source: विजित्य क्षममाणस्य यशो राज्ञो विवर्धते। महापराधे हाप्यस्मिन् विश्वसन्त्यपि शत्रवः॥
target: The fame of a king who shows forgiveness after conquest spreads more widely. The very enemies of a forgiving person trust him even when he becomes guilty of a heinous crime.

source: महोदरा महादंष्ट्रा घोररूपा महाबलाः। युद्धाभिमनसः सर्वे हनूमद्ग्रहणोन्मुखाः॥
target: Having huge bellies, and large teeth, of dreadful form, and possessed of unwieldy strength, all eager to engage in the conflict and take Hanuman.

source: मत्वा तृणेन तांस्तुल्यान् विचचार गतव्यथः॥ ते चापि रथिनां श्रेष्ठा भीमाय निशिताञ्छरान्। प्रेषयामासुरव्यग्राः शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः॥ तस्य शक्तिं महावेगां भगदत्तो महारथः। चिक्षेप समरे वीरः स्वर्णदण्डां महामते॥ तोमरं सैन्धवो राजा पट्टिशं च महाभुजः।
target: Yet regarding them as mere straws, he careered through the field without the least pain. Those foremost of car-warriors also patiently sped at Bhima sharp arrows by hundreds and thousands. Then the highly powerful heroic Bhagadatta let go his lance of great velocity and of a golden staff at that illustrious warrior Bhima. The mighty-armed king of the Sindhus hurled at the latter a lance and a battle-axe.

source: सर्वैरथ च जीवद्भिभित्सुरापराजितः। कृष्णनेत्रो महाबाहुर्देवैरपि दुरासदः॥
target: When all those heroes were alive even then Vibhatsu could not be defeated. Having Krishna, for his cyes, that mighty armed hero is incapable of being defeated by the very gods!

source: धर्मे चार्थे च कामे च मोक्षे च भरतर्षभ। यदिहास्ति तदन्यत्र यन्नेहास्ति न तत्क्वचित्॥
target: O best of the Bharata race, whatever about Dharma, Artha, Kama and Moksha, that is contained in this Bharata, may be met with elsewhere; but whatever is not in it, is not to be found anywhere.

source: काम्बोजस्य च दायादे हते राजन् सुदक्षिणे। श्रुतायुधे च विक्रान्ते निहते सव्यसाचिना॥
target: When also, O king, the heir of the king of Kambojas, namely prince Sudakshina, also the powerful Shrutayudha, had been slain by Savyasachin.

source: ततो निवातकवचा: सर्व एव स्वलंकृताः। दंशिता विविधैस्त्राणैर्विचित्रायुधपाणयः॥ आयसैश्च महाशूलैर्गदाभिर्मुसलैरपि। पट्टिशैः करवालैश्च रथचक्रैश्च भारत॥ शतघ्नीभिर्भुशुण्डीभिः खङ्गैश्चित्रैः स्वलंकृतैः। प्रगृहीतैर्दितेः पुत्राः प्रादुरासन् सहस्रशः॥
target: Thereupon, O Bharata, all those sons of Ditithe Nivatakavachas-poured in thousands, adorned with ornaments, clad in various kinds of mails and holding in their hands various weapons, (such as) javelins, mighty maces, clubs, hatchets, Pattishas, Sabres, car-wheels, Shataghnis, Bhushundis and variegated and ornamented swords.

source: गन्धतैलावसिक्ताभिः काञ्चनीभिः सहस्रशः। दीपिकाभिः कृतोद्योतं पश्यते वै वृतं तदा।॥
target: He saw Karna lighted up by a thousand of golden lamps filled with scented oil.

source: तौ जाताश्वासौ राजपुत्रौ विदित्वा तच्चाभिज्ञानं राघवाय प्रदाय। देव्या चाख्यातं सर्वमेवानुपूर्व्याद् वाचा सम्पूर्णं वायुपुत्रः शशंस॥
target: And considering those two princes greatly consoled, the Wind-god's son handed over that token to Rāghava and described everything from the beginning to the end.

source: तौ परस्परशापेन देहमुत्सृज्य धार्मिकौ। अभूतां नृपविप्रर्षी वायुभूतौ तपोधनौ॥
target: Having renounced their persons both Nimi and the pious Vasiştha, having asceticism for their wealth, were metamorphosed into air.

source: स चिन्तयामास तदा स्तैन्यं कार्यमितो मया। न हीदानीमुपायो मे विद्यते प्राणधारणे॥
target: The sage thought and decided that he should steal that meat. And he said to himself, I have no means now of keeping up my life.

source: गतेषु पार्थिवेन्द्रेषु भीमः प्रीतो महामनाः॥ विवाहं कारयामास दमयन्त्या नलस्य च।
target: And after the departure of the best rulers of the earth, the lofty-minded and well-pleased Bhima celebrated the marriage ceremony of Damayanti and Nala.

source: न चाभिसर्तव्यमिति प्रचोदिताः परे त्वदीयाश्च तथावतस्थिरे॥ महारथौ तौ परिवार्य सर्वतः सुरासुराः शम्बरवासवाविव।
target: They assuring their troops with the words "don't give way” were surrounded by their troops and their inimical forces like Vasava and Shambara by the Gods and the Asuras.

source: तस्माद् यास्यामि तीर्थानि सरस्वत्या निषेवितुम्। न हि शक्ष्यामि कौरव्यान् नश्यमानानुपेक्षितुम्॥
target: Therefore shall I now go to make a pilgrimage to the sacred places on the banks of the Sarasvati for I shall not be able to look on with indifference at this massacre of the Kurus.

source: बलेः कुम्भीनसेश्चैव सर्वास्ता योषितो विदुः। हसन्तं प्रहसन्त्येता रुदन्तं प्ररुदन्ति च॥
target: If man laughs, women laugh. If man weeps, they weep. If the opportunity requires, they receive the man who is disagreeable to them with sweet words.

source: कच्चित् प्रकृतयः सप्त न लुप्ता भरतर्षभ। आढ्यास्तथा व्यसनिनः स्वनुरक्ताश्च सर्वशः॥
target: O best of the Bharata race, have your seven chief officers of state been tempted by your enemies? Have they become idle for the wealth they have earned? Are they all attached to you?

source: जनक उवाच ब्रह्मणैकेन जातानां नानात्वं गोत्रतः कथम्। बहूनीह हि लोके वै गोत्राणि मुनिसत्तम॥
target: Janka said When all have originated from Brahman alone, how did human beings become divergent of race? O best of ascetics, numberless diversity of races is seen in this world.

source: तदा न विषयं मन्ये सर्वो वा विषयो मम। आत्मायि चायं न मम सर्वा वा पृथिवी मम॥
target: Then I though that I have no dominion, or that everything is my dominion. This body is not mine, or the whole Earth is minc.

source: राक्षसास्त्वभिसंक्रुद्धाः प्रासतोमरपाणयः॥ कपीनिजनिरे तत्र शस्त्रैः परमदारुणैः।
target: And in the encounter monkeys slew Rākşasas of dreadful deeds. And in their turn Rākşasas, wrought up with passion, bearing in their hands prāśas and tomaras destroyed monkeys wielding dire arms.

source: तदनीकं महत् तेषां विबभौ सागरोपमम्। सर्पमाणमिवाकाशे वनं बहुलपादपम्॥
target: And they saw their army arranged in battle array. That huge army appeared like an ocean.

source: व्यलीकमपि यत् त्वत्र चित्तवैतंसिकं तव। तदर्थमिष्यते राजन् प्रायश्चित्तं तदाचर॥
target: Although this confusion of your heart is a mere delusion, still, if you like, O king, perform expiatory rites.

source: लब्धवान् युध्यमानौ द्वौ बृहन्तौ गजकच्छपौ। अत्र चक्रधनुर्नाम सूर्याज्जातो महानृषिः॥
target: See fighting with each other, a large elephant and a big tortoise. Here was born from the sun the great Rishi named Chakradhanu,

source: कच्चिन्नु राजपुत्री ते सपत्नी चैत्रवाहनी। चित्राङ्गदा वरारोहा नापराध्यति किंचन॥
target: Has Chitrangada of faultless limbs, descended from the line of Chitravahana, done you any wrong?

source: देवदारुवने स्नात्वा धूतपाप्मा कृतोदकः। देवलोकमवाप्नोति सप्तरात्रोषितः शुचिः॥
target: By bathing in the Devadaru forest and offering oblations of water to the departed manes and living there for seven nights with a pure body and mind, one acquires the region of the celestials on departing from this world.

source: अतिहर्षोऽयमस्थाने तवाद्य मधुसूदन। शोकस्थाने तु सम्प्राप्ते हैडिम्बस्य वधेन तु॥
target: O monarch, with a beast overwhelmed with grief, addressed the former saying-"O slayer of Madhu, you are showing delight at a time scarcely fit for it.

source: धर्ममर्थं च कामं च समयं चापि लौकिकम्। अविज्ञाय कथं बाल्यान्मामिहाद्य विगर्हसे॥
target: Not cognizant of virtue, knowledge, passion and custom, why did you blame me like a child?

source: तमृते ते नरव्याघ्राः पाण्डवा जनमेजय। मुदमप्राप्नुवन्तो वै काम्यके न्यवसंस्तदा॥
target: O Janamejaya, in his absence, those foremost of men, the Pandavas, continued to live in the Kamyaka in great cheerlessness.

source: अर्थस्य पुरुषो दासो दासस्त्वर्थो न कस्यचित्। इति सत्यं महाराज बद्धोऽस्म्यर्थेन कौरवैः॥
target: A man is the slave of wealth, but wealth is the slave of none. O king, this is the truth. I am bound to the Kurus by wealth.

source: सर्वेषामेव शत्रूणां चतुर्थांशं नयिष्यति। दिनार्धेन महाबाहुः प्रेतराजपुरं प्रति॥
target: The mighty-armed hero, within the course of half a day, will send the one-fourth part of the foes, to the land of the dead.
