source: मत्तप्रमत्तानि समाकुलानि रथाश्वभद्रासनसंकुलानि। वीरश्रिया चापि समाकुलानि ददर्श धीमान् स कपिः कुलानि॥
target: The intelligent monkey saw mansions crowded with (Raksasas), some inebriate with wine and other with wealth, and abounding in cars and horses and golden seats; and fraught with the grace got of heroism.

source: हतास्ते दानवाः सर्वे यैः स शब्द उदीरित। शरैरादित्यसंकाशैर्ध्वलितैः शब्दसाधनैः॥
target: But all those Danavas that had sent up that shout were killed by my those arrows, which were as blazing as the sun and which were capable of striking (at a foe) if only his voice could be heard.

source: बलेन महता युक्तो राक्षसैर्भीमविक्रमः। त्वं वधायाशु निर्याहि रामस्य सह वानरैः॥
target: O you of dreadful prowess, surrounded by a mighty force, do you march forth to compass the destruction of Rāma along with the monkeys.

source: मतस्त्रैलोक्यराजस्य मातलि म सारथिः। तस्यैकैव कुले कन्या रूपतो लोकविश्रुता॥
target: Such is the story-The king of the three worlds had a driver by the name of Matali. In his family there was born only one daughter who had a great reputation for beauty in this world.

source: स वेगवान् वेगसमाहितात्मा हरिप्रवीरः परिवीरहन्ता। मनः समाधाय महानुभावो जगाम लङ्कां मनसा मनस्वी ॥
target: That intelligent, magnanimous and heroic monkey-destroyer of hostile heroes, endowed with speed, concentrating his soul on his energy, mentally went to Lankā.

source: चतुर्विभक्तः पुरुषः स क्रीडति यथेच्छति। एवं स भगवान् स्वेन ज्ञानेन प्रतिबोधितः॥
target: Divided into four parts, (viz., Aniruddha, Pradyumna, Sankarshana, and Vasudeva), He sports as He pleases. That illustrious and divine Lord is such, awakened by His Own knowledge.

source: दर्भास्तरणमास्तीर्य निश्चयाद् धृतराष्ट्रजः। संस्पृश्यापः शुचिर्भूत्वा भूतले समुपस्थितः॥ कुशचीराम्बरधरः परं नियममास्थितः। वाग्यतो राजशार्दूलः स स्वर्गगतिकाम्यया॥ मनसोपचितिं कृत्वा निरस्य च बहिः क्रियाः।
target: In accordance with his resolve, he spread Kusha grass on the ground and purifying himself by touching water, he sat down on it. Clad in rags and Kusha grass, he engaged in observing the greatest vow. That foremost of kings, with the desire of going to heaven, stopped all speech. He began to pray and worship internally and he suspended all external intercourse.

source: त्वमप्यनेन कौन्तेय निवातकवचान् रणे। विजेता युधि विक्रम्य पुरेव मघवा वशी॥
target: You too, O son of Kunti, mounted on this (car) shall, displaying your prowess, obtain victory over the Nivatakavachas in fight as of yore the self-contained Maghavana did.

source: त्रैलोक्यविजयार्थाय समाधायैकनिश्चयम्। दीक्षां कृत्वा गतौ विन्ध्यं तावुनं तेपतुस्तपः॥
target: Always entertaining the same purpose and ever desiring of subjugating the three worlds, the brothers went after due initiation to the mountains of Vindhya; and going there, they performed served penances.

source: नकुलस्तं तु विंशत्या विद्ध्वा भारसहैईलैः। ननाद बलवन्नादं कर्णस्य भयमादधत्॥
target: Striking his antagonist with twenty strong arrows capable of bearing a strain Nakula too sent up a loud war-cry and struck terror unto Karna.

source: पुत्रत्वमगमद् राजस्तस्य लोकेश्वरेश्वरः। गाधिर्नामाभवत् पुत्रः कौशिकः पाकशासनः॥
target: The great lord of the three worlds, viz., the chastiser of Paka, o king, then became Kushika's son known by the name of Gadhi.

source: त्वयि प्रतिगते श्रेयः : कुतः श्रोष्यामहे वयम्। कुरुवंशप्रदीपस्त्वं ज्ञानदीपेन दीप्यसे॥
target: When you will leave us, from whom shall we hear of all that is wholesome for us? You are the lamp of Kuru's race. Indeed, you are always shining with the light of knowledge.

source: सम्बन्धिपुरुषैराप्तैरभिजातैः स्वदेशजैः। अहायैरव्यभीचारैः सर्वशः सुपरीक्षितैः॥ यौनाः श्रौतास्तथा मौलास्तथैवाप्यनहंकृताः। कर्तव्या भूतिकामेन पुरुषेण बुभृषता॥
target: A king who seeks prosperity and wishes to outdo his contemporaries, should have for ministers trustworthy persons, of high descent, born in his own kingdom, incapable of being corrupted, unstained by adultery and similar vices, well proved, belonging to good families, possessed of learning, sprung from ancestors who held similar offices, and adorned with humility.

source: यथाप्रतिज्ञं विहतश्च कालः सर्वाः समा द्वादश निर्जनेषु। अज्ञातचर्यां विधिवत् समाप्य भवद्गताः केशव पाण्डवेयाः॥
target: We will spend the period of twelve years, as we have promised, in lonely forests. And then having duly completed the period of our are incognito life, O Keshava, the sons of Pandu will place themselves under your protection.

source: निस्त्रिंशवेगाभिहतौ ततस्तौ पुरुषर्षभौ। धरणीं समनुप्राप्तौ सर्वभूतनिषेविताम्॥
target: Then those two foremost of men, struck with the vehemence of one another's swords (blows) fell down on the earth inhabited by all sorts of creatures.

source: वर्तमानेषु सवत्तिं पाण्डवेषु महात्मसु॥ प्रीतिमानभवद् राजा धृतराष्ट्रोऽम्बिकासुतः।
target: Seeing that the great Pandavas were in the observance of a wise and righteous conduct, king Dhritarashtra, the son of Ambika, became pleased with them.

source: तस्मस्त्वमानुषे युद्धे वर्तमाने महाभये। कर्णराक्षसयोनक्तं दारुणप्रतिदर्शने॥
target: Meanwhile as that nocturnal battle raged between Karna and the Rakshasa-battle that, though terrible and superhuman and fierce, was yet delightful to the eye.

source: स्रुतरुधिरकृतैकरागवस्त्रो भ्रुकुटिपुटाकुटिलोऽतिसिंहनादः। पवस्थ्यगतो भृशं व्यराजत्॥
target: With his robes dyed with the blood flowing in profusion (from his wounds), with his brows formidable in consequence of the wrinkles thereon, himself sending up loud war-cries, that highly powerful Abhimanyu appeared superbly beautiful staying in the midst of those foremost of kings.

source: वाय्वम्बुभुजोऽपि सतो नरस्य दुःखक्षयः कुतस्तस्य। भवति हि सुरासुरगुरौ यस्य न विश्वेश्वरे भक्तिः॥
target: If a person has no devotion to that Lord of the universe that Master of the gods and the Asuras his misery will not terminate even if from want of food he has to live upon only air and water.

source: राज्ञो वचनमाज्ञाय सुमन्त्रः शीघ्रविक्रमः। योजयित्वा ययौ तत्र रथमश्वरलंकृतम्॥
target: Receiving the mandate of the sovereign, Sumantra endued with fleet vigour, yoking a car adorned with horses, came there.

source: ननु नाम कृतार्थेन त्वया रामस्य वानर। सीताया मार्गणे यत्नः कर्तव्यः : कृतमिच्छता॥
target: Having been benefited by Rāma, you, anxious to repay his kindness, should exert yourself in search of Sita.

source: भवन्तं चेह सम्प्रेक्ष्य तपो मे परिहीयते। तपोयुक्तं शरीरं च त्वां दृष्ट्वा धारितं पुनः॥
target: Meeting with you, my penances are being slackened. This my body, gifted with penances. I have been able to sustain only on account of my meeting with you.

source: ये चान्ये प्रतियोत्स्यन्ति बुद्धिमोहेन मां नृपाः। तांश्च सर्वानहं बाणैर्नेतास्मि यमसादनम्॥
target: I will send to the abode of Yama with my arrows also those other kings that will from foolishness fight against me.

source: स तानि शरजालानि पक्षाभ्यां तु विधूय ह। चरणाभ्यां महातेजा बभञ्जास्य महद् धनुः॥ तच्चाग्निसदृशं दीप्तं रावणस्य शरावरम्। पक्षाभ्यां च महातेजा व्यधुनोत् पतगेश्वरः॥
target: Pushing away these arrows by the wind of his wings, he again snapped that mighty bow with his feet, and with a stroke of his wings shattered Rāvaņa's flaming shield like to burning fire.

source: उपमन्युरुवाच अपुनर्भवकामानां वैराग्ये वर्ततां च या। प्रकृतीनां लयानां च सा गतिस्त्वं सनातन॥ ज्ञानविज्ञानयुक्तानां निरुपाख्या निरञ्जना। कैवल्या या गतिर्देव परमा सा गतिर्भवान्॥ वेदशास्त्रपुराणोक्ताः पञ्चैता गतयः स्मृताः। त्वत्प्रसादिद्धि लभ्यन्ते न लभ्यन्तेऽन्यथा विभो॥ इति तण्डिस्तपोराशिस्तुष्टावेशानमात्मना। जगौ च परमं ब्रह्म यत् पुरा लोककृज्जगौ॥ एवं स्तुतो महादेवस्तण्डिना ब्रह्मवादिना। उवाच भगवान् देव उमया सहितः प्रभुः॥
target: Upamanyu said You, O Eternal One, are that End of those who seek Liberation from rebirth, who give up all enjoyments, and who desire the annihilation of the elements. You are that high End, O illustrious one, which cannot be described, which is pure, which is the immutable one, and which is theirs who are given to knowledge and science. These are the five Ends described in the Vedas and the scriptures and the Puranas. It is through your favour that persons acquire those ends, or if they fail to attain to them it is through your favour being denied to them. It was thus that Tandi, who was a heap of penances, lauded Ishana. And he sang also that high Brahma which in days of yore was sung by the Creator himself. Thus lauded by that utterer of Brahma, viz., Tandi, Mahadeva, that illustrious and powerful god who was accompanied by his wife Uma, said these words.

source: नाशयत्येष वै भूतं तमेव सृजति प्रभुः। पायत्येष तपत्येष वर्षत्येष नभस्तिभिः॥
target: The lord creat everything an verily destroyet it. And with his rays he suck up, and destroy and create (everything)

source: तानन्ये समरे योधाः प्रेषयन्तो यमक्षयम्। स्वप्नायमानांस्त्वपरे परानतिविचेतसः॥ आत्मानं समरे जघ्नुः स्वानेव च परानपि। नानावाचो विमुञ्चन्तो निद्रान्धास्ते महारणे॥
target: Other warriors, that were awake in that battle, dispatched these to Yama's abode; others again, deprived of their senses in sleep and dreaming, slew their own comrades as also their opponents, regarding every one as their foes. Indeed they fought on in that fierce battle uttering dreadful exclamations.

source: सौतिरुवाच इत्युक्तः प्रत्युवाचेदं कदूपुत्राननुस्मरन्। स्मृत्वा चैवोपधिकृतं मातुर्दास्यनिमित्ततः॥
target: Sauti said : Being thus addressed, Garuda recollecting the sons of Kadru and the slavery of his mother by deception said,

source: तां नियुक्तामदीनात्मा सत्त्वस्थः संयमे रतः। ज्ञानवान् नियताहारो ददर्श कपिलस्तथा॥ स बुद्धिमुत्तमां प्राप्तो नैष्ठिकीमकुतोभयाम्। सतीमशिथिला सत्यां वेदा इत्यब्रवीत् सकृत्॥ तां गाषिः स्यूमरश्मिः प्रविश्य यतिमब्रवीत्। हंहो वेदा यदि मता धर्माः केनापरे मताः॥
target: Seeing that cow tied for slaughter, Kapila of liberal soul, ever following Sattvika duties, always engaged in controlling his senses, endued with true knowledge, and sparing in diet, having gained an excellent understanding that was characterised by faith, perfectly fearless, beneficial, firm, and ever directed towards truth, uttered-Alas, ye Vedas!-At that time a Rishi by name Syumarashmi, entering the form of that cow, addressed the Yati Kapila, saying,-Silence, O Kapila! If the Vedas are censurable, whence have those other duties come to regarded as authoritative.

source: सततं च त्वमश्रौषीर्वचनं द्रोणभीष्मयोः। अवध्यौ वदन्तः कृष्णौ संनिधौ च महीक्षिताम्॥
target: You have always heard Drona and Bhishma speaking before all the kings of the two Krishnas as being unslayable.

source: पापस्य कर्तास्मि विगर्हितस्य क्षुद्रस्य लोकापकृतस्य लोके। शोको महान् मामभिवर्ततेऽयं वृष्टेर्यथा निम्नमिवाम्बुवेगः॥
target: I am the perpetrator of a vile and disgraceful sin, blamed of all in this world. And like to a current of rain going downwards, this mighty grief has overcome me.

source: अस्त्रेण हनुमान् मुक्तो नात्मानमवबुध्यते। कृष्यमाणस्तु रक्षोभिस्तैश्च बन्धैर्निपीडितः॥ हन्यमानस्ततः क्रूरै राक्षसैः कालमुष्टिभिः। समीपं राक्षसेन्द्रस्य प्राकृष्यत स वानरः॥
target: On being released from the weapon, Hanumān did not betray any signs of his liberation, albeit he was pulled by the Rākşasas and pained by the bonds they had bound him with. And the monkey, Hanumān, was pulled by those cruel Rākṣasas having fatal boxes, in the direction of the lord of Rākşasas.

source: निदाघकाले पानीयं यस्य तिष्ठत्यवारितम्। स दुर्गं विषमं कृत्स्नं न कदाचिदवाप्नुते॥
target: That man gets over every sort of calamity from whose well or tank every one draws water without restraint during the summers season.

source: तैर्बाध्यमानास्त्रिदशाः सर्षिसङ्घाः सचारणाः। त्रातारं नाधिगच्छन्ति निरयस्था यथा नराः॥ अथ ते विश्वकर्माणं शिल्पिनां वरमव्ययम्। ऊचुः समेत्य संहृष्टा राक्षसा रघुसत्तम॥
target: And like to men abiding in hell, the celestials, chāraṇas and hosts of sages, being harassed (by Raksasas), did not find any deliverer. And then, O foremost of the Raghus, the Raksasas, assembled together, joyfully said to the undeteriorating Viśvakarmá—prince of artist.

source: अन्तरिक्षं दिशश्चैव सर्वाश्च प्रदिशस्तथा। तं श्रुत्वा सुमहानादं तव सैन्यस्य भारत॥
target: As also the firmament and all the cardinal and subsidiary quarters. As your soldiers heard, O Bharata, that terrible uproar,

source: युवानं निहतं वीरं लम्बमानं सकार्मुकम्॥ उदीर्णाश्च हया राजन् वहन्तस्तत्र तत्र ह।
target: O king, impetuous horses carried here and there the youthful riders killed and hung from their saddle with their bows till in their hands.

source: नारायणपरं सत्यमृतं नारायणात्मकम्। नारायणपरो धर्मः पुनरावृत्तिदुर्लभः॥
target: Truth has Narayana for its refuge. Rita has Narayana for its soul. The Religion of Renunciation in which there is no return, had Narayana for its high region.

source: परेषां यदसूयेत न तत् कुर्यात् स्वयं नरः। यो ह्यसू युस्तथायुक्तः सोऽवहासं नियच्छति॥
target: A person should not himself do that act which, if done by another, will bring censure on him. Indeed, by doing an act that one censures in others, one meets with ridicule.

source: श्वा वै ते तिष्ठते द्वारि कार्यार्थी समुपागतः। लक्ष्मणस्यः वचः श्रुत्वा रामो वचनमब्रवीत्।। संप्रवेशय वै क्षिप्रं कार्यार्थी योऽत्र तिष्ठति॥
target: That dog, as a beggar, is waiting at the gate for your commands.” Whereto Rāma replied: “Bring him speedily here who is waiting at the gate for business."

source: युधिष्ठिर उवाच सर्वशास्त्रविधानज्ञ राजधर्मविदुत्तमा अतीव संशयच्छेत्ता भवान् वै प्रथितः क्षितौ॥
target: Yudhishthira said You know fully well the ordinances of all the scriptures. You are the foremost of those who are acquainted with the duties of kings. You are celebrated over the whole world as a great remover of doubts.

source: तस्मादेवं महाब्रह्म वैवस्वतवधोद्यतः। गच्छामि दक्षिणामाशां यत्र सूर्यात्मजो नृप॥
target: Therefore,* O great Brahmana, intent upon slaying the Vaivasvata's son, I will go by this way which lead to the king-the offspring of the sun. *As you has commanded me.

source: पदमस्यानुगच्छ त्वं मा विचारय पाण्डव। धृष्टद्युम्नः शिखण्डी च युधामन्यूत्तमौजसौ॥
target: Do you rush to his rescue, O son of Pandu and do not hesitate. Let Dhristadyumna and Uttamanjas.

source: अपि संतनयेयुर्धे भयं साक्षाच्छतक्रतोः। यदा श्रोष्यसि निर्घोषं विस्फूर्जितमिवाशनेः॥ राधेय गाण्डिवस्याजौ तदा नैवं वदिष्यसि।
target: They are capable of striking fear even into the heart of Indra himself. O son of Radha, when you will hear the twang of his Gandiva bow in battle like the peal of the thunder itself you will not give vent to such words.

source: लक्षणिभ्यो द्विजातिभ्यः श्रुत्वाहं वचनं गृहे। वनवासकृतोत्साहा नित्यमेव महाबल॥
target: I have heard this from the Brāhmaṇas versed in palmistry, and I have all along been anxious.

source: तान्यन्तरिक्षे चिच्छेद पौत्रस्ते निशितैः शरैः। तांश्चैव प्रतिविव्याध तदद्भुतमिवाभवत्॥
target: But your grandson, with his own sharp arrows severed all these shafts even when the latter were coursing through the sky; in return also he pierced your warriors; indeed that feat then appeared wonderful.

source: ततस्तु पयसो धारां पुष्टिहेतोर्महात्मनः। तस्यास्ये यौवनाश्वस्य पाणिरिन्द्रस्य चास्रवत्॥
target: To give nourishment to that high-souled child of Yuvanashva, the finger of Indra, placed in his mouth, began to give a jet of milk.

source: कुटीकृतं तथैवात्र कमलाभं सहस्रशः। श्लक्ष्णं वस्त्रमकार्पासमाविकं मृदु चाजिनम्॥ निशितांश्चैव दीर्घासीनृष्टिशक्तिपरश्वधान्। अपरान्तसमुद्भूतांस्तथैव परशूञ्छितान्॥ रसान् गन्धांश्च विविधान् रत्नानि च सहस्रशः। बलिं च कृत्स्नमादाय द्वारि तिष्ठन्ति वारिताः॥
target: They also gave thousands of other cloths not made of cotton and all possessing the colour of the lotus, being made of smooth and soft texture. They also gave thousands of soft sheepskins, also many sharp and long swords and scimitars, hatches and fine-edged battleaxes, manufactured in the western countries also thousands of perfumes, jewels and gems. But being refused admittance they all waited at the gate.

source: असकृच्चाप्यहं तेन त्वत्कृते पार्थ भेदितः। न मया तद् गृहीत् च पापं तस्य चिकीर्षितम्॥
target: I, too, O son of Pritha, was sought to be withdrawn from four side by that vicious one; but that evil counsel of his was not accepted by me.

source: आर्टिषेणाश्रमे तेषां वसतां वै महात्मनाम्। अगच्छन् बहवो मासाः पश्यतां महदद्भुतम्॥
target: Thus, witnessing many wonders, these highsouled ones (Pandavas) spent several months in the hermitage of Arstisena.

source: विमानैर्विविधैर्दिव्यैर्दीप्यमाना इवाग्नयः। स्रग्विणो भूषिताः सर्वे यान्ति चायान्ति चापरे॥
target: As effulgent as fire, adorned with garlands and ornaments often come to and go from that celestials assembly-hall riding on various kinds of celestials cars.

source: स तु संहष्टसर्वाङ्गः प्राकारस्थो महाकपिः। पुष्पिताग्रान् वसन्तादौ ददर्श विविधान् दुमान्॥ सालानशोकान् भव्यांश्च चम्पकांश्च सुपुष्पितान्। उद्दालकान् नागवृक्षांश्चूतान् कपिमुखानपि ॥ तथाऽऽम्रवणसम्पन्नांल्लताशतसमन्वितान्। ज्यामुक्त इव नाराचः पुप्लुवे वृक्षवाटिकाम्॥
target: All his frame filled with delight, that mighty monkey, stationed on the wall, saw various trees having their tops furnished with flowers through spring and the other seasons, salas and Asokas, bhavyas, champakas, uddalakas, and Nāgas, and those bearing fruits resembling the mouths of monkeys; and those relative to mango woods, with hundreds of plants. And (Hanuman) leapt into the garden like an arrow let go from the bow string.

source: रक्ताक्षाः सुबहुव्यामा नीलाञ्जनचयोपमाः। शूलानुद्यम्य खङ्गांश्च निशितांश्च परश्वधान्॥ भिन्दिपालांश्च परिघान्गदाश्च मुसलानि च। तालस्कन्धांश्च विपुलान्क्षेपणीयान्दुरासदान्॥
target: The Räkşasa measuring each many a vyama and red, eyed, and resembling masses of darkblue collyrium, went out upraising darts and swords and sharpened axes and bhindipälas and parighas and maces and huge talaskandhas and irrisistible Kșepaņis.

source: शीलेन हि त्रयो लोकास्त्वया धर्मज्ञ निर्जिताः। तद्विज्ञाय सुरेन्द्रेण तव शीलं हृतं प्रभो॥
target: O Righteous one, it was by your conduct that you had reduced the three worlds to subjection. Knowing this the king of the gods robbed you of your conduct!

source: एवमुक्तास्तत: सर्वे धार्तराष्ट्रस्य सैनिकाः। अभ्यद्रवन्त संक्रुद्धा भीमसेन महाबलम्॥
target: Thus spoken to, all the warriors belonging to the army of Dhritarashtra's son, furious in at Bhimasena endued with superhuman strength.

source: विद्युतं मेघमध्यस्थां भ्राजमानामिवाम्बरे। ददृशुर्गाण्डिवं योधा रुक्मपृष्ठं महामृधे॥
target: In that terrible encounter, the warriors saw Arjuna's gold mounted Gandiva appear beautiful like flashes of lightning illumining a mass of clouds in the welkin.

source: तादृशं तपसा युक्तं प्रदीप्तमिव पावकम्। कथमस्मद्विधा नारी जितेन्द्रियमभिस्पृशेत्॥
target: How can a woman (like my humble self) touch such a man who is full of ascetic virtues, who is as blazing as the blazing fire and who has completely controlled his passions.

source: सोऽपेतवर्मा पुत्रस्ते विरराज भृशं नृप। उत्सृज्य काले राजेन्द्र निर्मोकमिव पन्नगः॥
target: His armour being cut-off, your son O monarch, O lord of kings, looked as beautiful as a snake with its slough cast off in proper time.

source: कच उवाच पूज्यो मान्यश्च भगवान् यथा तव पिता मम। तथा त्वमनवद्याङ्गि पूजनीयतरा मम॥
target: Kacha said: You are an object of my respect and worship, as is your illustrious father. O lady of faultless features, you are an object of greater reverence to me (than your father).

source: अहमप्येवमेवैनं लोकं जानाम्यशाश्वतम्॥ कालाग्नावाहितं घोरे गुह्ये सततगेऽक्षरे।
target: Like yourself I also know that this universe is not eternal, and that it has been thrown into Time's fire that is dreadful though hidden from the view, that is perpetually burning, and that is indeed endless.

source: जानकिश्च सुशर्मा च मणिमान् योतिमत्सकः। पांशुराष्ट्राधिपश्चैव धृष्टकेतुश्च वीर्यवान्।॥
target: And Janaki, Susharma and Maniman and Yotimatsaka and the king Panshurashtra and the heroic Dhrishtaketu.

source: छिन्नस्य यदि वृक्षस्य न मूलं प्रतिरोहति। बीजान्यस्य प्रवर्तन्ते मृतः क्व पुनरेष्यति॥
target: The root of a tree that has been cut down docs not revive. Only the seeds put forth sprouts. Where is the person who having died regains life?

source: पाञ्चजन्यस्य निर्घोषं देवदत्तस्य चोभयोः। श्रुत्वा तु निनदं योधाः शकृन्मूत्रं प्रसुस्रुवुः॥
target: Having heard the loud sound of the conchs of those two heroes, the soldiers passed urine and excrete.

source: तत्र ते न्यवसन् राजन् यज्ञसेनेन पूजिताः। प्रत्याश्वस्तस्ततो राजा सह पुत्रैरुवाच तम्॥
target: O king, they continued to reside there, treated by Yajnasena (Drupada) with every respect. The king (Drupada) with his sons assured by all that had happened, thus spoke (to Yudhishthira).

source: महासुरे हतः शक्र नमुचिर्दारुणस्त्वया। शम्बरच बलश्चैव तथोभौ घोरविक्रमौ॥
target: 0 Shakra, the great Asura, Namuchi of great power has been slain by you; so are Shambara and Bala, both of great prowess.

source: तस्माद् विनिमयं कृत्वा कुण्डले वर्म चोत्तमम्। हरस्व शक्र कामं मे न दद्यामहमन्यथा॥
target: Therefore, O Shakra, take my ear-rings and excellent armour in exchange (for boons to be conferred on me by you). Else I will in no way, give (them to you).

source: सिंहार्दितानामिव कुञ्जराणां निशाचराणां सह कुञ्जराणाम्। रवाश्च वेगाश्च समं बभूवुः पुराणसिंहेन विमर्दितानाम्॥
target: Even like (the roars and the vehemence) displayed by elephants on being attacked by lions, the roars, and the vehemence of the nightrangers and their elephants, sore assailed by the Primaeval Lion,* were equal. *Vişnu as a man-lion had formerly taken the conceit out of Hiranyakasipu the Asura king-and slain him, to rid his devotee Prahlada of his mortal foc in the from of a father.

source: अवमानस्तथा मोहः प्रमादः स्वप्नतन्द्रिता। कथंचिदभिवर्तन्ते विविधास्तामसा गुणाः॥
target: Disgrace, delusion, error, slcep and stupefaction, that befall one through excess of ill-luck, are various properties of the state of Jgnorance.

source: ततः स रथमास्थाय दुतमश्वानचोदयत्॥ संवाहयितवांश्चापि राजदारान् पुरं प्रति।
target: Getting upon his own car, he urged on his horse. He then looked after the departure of the ladies of the royal seraglio for the city.

source: सवृक्षौषधिरत्नेयं सहसत्त्ववनाकरा॥ तानिदानीं च पश्यामि यैर्भुक्तेयं पुरा मही।
target: I do not see those kings now that had formerly enjoyed this Earth with her trees, plants, gems, living creatures, waters and mines.

source: तद् युद्धमभवद् घोरं देवानां दानवैरिव। जयमाकाङ्क्षतां संख्ये यशश्च सुमहाद्भुतम्॥
target: Then a fierce and wonderful encounter, like that between the celestial and the Asuras, ensued between those two hosts each desirous of winning victory and great fame in battle.

source: एवमुक्तस्तु तैः सर्वैर्मूषिकैः स विशाम्पते। प्रत्युवाच ततः सर्वान् मूषिकान् मूषिकान्तकृत्॥
target: Being thus spoken to by all those mice, O lord of the universe, that destroyer of mice then spoke in reply to those mice.

source: भीष्म उवाच ततोऽचिरेण कालेन तुलाधारः स एव च। दिवं गत्वा महाप्राज्ञौ विहरेतां यथासुखम्॥ स्वं स्वं स्थानमुपागम्य स्वकर्मफलनिर्जितम्। एवं बहुविधार्थं च तुलाधारेण भाषितम्॥
target: Bhishma said After a short time Tuladhara and Jajali, both of whom had been gifted with great wisdom, ascended to heaven and played there in great happiness, having reached their respective places won by their respective deeds. Tuladhara had spoken many truths of this sort.

source: तस्मात्पुत्रेण या तेऽसौ प्रतिमा कारिताऽऽयसी। भीमस्य सेयं कौरव्य तवैवोपहता मया।॥
target: Therefore that iron statue of Bhima, which had been made by your son, had been kept ready for you.

source: ततः शक्ति महाराज स्वर्णघण्टां दुरासदाम्। प्राहिणोत् तव पौत्राय घोरामग्निशिखामिव॥
target: Thereupon, O great king, he (Chitra) threw at your grandson the shaft, called Shakti, which was decked with golden bells and which, again, was most irresistible and dreadful and which also, was like the flame of fire.

source: यं यमेषोऽतिसंक्रुद्धः संग्रामे निपतिष्यति। वृक्षं गरुत्मान् वेगेन विनिहत्य तमेष्यति॥
target: On whom he will fall enraged in battle he will over-throw him like a tree by the velocity of Garuda.

source: प्रणम्य रामस्तान् वृद्धांस्तृतीयायां ददर्श सः। स्त्रियो बालाश्च वृद्धाश्च द्वाररक्षणतत्पराः॥
target: Having bowed down to them, Rāma saw in the third apartment, women, boys, and old men, all engaged in watching the gate.

source: भयं मे वै जायते साध्वसं च दृष्ट्वा कृष्णावेकरथे समेतौ॥ अतीव पार्थो युधि कार्मुकिभ्यो नारायणश्चाप्रति चक्रयुद्धे। एवंविधौ पाण्डववासुदेवौ चलेत् स्वदेशाद्धिमवान् न कृष्णौ॥
target: Beholding the two Krishnas in one chariot. I am at once led by misgivings and courage. Partha is the best of all archers and Narayana with his discus is invincible, even it may be possible for one to shake off the mountain Himalaya from its place, but never can this son of Pandu and Vasudeva be shaken.

source: तेऽभिवाद्य महात्मानं तं मुनि नियतव्रतम्। तस्थुः सर्वे स तु मुनिस्तेषां पूजामथाहरत्॥
target: And bowing down to that high-souled sage constantly engaged in austerities they remained standing there and the Muni 10O busied himself to welcome them.

source: स भीमं शरधाराभिस्ताडयामास पार्थिवः। पर्वतं वारिधारभिस्तापान्ते जलदो यथा॥
target: That ruler of men afflicted Bhima with an arrows down-pour, like clouds afflicting the mountains with a down-pour of rain at the end of the summer.

source: तेनैवमाज्ञाय यथावदर्थमेकोदयं सम्प्रतिपद्य विप्राः। धर्मं चरन्तः सकलं यथावत् कानन्ति लोकागममप्रमत्ताः॥
target: Having duly heard that these are capable of conferring the summum bonum, and also come to the same conclusion by reasoning, Vipras, adequately and competely observing morality with the utmost care, are eagerly desirous of attaining those regions.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच तस्मिन् नगेन्द्रे वसतां तु तेषां महात्मनां सद्बतमास्थितानाम्। रतिः प्रमोदश्च बभूव तेषामाकाङ्क्षतां दर्शनमर्जुनस्य॥
target: Vaishampayana said : Those noble-minded (Pandavas), the observers of pious vows, desirous of beholding Arjuna dwelling in that best of mountains, became passionately attached (to it) and got themselves amused.

source: माङ्गल्यशब्दाशकुना वदन्ति हंसाः क्रौञ्चा: शतपत्राश्च चाषा:। हृष्टा योधाः सत्त्ववन्तो भवन्ति जयस्यैतद् भाविनो रूपमाहुः॥
target: If the birds, swans, cranes, Shatapatras and Chashas utter auspicious cries, and all the ablebodied warriors become cheerful, these are considered as marks of future success.

source: तथा दुपदपुत्राणां सर्वेषां भरतर्षभ। पाण्डवानां च सर्वेषां कुन्त्या युक्तानि यानि च॥
target: O best of the Bharata race, let proper presents be given to all the sons of Drupada and all the Pandavas with (their mother) Kunti.

source: दुपदस्य तथा पुत्रा दुपदश्च महासवित्॥ येषामर्थाय संयत्तो मत्स्यराजः सहानुजः।
target: And the sons of Drupada and Drupada himself skilled in great weapons and the king of Matsya together with his younger brothers are exerting their utmost on their behalf.

source: ततः सुखासीनमृर्षि वाग्यतौ संववाहतुः। न च पर्याप्तमित्याह भार्गवः सुमहातपाः॥
target: While the Rishi was seated at his ease, the king and the queen, silently, continued to rub him. Gifted with great ascetic merit, the son of Bhrigu did not once utter the word Sufficient.

source: दीपालोकप्रदानेन चक्षुष्मान् भवते नरः। प्रेक्षणीयप्रदानेन स्मृति मेधां च विन्दति।॥
target: By presenting lights at places which are dark and frequented by men, one acquires a good eyesight. By giving away good and beautiful objects, one acquires a good memory and understanding.

source: एवमुक्तस्ततः कृष्णः प्रत्युवाच वृकोदरम्। त्वरयन् पुरुषव्याघ्रो जरासंधवधेप्सया॥ यत् ते दैवं परं सत्त्वं यच्च ते मातरिश्वनः। बलं भीम जरासंधे दर्शयाशु तदद्य नः॥
target: Having been thus addressed, Krishna, that best of men, with the desire of seeing soon an end of Jarasandha, thus replied to Vrikodara (Bhima), “O Bhima, the strength that you have derived from the celestials, the might that you have obtained from Maruta, display them today towards Jarasandha."

source: क्षिप्रं प्रहर निःशङ्कं स्थिरां कीर्तिमवाप्नुहि। ततस्त्वां ज्ञातविक्रान्तं नाशयिष्यामि वानर॥
target: Strike you swift maugre fear; and acquire lasting renown. And, O monkey, having (at first) taken the measure of your might, will I finish you.

source: स त रत्नाकरवतीं सद्वीपां सागराम्बराम्। शशास पृथिवीं सर्वां हैहयः सत्यविक्रमः॥
target: Of unbaffled prowess, that king of the Haihaya race of Kshatriyas governed the whole Earth begirt by seas, together with all her islands and all her precious mines of gold and gems.

source: सर्वेषां नः प्रभुश्चैव भविष्यसि महाबल। अथाब्रवीद्दशग्रीवो मातामहमुपस्थितम्॥
target: O you endowed with prodigious strength, you shall be the lord of all. Then the Ten-necked one addressed his maternal grand-father, who was present.

source: प्रकृत्या सर्गधर्मिण्या तथा त्रिगुणधर्मया। विपरीतमतो विद्यात् क्षेत्रज्ञस्य स्वलक्षणम्॥
target: Prakriti is endued with the three qualities. It is also engaged in creation. The true attributes of Kshetrajna (Purusha or the Soul) are different.

source: निविष्टांस्तान् निशम्याथ समुद्रान्ते स योगवित्। जगामामन्त्र्य तान् वीरानुद्धवोऽर्थविशारदः॥
target: Hearing that they had taken up their abode on the sea-coast, Uddhava, the wisest of men, who was, besides, well-versed in Yoga, went there and to their leave (for departing).

source: न जातु ताञ्छत्रुरन्यः सहेत येषां स स्यादग्रणीवृष्णिसिंहः। प्रवेपते मे हृदयं भयेन श्रुत्वा कृष्णावेकरथे समेतौ॥
target: No enemy whatever can withstand them whose leader is that best of the Vrishnis. My heart trembles with fear at hearing that the, two Krishna's are united together on one the same chariot.

source: ततोऽहं तत्र रामाय पित्रा सत्याभिसंधिना। उद्यता दातुमुद्यम्य जलभाजनमुत्तमम्॥
target: Then raising an excellent vessel of water, my truthful father prepared to bestow me on Rāghava.

source: क्षुत्पिपासापरिश्रान्ता विदेशस्था विचेतसः। ऊचुः प्रणम्य सम्भ्रान्ताः पार्थ किं करवाम ते॥
target: Exhausted with hunger and thrust, come in a foreign country, beside themselves with fear, and bewildered, they bowed down to the son of Pritha and said "We are your slaves." (At which Arjuna said):

source: सर्वत्र ब्राह्मणा सन्ति सन्ति सर्वत्र क्षत्रियाः। वैश्याः शूद्रास्तथा कर्ण स्त्रियः साध्व्यश्च सुव्रताः॥
target: In every country, O Karma, there are Brahmanas, the Kshatriyas, the Vaishyas, the Sudras and the chaste women observant of good vows.

source: यथार्ह पूजितास्तेन राज्ञा च पृथिवीश्वराः। मुदिताः प्रययुर्देशान् प्रणम्य मुनिपुङ्गवम्॥
target: And the lords of the earth, having been received suitably by the king, with glad hearts set out for their own countries, saluting that foremost of ascetics (Rsyaśặnga).

source: यद् दुरापं भवेत् किंचित् तत्सर्वं तपसो भवेत्। ऐश्वर्यमृषयः प्राप्तास्तपसैव न संशयः॥
target: Whatever things there are which seem to be unattainable are sure to be acquired by penance. forsooth, the Rishis acquired their sixfold divine attributes through penance.

source: असंवासाः प्रजायन्ते म्लेच्छाश्चापि न संशयः। नराः पापसमाचारा लोभमोहसमन्विताः॥
target: Those sinful men who yield to the influence of cupidity and stupefaction, are surely born as Mlechchhas who are uriworthy of being associated with.

source: एवं मृत्युर्देवसृष्टा प्रजानां प्राप्ते काले संहरन्ती यथावत्। तस्याश्चैव व्याधयस्तेऽश्रुपाताः प्राप्ते काले संहरन्तीह जन्तून्॥
target: It was thus, O king, that Death was created by the Self-Create and it is in this way that she kills duly all living creatures when their time comes. the tears she had shed became diseases, which when their last hours come, snatch away all beings gifted with life.

source: तथैव कृतवर्मा च कृपः शल्यश्च मारिष। विद्ध्वा नाकम्पयत् कार्ष्णि मैनाकमिव पर्वतम्॥
target: O sire, Kritavarmana, Kripa and Shalya, piercing Arjuna's son, all failed to make him, waver for he stood firm like the Mainaka mountain.

source: वानराश्चैव रक्षःसु गिरिवृक्षान्महाशिलाः। प्रवीराः पातयामासुर्मत्तवारणसंनिभाः॥
target: The monkeys, pre-eminently valiant, and resembling mad elephants kept showering over the Raksasa mountain-trees and mighty rocks.

source: पार्थे तस्मिन् हते चैव युध्यते नूनमग्रणीः॥ सहायो नास्य वै कश्चित् तेन विन्दामि कश्मलम्। तस्मिन् कृष्णे हते नूनं युध्यते युद्धकोविदः॥ न हि मे शुध्यते भावस्तयोरेव परंतप।
target: Upon the slaughter to your brother, surely Krishna conversant with all modes of warfare, is battling with the Kurus. Bring me the intelligence of that foremost of men and of that mighty car-warrior of the Vrishni race. Who has ere now followed in the track of your brother that mighty car-warrior. I am also overwhelmed with distress on account of this last-mentioned mighty arm-hered.

source: केसरस्याथ मोदाकी परेण तु महापुमान्॥ परिवार्य तु कौरव्य दैर्ध्य ह्रस्वत्वमेव च। जम्बूद्वीपेन संख्यातस्तस्य मध्ये महाद्रुमः॥ शाको नाम महाराज प्रजा तस्य सदानुगा।
target: That of Kesara is called Modaki and that of the next mountain is called Mahapuman. In the midst of that island is a large tree called Shaka. In height and breadth that tree is equal to that of the Jambu tree in Jambudvipa. The people always worship that tree.

source: वानराणां हि सा तीर्णा वाहिनी नलसेतुना। तीरे निविविशे राज्ञा बहुमूलफलोदके।॥
target: On the monkey-host having crossed by the bridge of Nala, the king stationed it on the shore abounding in fruits, roots, and water.

source: पूपान् पुनर्वसौ दत्त्वा तथैवान्नानि शोभने। यशस्वी रूपसम्पन्नो बह्वनो जायते कुले॥
target: By making gifts, O beautiful lady, of cakes and other food under the constellation Punarvasu, one gets personal beauty and great fame and takes birth in his next life in a family in which there is profuse food.

source: मयूरसदृशानन्यानुत्तरानपरानपि। जवनानाशुगांश्चैव करार्थं समुपानयत्॥
target: And some other horses also which had the colour of peacocks, these horses were all born in northern and other countries, and possessed great speed.

source: ततः प्रहस्य नकुलश्चतुर्भिश्चतुरो रणे॥ जघान निशितैर्बाणैः सत्यसेनस्य वाजिनः।
target: Then Nakula, laughing, struck the four horses of Satyasena with four whetted and keen arrows in that encounter.

source: चेरतुश्च चिरं चित्रं मण्डलं सव्यदक्षिणम्। बाणवेगात्समुत्क्षिप्तावन्योन्यमपराजितौ॥ तयोर्भूतानि वित्रेसुर्युगपत्संप्रयुध्यतोः। रौद्रयोः सायकमुचोर्यमान्तकनिकाशयोः॥
target: And forming a circle, they passed each other by the right side. Uprooting the earth with the vehemence of their arrows, irrepressible by each other, fighting equally discharging arrows, they arrows looked dreadful like Death himself-and created terror in all creatures.

source: ते स्म सर्वे तव वचः श्रोतुकामा नरेश्वर। नान्याय्यं हि भवान् वाक्यं ब्रूयादिति मतिर्मम॥
target: All these rulers of men are desirous of hcaring your words; and I am sure you will never speak unjust words.

source: ततः प्रजग्मुः प्रशमं मरुद्गणा दिशः प्रसेदुर्विमलं नभोऽभवत्। मही चकम्पे न च मारुतो ववौ स्थिरप्रभश्चाप्यभवद्दिवाकरः॥
target: Thereupon the celestials attained their peace, the quarters were delighted, the atmosphere was clear, calm air began to prevail all over the earth, and the Sun appeared in its full rays.

source: पाण्डवाः सोमकाश्चैव ये चैषामनुयायिनः। दध्मुश्च मुदिताः शङ्खान् वीराः सागरसम्भवान्॥
target: Those heroes, the Pandavas, and the Somakas, and those that followed them, blew their sea-born conchs in great delight.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच स गन्धर्ववचः श्रुत्वा तत् तदा भरतर्षभ। अर्जुनः परया भक्त्या पूर्णचन्द्र इवाबभौ॥
target: Vaishampayana said : Hearing these words of the Gandharva, that best of the Bharata race, Arjuna, was filled with devotion (towards him) and he stood as manifest as the full moon.

source: स हयः पृथिवीं राजन् प्रदक्षिणमवर्तत। ससारोत्तरतः पूर्वं तन्निबोध महीपते॥
target: The horse, O king, travelled over the whole Earth. Know, O monarch, that from the north it turned towards the East.

source: तान् प्रहस्य महाबाहुः पुनरेव व्यवस्थितान्। ततः प्रोवाच कौन्तेयो मुमूर्षुश्लक्ष्णया गिरा।
target: The mighty-armed hero, laughing at his enemies, who had once more rallied but who were on the point of death, addressed them in these soft words.

source: आजेन मासान्ग्रीयन्ते पञ्चैव पितरो नृप। वाराहेण तु षण्मासान् सप्त वै शाकुलेन तु॥
target: With the flesh of the goat, o king, they remain pleased for five months, with becon for six months, and with the flesh of birds for seven.

source: भीष्म उवाच इत्येतानि स वाक्यानि हेतुमन्त्यर्थवन्ति च। श्रुत्वा नाधिजगौ राजा किञ्चिउदन्यदतः परम्॥
target: Bhishma said Hearing these words fraught with excellent sense and with reason, king Janaka could not replay thereto.

source: यत् तु कर्णमुपाश्रित्य शकुनिं चापि सौबलम्। अमर्त्य इव सम्मोहात् त्वमात्मानं न बुद्धवान्॥
target: Relying upon Karna as also upon Shakuni the son of Şubala, you considered yourself immortal and could not understand your own self.

source: अन्यामन्यां धनावस्थां प्राप्य वैशेषिकी नराः॥ असंतुष्टाः प्रमुह्यनित संतोष यान्ति पण्डिताः। प्रज्ञया मानसं दुःखं हन्याच्छरीरमौषधैः। एतद् विज्ञानसामर्थ्यं न बालैः समतामियात्॥
target: The indulgence of grief in the sure means of one's losing one's objects. Through it, one deviates from the three great ends of life. They, who are not contented are stupefied by the vicissitudes of fortune. The wise, are, on the other hand, unaffected by such changes. One should destroy mental grief by wisdom, as physical grief should be destroyed by medicine. Wisdom has this power. They, however, that are foolish, can never acquire equanimity of mind.

source: अभिशापादहं घोरां प्रविष्टो राक्षसी तनुम्। तुम्बुरुर्नाम गन्धर्वः शप्तो वैश्रवणेन हि ॥
target: By virtue of a curse, I entered this dreadful Räkşasi form, I a Gandharva, having been cursed by Vaisravaņa.

source: हर्षः कामश्च दर्पश्च धर्मः क्रोधः शमो दमः। अर्थादेतानि सर्वाणि प्रवर्तन्ते नराधिप॥
target: O lord of men, cheerfulness, and desire, and pride, and piety, and anger, and self-restraint, and self-control, all these come from wealth.

source: सा समुत्सृज्य तं दुःखाद् दीप्तवैश्वाना, नम्। दर्शयामास चाग्निस्तं तदा गङ्गां भृगूद्वह॥ पप्रच्छ सरितां श्रेष्ठां कच्चिद् गर्भः सुखोदयः। कीदृग्वर्णोऽपि वा देवि कीदृग्रूपश्च दृश्यते। तेजसा केन वा युक्तः सर्वमेतद् ब्रवीहि मे॥
target: After she had cast it off, through sheer distress, that burning seed having the splendour of fire, O perpetuator of Bhrigu's race, Agni saw her, and asked that foremost of rivers, Is it all right with the foetus you have cast off? Of what complexion has it been, O goddess? Of what form does it look? With what energy does it seem to be gifted? Do you tell me all about it.

source: अन्धः स्यादन्धवेलायां जडः स्यादपि वा बुधः। परिहारेण तद् ब्रूयाद् यस्तेषां स्याद् व्यतिक्रमः॥
target: The eldest brother should at times not notice the acts of his younger brothers, and though possessed of wisdom should at times act as if he does not understand their acts. If the younger brothers be guilty of any sin, the eldest brother should correct them by indirect ways and means.

source: दाक्ष्यं घमर्ष: शौर्यं च शीघ्रत्वमिति तेजसः। गुणाः क्रोधाभिभूतेन न शक्याः प्राप्तुमञ्जसा॥
target: The man that is possessed by anger does not easily acquire generosity, dignity, bravery, skill and other accomplishments of a real man of character.

source: ततः सोमाश्रमं गत्वा देवगन्धर्वसेवितम्। कालं नाम महासानुं पर्वतं तं गमिष्यथ॥
target: Then, coming upon the hermitage of Soma, frequented by gods and Gandharvas, do you repair to the mountain called kāla possessing spacious plateaus,

source: द्रौणिं संछादयामासुर्घनौघा इव भास्करम्। तथैव द्रौणिनिर्मुक्तैर्भीमः संनतपर्वभिः॥ अवाकीर्यत स क्षिप्रं शरैः शतसहस्रशः। स च्छाद्यमानः समरे द्रौणिना रणशालिना॥
target: Covered Drona's son like masses of clouds covering the Sun, Similarly Bhima also was quickly covered over with hundreds and thousands of arrows of depressed knots, shot by Drona's son. Covered in battle by Drona's son accomplished in battle.

source: पन्नगासुरगन्धर्वदेवदानवराक्षसैः॥ अशक्यस्तव वैदेहि भर्ता जेतुं न संशयः।
target: O Vaidehi, celestials, Dānavas, Gandharabas, Raksasas, Asuras, or Pannagas, there is none who can defeat your husband. There is not the least doubt in this.

source: तैस्ते परिवृता वीराः शोभमाना महाबलाः। नगरं हास्तिनपुरं शनैः प्रविविशुस्तदा॥ कौतूहलेन नगरं दीप्यमानमिवाभवत्। तत्र ते पुरुषव्याघ्राः शोकदुःखविनाशनाः॥ तत उच्चावचा वाचः पौरैः प्रियचिकीर्षुभिः। उदीरिता अशृण्वंस्ते पाण्डवा हृदयंगमाः॥
target: Surrounded by those (illustrious men), those mighty heroes (the Pandavas), their splendour (many times) increased, slowly entered the city of Hastinapur. The city became radiant with the curious sight-seers of the city. Those foremost of men, the dispelled of grief and sorrow. The Pandavas, dear to the hearts of the people, heard as they proceeded, various exclamations which the citizens, ever desirous of obeying the wishes of those princes, loudly uttered.

source: न चैनं संयुगे कश्चित् समर्थः प्रतिवीक्षितुम्। न चैनमर्जुनो जातु प्रतियुध्येत धर्मवित्॥
target: None can now even look at him in battle. Knowing the rules of fair combat even Arjuna will not now fight with him." (Even thus did they talk with each other).

source: रुधिरेणावसिक्ताङ्गं प्रकीर्णाजिनवाससम्। शयानं भुवि निःसंज्ञं धर्मराजवशं गतम्॥ अथाहमेकस्तं देशं नीत्वा तौ भृशदुःखितौ। अस्पर्शयमहं पुत्रं तं मुनि सह भार्यया॥
target: Thereupon I alone taking them exceedingly disconsolate to the spot, made the ascetic and his wife touch their son.

source: स निमित्त विनष्टे तु ममार सहसा शिशुः। तं मृतं पुत्रमादाय विललाप ततः पिता।॥
target: When the instrumental cause of his life was destroyed, the child (Medhavi) suddenly died. Thereupon taking up his dead son the father began to lament.

source: ओङ्कारेण यथान्यायं सम्यगुच्चारितेन ह। येन यत् पूर्वमभ्यस्तं तत् सर्वं समुपस्थितम्॥
target: Pronounced distinctly and with emphasis the word Om. At this, the ascetics again recollected all that they had learnt before.

source: ततो दैत्या विनिष्पेतुः शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः। प्रदीप्तात् पर्वतश्रेष्ठाद् विचित्राभरणस्रजः॥ तान् निजघ्नुरतिक्रम्य कुमारानुचरा मृघे। स चैव भगवान् क्रुद्धो दैत्येन्द्रस्य सुतं तदा॥
target: The Daityas then, by hundreds and thousands, came out of that burning mountain, all bedecked with beautiful ornaments and garlands. The followers of Kumara, overpowering them in battle, killed them all, the worshipful Skanda worked up with ire, killed the son of the Daitya chief (Vali) along with his younger brother as Indra has killed Vritra formerly.

source: पक्षवातप्रणुन्नानां वृक्षाणामनुगामिनाम्। प्रस्थितानामिव समं पश्यामीह गतिं खग॥
target: Your course, O wanderer in the sky, I see followed by trees which have been uprooted by the wind caused by the flapping of your wings.

source: सा स्त्री प्रोवाच भगवन् द्रक्ष्यसे देशकालतः। वस तावन्महाभाग कृतकृत्यो भविष्यसि॥
target: That lady then said in return illustrious one you will all see according to time and place. Do you only live here (for sometime), O highly blessed one, and I shall consider myself sufficiently rewarded!

source: प्रभिन्नकरटौ मत्तौ भूत्वा कुञ्जररूपिणौ। संलीनमपि दुर्गेषु निन्यतुर्यमसादनम्॥
target: They assumed the forms of maddened elephants with temples rent (from excess of juice) and they slaughtered the Rishis hidden in mountain caves.

source: यथा शरदि मेघानां सिञ्चतामपि गर्जताम्। न भवत्यम्बुसंक्लेदस्तथानार्येषु सौहृदम्॥
target: As the autumnal clouds, albeit muttering, do not pour forth water, so is the friendship with unworthy persons.

source: रथ एष महाराज मतो मे राजसत्तम। त्वदर्थं त्यक्ष्यते प्राणान् सहसैन्यो महारणे॥
target: The best among kings is Ratha in my opinion, O great king, and for your sake he will sacrifice his life a along his army in this greet battle.

source: वयोरूपविलासिन्यो लभते नात्र संशयः। यस्तु संवत्सरं भुङ्क्ते नवमे नवमेऽहनि॥ सदा द्वादशमासान् वै जुह्वानो जातवेदसम्। अश्वमेधसहस्रस्य फलं प्राप्नोत्यनुत्तमम्॥
target: He who fasts for eight days and takes only one meal on every ninth day for one full year, and pours libations on the sacred fire every day, wine the great merits of a thousand Horse sacrifices. The car he rides in Heaven is beautiful like a lotus.

source: न तु नाशोऽस्ति पापस्य यस्त्वयोपचितः पुरा। शूद्रेणार्थप्रधानेन नृशंसेनाततायिना॥
target: The sin you had committed in a pristine life, has not yet been dissipated that sin viz., which was acquired by you while you were a Shudra covetous of riches and cruel in conduct and hostile to the Brahmanas.

source: अयं च शङ्खप्रवरो येन जेतासि दानवान्। अनेन विजिता लोकाः शक्रेणापि महात्मना।1८४॥
target: Here is that excellent conch by which you will conquer the Danavas. By (the help of) it, the high-souled Sakra conquered the worlds.

source: अथ समरपरिश्रमं निहन्तुं समरमुखेष्वजितस्य लक्ष्मणस्य। प्रियहितमुपपादयन्महात्मा समरमुपेत्य विभीषणोऽवतस्थे॥
target: Then to remove (Laksmana's) fatigue from fight, the high-souled Vibhisana, working the weal of Laksmaņa staying in front of the field, came forward in the encounter and took up his post.

source: लोकयात्राश्रयश्चैव शब्दो वेदाश्रयः कृतः। शान्त्यर्थं मनसस्तात नैतद् वृद्धानुशासनम्॥
target: The declarations have the Vedas for their authority have been made for guiding the conduct of men in his world, and for tranquillizing the minds of men. These, O child, cannot represent the saying of truly wise men.

source: अश्वत्थामन् पुनः शीघ्रमस्त्रमेतत् प्रयोजय। अवस्थिता हि पञ्चालाः पुनरेते जयैषिणः॥
target: O Ashvatthaman, once more discharged that weapon quickly, for the Panchalas, desirous of victory, have again rallied.

source: कारणं प्राप्य तु नरा: सर्व एव महाभुजाः। शूरा वा कातरा वापि भवन्ति कुरुपुङ्गव॥
target: All men of long arms become heroes or cowards, O foremost among the Kurus, according to the cause for which they fight.

source: तस्माद् बलं च कोषश्च नीतिश्चापि विधीयताम्। यथा कालोदये प्राप्ते सम्यक् तैः संदधामहे॥
target: Therefore (replenish) your treasury and (increase) your forces; and take recourse to a sound policy to conclude an advantageous treaty with them, when the proper time of their return comes.

source: दुर्योधन उवाच यदर्थं राज्यमिच्छामि कुरूणां कुरुनन्दन। त इमे निहताः सर्वे भ्रातरो मे जनेश्वर॥
target: Duryodhana said The Kurus, O son of Kuru's race, for whose sake I desired sovereignty, those brothers of mine, O king, all lie dead on the field.

source: बलैः समग्रैर्यदि मां हत्वा रावणमाहवे। विजयी स्वपुरी रामो नयेत् तत्स्याद् यशस्करम् ॥
target: But if Rāma, obtaining victory, can take me hence to his own city, it shall redound to his glory.

source: श्रुतं भवद्भिर्यत् प्रोक्तं भगवद्भ्यां जगद्धितम्। तत्तथा नान्यथा तद्धि तिष्ठध्वं विगतज्वराः॥
target: You hear what the two Gods say for the good of the whole world and it must surely be so and no otherwise; so rest assured.

source: भृशं चित्रमयुध्येतामलम्बुषघटोत्कचौ। परिघैश्च गदाभिश्च प्रासमुद्गरपट्टिशैः॥ मुसलैः पर्वताग्रैश्च तावन्योन्यं विजनतुः।
target: They thus exhibited a hundred different kinds of illusions, desirous of compassing each other's destruction. Indeed Alambusha and Ghatotkacha fought most wonderfully, with bludgeons and maces and lances and mallets and battle axes and clubs and crests of mountains, they then struck each other.

source: शैलाम्बुदनिकाशानां लङ्कामलयसानुषु। नर्दतां कपिमुख्यानां नचिराच्छ्रोष्यसे स्वनम्॥
target: You shall soon bear the roaring of the leading monkeys on the summit of mount Malaya, resembling the muttering of the clouds.

source: एवमेतद् भवेद् राजन् यदि राजा न बालिशः। अस्माकं दीर्घसूत्रः स्याद् भवान्धर्मपरायणः॥
target: O monarch, such may happen, if our king be not foolish or procrastinating. Indeed you are, O king, righteous.

source: शुचिस्तु पृथिवीपालो लोकचित्तग्रहे रतः। न पतत्यरिभिर्ग्रस्तः पतितश्चावतिष्ठते॥
target: That king, however, who is righteous and who is ever engaged in attracting the hearts of his people, is never ruined when attacked by foes. If defeated, he soon regains his position.

source: यक्षराक्षसगन्धर्वास्तथैव च पतत्रिणः। खेचराणि च भूतानि सर्वाण्येवावतस्थिरे॥
target: The Yakshas, the Rakshasas, the Gandharvas, the feathery creatures, the skyranging creatures-all these beings appeared (on the scene).

source: भीष्म उवाच वनस्पतीन् भक्ष्यफलान्न च्छिन्द्युर्विषये तव। ब्राह्मणानां मूलफलं धर्म्यमाहुर्मनीषिणः॥
target: Bhishma said “Let not fruit growing trees be cut down in your dominions. Fruits and roots are the property of the Brahmanas. The sages have declared this as an injunction of religion.

source: द्रोणं कर्णं कृपं शल्यं द्रौणिं भोजं बृहद्बलम्। दुर्योधनं सौमदत्तिं शकुनि च महाबलम्॥ नानानृपान् नृपसुतान् सैन्यानि विविधानि च। अलातचक्रवत् सर्वांश्चरन् बाणैः समार्पयत्॥
target: Roving like a circle of fire, he then struck his arrows of Drona, Karna, Kripa, Shalya, Drona's son, Bhoja, Brihadbala, Duryodhana, Somadatta's son, the valiant Shakuni and various other kings and princes and diverse kind of troops.

source: एकादशचमूभर्ता यज्ञ पुत्रो ममानघ॥
target: Oh, fie, on man, who has such an end! My son, O sinless one, had been the master of eleven hosts of troops!

source: वातरेणुसवर्णां तु सवत्सां कांस्यदोहनाम्। प्रदाय वस्त्रसंवीतां वायुलोके महीयते॥
target: By giving away a dustcoloured cow, with a calf and a vessel of white brass for malking her, and covered with a piece of cloth, one : acquires great honours in the region of the WindGod.

source: गविष्ठस्तु महातेजा यः प्रख्यातो महासुरः। दुमसेन इति ख्यातः पृथिव्यां सोऽभवन्नृपः॥
target: That greatly powerful Asura, known as Gavishtha, became king Drumasena on earth.

source: इन्द्रसेनेन सहित इन्द्रप्रस्थमगात् तदा। व्यतीत्य विविधान् देशांस्त्वरावान् क्षिप्रवाहनः॥
target: Passing quickly through various countries on (the car yoked with his swift horses, he arrived at Indraprastha with Indrasena.

source: न शक्नुवन्ति ते भोक्तुं पश्य धर्मभृतां वर। अपरे बाहुबलिन: क्लिश्यन्ते बहवो जनाः॥
target: Behold, O foremost of all virtuous men, he cannot enjoy. O those who possess great strength of arms suffer from misery.

source: रूपं गन्धो रसः स्पर्शः शब्दश्चैवाथ तद्गुणाः। इन्द्रियैरुपलभ्यन्ते पञ्चधा पञ्च पञ्चभिः॥
target: Form, scent, taste, touch, and sound, are the five properties that are perceived by the five senses in five different ways.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततः स पाण्डवो विप्रं मार्कण्डेयमुवाच ह। कथयस्वेति चरितं मनोवैवस्वतस्य च॥शा
target: Vaishampayana said: Then that son of Pandu (Yudhishthira) spoke thus to the Brahmana Markandeya, “narrate (to me) the history of Vaivasvata Manu.”

source: ततः सुरगणाः सर्वे पितामहपुरोगमाः॥ विश्वामित्रं महात्मानं वाक्यं मधुरमब्रुवन्।
target: Even should he desires the dominion of the celestial regions, do you grant him his wish.

source: न भक्षयति यो मांसं न च हन्यान्न घातयेत्। तन्मित्रं सर्वभूतानां मनुः स्वायम्भुवोऽब्रवीत्॥
target: The self-create Manu has said that man who does not eat meat, or who does not kill living creatures, or who does not cause them to be killed, is a friend of all creatures.

source: चक्रं व्यसृजदत्युग्रं तेषां नाशाय केशवः। तेनार्ता जातयः क्षुद्राः सदानवनिशाचराः॥
target: The dwellers of that forest, including the Danavas and the Rakshasas, were struck by that weapon; and being cut into hundred of pieces, they fill into the mouth of Agni (fire).

source: ते सर्वे मामभिप्रेक्ष्य तूर्णमश्वाननोदयन्। उपायाय तु मामूचुर्दिष्ट्या जीवसि संजय॥
target: Seeing me, they all urged their horses to greater speed and coming up to me, said-By good luck, O Sanjaya, you are still alive.

source: स्वर्णकुम्भनिभौ पीनौ शुभौ भीरु निरन्तरौ। कस्योरस्थलसंस्पर्श दास्यतस्ते कुचाविमौ ॥
target: Whose breast, O fare damsel, your rising breast beautiful like two golden pots closely placed, shall touch?

source: श्चरन्तमुग्रं प्रतिबाधनाय॥ प्रयच्छान्यस्मै गाण्डिवमेदद्य त्वत्तो योऽस्त्रैरभ्यधिको वा नरेन्द्रः।
target: If you are unable to resist the fearful Karna in his march on the field today, then do make over this your Gandiva to any other king who is your superior in the use of weapons.

source: विषये वा पुरे वा ते यदा पापं करोम्यहम्। न च त्वामवजानेऽहं कस्मात्त्वं हंस्यकिल्विषम्॥ फलमूलाशनं नित्यं वानरं वनगोचरम्। मामिहाप्रतियुध्यन्तमन्येन च समागतम्॥ त्वं नराधिपतेः पुत्रः प्रतीतः प्रियदर्शनः। लिङ्गमप्यस्ति ते राजन् दृश्यते धर्मसंहितम्॥
target: I have not done you any wrong either in your kingdom or in your city. Nor have I passed by you. Why have you then destroyed me, who am a monkey ranging always in the woods, living on fruits and roots and who have come here to fight with another person? It appears that you are of a kingly father and of a graceful countenance. And, O king, there are marks of piety on your person.

source: निमित्तानि च धन्यानि पाण्डवस्य शशंसिरे॥ विनाशमरिसैन्यानां कर्णस्य च वधं प्रति।
target: Besides these other auspicious auguries presaged the extinction of the hostile host and the doom of Karna.

source: हतमिन्द्रजितं दृष्ट्वा शयनां च रणक्षितौ। राक्षसानां सहस्रेषु न कश्चित्प्रत्यदृश्यत॥
target: Seeing Indrajit slain and lying down on the field of battle, thousands of Raksasas fled away.

source: कुमारश्च यथोत्पन्नो यथा चाग्नेः सुतोऽभवत्। यथा रुद्राच्च सम्भूतो गङ्गायां कृत्तिकासु च॥
target: How Kumara (Kartikeya) was born, how he came to be known as the son of Agni and how he was begotten by Rudra (Shiva) on Ganga and Krittika?

source: तस्य दौःशासनिर्विद्ध्वाचतुर्भिश्चतुरो हयान्। सूतमेकेन विव्याध दशभिश्चार्जुनात्मजम्॥
target: Thereupon the son of Drona pierced his four horses with four arrows and charioteer with one shaft and then he pierced Arjuna's son with ten arrows.

source: क्रुद्धं च शक्रं प्रसमीक्ष्य देवो जहास शक्रं च शनैरुदैक्षत। स्तेनेक्षितः स्थाणुरिवावतस्थे।॥
target: Seeing Indra angry, the youth who was none else than Mahadeva cast a glance at him and smiled. At that glance the king of the celestials was at once paralysed and stood on that spot like a statue.

source: स विनिःश्वस्य बहुशो रुदित्वा च पुनः पुनः। कुशलं चैव मां पृष्ट्वा पश्चादिदमभाषत।॥
target: Sighing heavily and frequently and weeping incessantly, he asked about my welfare; and then addressed me with these words:

source: मातरः सर्वभूतानां गावः सर्वसुखप्रदाः। वृद्धिमाकाक्षत नित्यं गावः कार्याः प्रदक्षिणाः॥
target: Kine are the mothers of all creatures. They grant every sort of happiness. The person, who seeks his own prosperity, should always make gifts of kine.

source: ततः कथायां कस्यांचित्प्राञ्जलिः प्रग्रहो नृपः। उवाच तं महात्मानमत्रेः पुत्रं तपोधनम्॥
target: During an interval Dasaratha, with folded hands and uplifted arms, said to the high-souled son of Atri-Durbāsā, having asceticism for his wealth.

source: मोदयन् सर्वभूतानि गन्धमादनसम्भवः। सर्वगन्धवहस्तत्र मारुतः सुसुखो ववौ॥
target: A pleasurable breeze was blowing there, having its origin in the Gandhamadana, gladdening all creatures and carrying sweet odours of all kinds.

source: राज्ञो नियोगाद् योद्धव्यं ब्राह्मणेन विशेषतः। वर्तता क्षत्रधर्मेण ह्येवं धर्मविदो विदुः॥
target: At the command of the king, even the Brahmana may fight, especially one who leads the life of Kshatriya. Those learned in the scriptures say this.'

source: दर्शयन् वीक्षमाणानामस्त्रमुग्रपराक्रमः। इषुभिस्तूर्णमाकाशं बहुभिश्च समावृणोत्॥
target: Showing many weapons to the spectators, that of dreadful prowess speedily enveloped the sky with many arrows.

source: दिष्ट्या द्रोणो जित: संख्ये हार्दिक्यश्च महाबलः॥५६ दिष्ट्या विकर्णिभिः कर्णो रणे नीतः पराभवम्। विमुखश्च कृतः शल्यो युवाभ्यां पुरुषर्षभौ॥
target: It was our destiny that supported and we could defeat Acarya Drona and Kritavarma in the battle. It was another support of destiny that Karna too was defeated in battle-field by virtue of your archery. O best gallants! Both of you have pressed Shalya to leave the battle-field.

source: युद्धमासीन्महाघोरं मणिमत्प्रमुखैः सह। समागमश्च पाण्डूनां यत्र वैश्रवणेन च। समागमश्चार्जुनस्य तत्रैव भ्रातृभिः सह। अवाप्य दिव्यान्यस्त्राणि गुर्वर्थं सव्यासाचिना॥
target: Headed by Manimana, he fought a great battle; the meeting of the Pandavas with Kubera. Then comes the meeting with Arjuna who had obtained many great weapons.

source: धृतराष्ट्रो ददौ राजा पुत्राणामौर्ध्वदेहिकम्। सर्वकामगुणोपेतमन्नं गाश्च धनानि च॥
target: King Dhritarashtra also distributed, for the good of his dead sons, excellent food, and kine, and immense wealth, and many beautiful and costly gems amongst the Brahmanas.

source: ततस्तमन्तःपुरनादमुत्थितं समीक्ष्य वृद्धास्तरुणाश्च मानवाः। स्त्रियश्च सर्वा रुरुदुः समन्ततः पुरं तदासीत् पुनरेव संकुलम्॥
target: Hearing the sounds of wailing arise from the inner apartment, old and young as well as females, set up lamentations all round; and the city was again filled with them.

source: धृतिमन्तो ह्रीनिषेवा धर्मात्मानो यशस्विनः। मूर्धाभिषिक्तास्ते चैनं राजानः पर्युपासते॥
target: Who have piety and modesty, who are virtuous-minded, who are renowned and on whom the grand rites of coronation have been performed, all these worship the king.

source: निवेशनं च कुप्यं व क्षेत्रं भार्या सुहज्जनः। एतान्युपहितान्याहुः सर्वत्र लभते पुमान्॥
target: Houses, precious metals, land, wife, ar.J friends,-these are spoken by the learned as the secondary sources of good. A man may obtain them everywhere.

source: तान्यनीकानि सर्वाणि विभक्तानि समन्ततः। विन्यस्ता यूथपाश्चैव यथान्यायं विभागशः॥
target: The entire force has been divided around; and the leaders have also been placed properly.

source: उशना वेद यच्छास्त्रं यच्च देवगुरुर्द्विजः। तच्च सर्वं सवैयाख्यं प्राप्तवान् कुरुसत्तमः॥
target: That foremost one among the Kurus acquired a knowledge also of that science, with its interpretations, which Ushanas and the Rishi who is the preceptor of the celestials know.

source: तपः परं कृतयुगे त्रेतायां ज्ञानमुत्तमम्। द्वापरे यज्ञमेवाहुर्दानमेकं कलौ युगे।॥
target: In the Krita, Penance is the foremost. In the Treta, Knowledge is foremost. In Dvapara, Sacrifice has been said to be the foremost. In the Kali Yuga, only gift is sanctioned.

source: शरभस्त्वथ निश्चित्य सार्थं वचनमब्रवीत्। क्षिप्रमस्मिन्नरव्याघ्र चारः प्रतिविधीयताम्॥
target: There upon followed Sarava with words fraught with high import, best of men, do you speedily despatch emissaries to sound Vibhis ana.

source: राजानं च पृथु वैन्यं मृतं शुश्रुम संजय। यमभ्यषिञ्चन् सम्भूय महारण्ये महर्षयः॥
target: We hear, O Srinjaya, that king Prithu also, the son of Vena met with death, the great Rishis, assembled together in the great forest, installed him in the sovereignty of the Earth.

source: तत्र नैवानुतप्यन्ते प्राज्ञा निश्चितनिश्चयाः। कृपणास्त्वनुतप्यन्ते जनाः सम्बन्धदर्शिनः॥
target: The wise, wise, gifted with certainty of knowledge, do not yield to grief upon seeing this. Only the foolish, erroneously supposing relationships indulge in grief on seeing such changes of habitation.

source: मातङ्गयूथानुसृतं पक्षिसंघानुनादितम्। चित्रकूटमिमं पश्य प्रवृद्धशिखरं गिरिम्॥
target: Do you behold Citrakuta frequented by mad elephants and resonant with the voice of multitudes of birds, the mountain with its towering summits.

source: अहन्यमानेषु पुनः सर्वमेव पराभवेत्। पूर्वे पूर्वतरे चैव सुशास्या ह्यभवन् जनाः॥
target: If they who transgressed those limits were not punished with death, those barriers would soon be destroyed. Men of more ancient times were capable of being governed easily.

source: इन्द्रस्तां दुःखितां दृष्ट्वा अब्रवीत् परुषं वचः। पुरा सुदुःसहं भद्रे मम दुःखं त्वया कृतम्॥
target: Indeed, though I was present, you did not invoke me with honours. I am that Indra, O you of wicked understanding! It is I with whom you sought hostilities.

source: त्वच्छोकविमुखो रामो देवि सत्येन ते शपे। रामे दुःखाभिपन्ने तु लक्ष्मणः परितप्यते॥
target: O exalted one, I swear by truth, Rāma turn away he countenance (from every work) in consequence of grief for you. And Rāma being seized with sorrow, Laksmana burns in grief.

source: उद्यन्मेघस्वनः काले कृष्णः कर्णमथाब्रवीत्। मृदु वा यदि वा तीक्ष्णं तन्ममाचक्ष्व संजय॥
target: Speaking with the roar of cloud during the rains, what Krishna told Karna, in words sharp or mind, tell me, O Sanjaya.

source: ततस्तद्वानरं सैन्यमचिन्त्यं लोमहर्षणम्। संख्यातुं नाध्यगच्छेतां तदा तौ शुकसारणौ॥
target: But Suka and Sāraṇa could not number that army of monkeys, incomprehensible and capable of making people's hair stand on end.

source: ऋत्विग्भिाह्मणैः पूर्व कन्याभिर्मन्त्रिभिस्तथा। योधैश्चैवाभ्यषिञ्चस्ते सम्प्रहृष्टैः सनैगमैः॥ सौषधिरसैश्चापि दैवतैर्नभसि स्थितैः। चतुभिर्लोकपालैश्च सर्वैर्देवैश्च संगतैः॥
target: Ministers, soldiers and the merchants all delighted. (Thereupon with the juice of Oshadhis (he was sprinkled by) the celestials stationed in the sky, the deities presiding over four quarters and all other celestials collected.

source: महता परिबहेण राजयोग्येन संवृतः। राजभिर्बहुभिः सार्धमुपायात् काम्यक च सः॥
target: Dressed in his best royal robe and accompanied by many princes he halted at the forest of Kamayaka.

source: अमृतेनावसिक्तश्च वृषदर्भो नरेश्वरः। दिव्यैश्च सुसुखैर्माल्यैरभिवृष्टः पुनः पुनः॥
target: King Vrishadarbha was bathed in a shower of nectar that was poured upon him. Garlands of celestials flowers, of sweet fragrance and touch, were also showered upon him copiously again and again.

source: ततो विनशनं गच्छेनियतो नियताशनः। गच्छत्यन्तर्हिता यत्र मेरुपृष्ठे सरस्वती।१११॥
target: Then one should go with regulated diet and subdued soul to Vinasana, where the Sarasvati, disappeared on the breast of the Meru (mountain).

source: द्वाविमौ पुरुषौ लोके क्षरश्चाक्षर एव च। क्षरः सर्वाणि भूतानि कूटस्थोऽक्षर उच्यते॥
target: There are two entities in this universe, namely the Perishable and the Imperishable. All creatures are the Perishable, and the unconcerned One is the Imperishable.

source: एवं ब्रुवाणो बीभत्सुर्वैराटिमपराजितः। समाश्वास्य मुहूर्तं तमुत्तरं भरतर्षभ॥
target: Thus speaking to Uttara, the son of Virata, Bibhatsu, never defeated in battle, excited him for the time being, O foremost of Viratas.

source: भगवन् पुत्रमिच्छामि भीष्मं प्रतिचिकीर्षया। इत्युक्तो देवदेवेन स्त्रीपुमांस्ते भविष्यति॥
target: O God, I desire a son, to revenge myself on Bhishma.” Then this was said (to him) by Mahadeva, "Your son shall be both male and female.

source: ततस्त्वध्यापयामास सरहस्यनिवर्तनम्। तदस्त्रं पाण्डवश्रेष्ठं मूर्तिमन्तमिवान्तकम्॥ उपतस्थे च तत् पार्थं यथा त्र्यक्षमुमापतिम्। प्रतिजग्राह तच्चापि प्रीतिमानर्जुनस्तदा॥
target: He (Shiva) then imparted to that best of Pandavas the knowledge of that weapon which looked like the embodiment of Yama and (also) all the mysteries as regards its method of discharging and withdrawing. That weapon then waited upon Partha as it did before upon Traksha, the lord of Uma. Arjuna with cheerful heart accepted it.

source: हिरण्यकशिपुर्योऽभूद् दानवो मेरुकम्पनः। तेन सर्वामरैश्वर्यं शर्वात् प्राप्तं समार्बुदम्॥
target: He who was born as the Danava named Hiranyakashipu, whose strength was so great that he could shake the very mountains of Meru, succeeded in getting from Mahadeva the power belonging to all the gods and enjoyed it for ten millions of years.

source: साधर्मभीता परिचन्तयन्ती तां याज्ञसेनी परमप्रतीताम्। पाणौ गृहीत्वोपजगाम कुन्ती युधिष्ठिरे वाक्यमुवाच चेदम्॥
target: Being anxious with the fear of sin and reflecting how every one could be extricated from the situation, she took the cheerful Yajnaseni by the hand and coming to Yudhishthira, she said.

source: स रथेनाग्निवर्णेन बलवानरावणात्मजः। इन्द्रजित्कवची खङ्गी सध्वजः प्रत्यदृश्यत ।।।।
target: Ravana's son Indrajit, endowed with strength, mailed, and armed with a sword, and furnished with a banner, was seen mounted on a fire-hued chariot.

source: ततस्तु दुर्मदश्चैव दुष्कर्णश्च तवात्मजौ। रथमेकं समारुह्य भीमं बाणैरविध्यताम्॥
target: Then your sons Durmada and Duskarna ascending the same car pierced Bhima with arrows.

source: ततो दश महेष्वासाः पाण्डवानां महारथाः। रक्षार्थमभ्यधावन्त सौभद्रं त्वरिता रथैः॥
target: Thereupon ten great bowmen and mighty car-warriors of the Pandava (army) soon rushed on their cars to protect the son of Subhadra.

source: अर्चितस्तैर्यथान्यायं संवत्सरमथोषितः। स्वपुरानिर्विशेषं च प्रियं प्राप्तो दशाननः॥
target: And duly honoured (by then) Daśānana passed there a year, without any feeling of that place being different from his own home: and spent his time agreeably.

source: सोऽपि वेलामिमां नूनमभिषेकार्थमुद्यतः। वृतः प्रकृतिभिर्नित्यं प्रयाति सरयूं नदीम्॥
target: He also for certain, at this hour of the day, surrounded by this subjects, daily wend to the river Sarayū for performing his ablutions.

source: और्व उवाच उक्तवानस्मि यां क्रोधात् प्रतिज्ञां पितरस्तदा। सर्वलोकविनाशाय न सा मे वितथा भवेत्॥
target: Arjuna said : O Pitris, the vow I uttered in anger for the destruction of all the worlds must not be in vain.

source: समाश्वसिहि भद्रं ते दृष्टा देवी न संशयः॥ नागन्तुमिह शक्यं तैरतीतसमयैरिह।
target: May good betide you. Do you console yourself. The worshipful dame has been found out; there is not the least doubt about it. Or else they would not have come as the time is already past.

source: सर्वथा न ह्ययं शल्य कर्णः सूतकुलोद्भवः। सकुण्डलं सकवचं दीर्घबाहुं महारथम्॥ कथमादित्यसदृशं मृगी व्याघ्र जनिष्यति।
target: O Shalya, this one, namely Karna, is, indeed, by no means born of the family of a charioteer. This mighty car-warrior resembling the very Sun, is furnished with the (natural) ear-rings, armour and long arms; could is be possible that the she deer had given birth to a tiger.

source: हत्वा तु समरे कर्णं त्वमद्य निशितैः शरैः। विपुला प्रीतिमाधत्स्व धर्मपुत्रस्य मानद॥
target: O bestower of honors, secure the blessings of the son of Dharma, by shooting down Karna with the keen points of your arrows.

source: वेदीमष्टनलोत्सेधां सौवर्णो विधिनिर्मिताम्॥ सर्वरत्नशतैः पूर्णो पताकाशतमालिनीम्। ग्राम्यारण्यैः पशुगणैः सम्पूर्णं च पहीमिमाम्॥ रामस्य जामदग्न्यस्य प्रतिजग्राह कश्यपः।
target: The sacrificial altar, ful} eighteen Nalas high and made entirely of gold and erected duly. And filled with diverse kinds of gems and jewels and adorned with hundreds of pennons, as also this earth abounding in domestic and wild animals were accepted by Kasyapa as sacrificial presents offered to him by Rama.

source: अग्रसत् तांस्तथाभूतं द्रौणिना प्रहिताशरान्। अश्वत्थामा तु सम्प्रेक्ष्य शरौघांस्तान् निरर्थकान्॥
target: Seeing his arrowy showers prove fruitless, Ashvathaman discharged at him a long dart burning like fire.

source: स किङ्किणोकजालेन महता चारुदर्शन:। पपात रुचिरः संख्ये भीमसेनस्य पश्यतः॥
target: The beautiful standard of Bhimasena, adorned with many bells, dropped down, O giver of honours.

source: व्यास उवाच अथ चेद् रोचयेदेतदुह्येत स्रोतसा यथा। उन्मज्जंश्च निमज्जंश्च ज्ञानवान् प्लववान् भवेत्॥
target: Vyasa said If Liberation is sought for, then knowledge should be acquired. For a person who is carried up and down along the stream of Time or life, Knowledge is the raft by which he can reach the shore.

source: ततो देवगणाः सर्वे पितामहमुपाद्रवन्। तत्र गत्वा महात्मानमूचुश्चैव जगत्पतिम्॥ नादोऽयं कीदृशो देव नैतं विद्म वयं प्रभो। कोऽसौ हि कस्य वा नादो येन विह्वलितं जगत्॥ देवाश्च दानवाश्चैव मोहितास्तस्य तेजसा।
target: Going there, those illustrious addressed the Lord of the universe, saying-What sort of noise is this, O powerful one? We do not understand it. Who is this one, ones or whose is this sound by which the universe has been stupefied. With the power of this sound or of its maker, the gods and the Danavas have all been deprived of their senses.

source: ब्राह्मण्युवाच नाहं गृहणामि वस्ताता दृष्टी स्मि रुषान्विता। अयं तु भार्गवो नूनमूरुज: कुपितोऽद्य वः॥
target: The Brahmani said : O children, I have not taken your eyesight, nor am I angry with you. This child of the Bhrigu race is certainly angry with you.

source: युधिष्ठिरं महाराजं जिगीषू समवस्थितम्। सहानीकं ततो द्रोणो न्यवारयत वीर्यवान्॥
target: Then the valorous Drona began to resist king Yudhishthira and his troops, when they were exerting themselves for obtaining victory.

source: दने नीलविनाशाय मति मतिमतां वरः। ततः संधाय विमलान् भल्लान् कर्मारमार्जितान्॥
target: That foremost of intelligent heroes resolved to slay Nila in battle. Thereafter fixing on the bowstring broaded-headed shafts, resplendent and variegated by the forger himself,

source: किरज्छरशतैरुपैराभिरिव पर्वतम्। न तु तन्ममृषे भीमः शत्रोर्विजयलक्षणम्॥
target: And he showered forth hundreds of terrible shafts, even as the masses of clouds drop down torrents of rain upon a mountain. This, indeed, namely the indication of his antagonist's victory Bhimasena could not like to tolerate.

source: सर्वस्याशा सुमहती पुरुषस्योपजायते। तस्यां विहन्यमानायां दुःखो मृत्युर्न संशयः॥
target: Hope is tne sheet-anchor of every man. When that hope is destroyed, great grief follows which, forsooth, is almost equal to death itself.

source: वासुदेव उवाच मा कृथाः पुरुषव्याघ्र शोकं त्वं गात्रशोषप न हि ते सुलभा भूयो ये हतास्मिन् रणाजिरे॥
target: Vasudeva said Do not, O foremost of men, so grieve as will reduce your body. They who have been killed in this battle will by no mean be got back.

source: तं चितागतमाज्ञाय वैश्वानरमुखे हुतम्। प्रविष्टा पावकं माद्री हित्वा जीवितमात्मनः॥
target: Seeing him placed on the funeral pyre and about to be burnt down, his wife Madri entered the fire, thus sacrificing her life.

source: अनीश्वरः कथं मुच्येदित्येवं शत्रुकर्शन। वदन्ति कारणैः श्रेष्ठ्यं योगाः सम्यङ्मनीषिणः॥
target: Wise men devoted to Yoga point out proper and very good reasons, O crusher of enemies, for showing that one who does not believe in the existence of God cannot acquire Liberation.

source: यां यामिच्छेत् तनुं देवः कर्तुं कार्यविधौ क्वचित्। तां तां कुर्याद् विकुर्वाणः स्वयमात्मानमात्मना।॥
target: Whatever forms the Supreme Deity wishes to assume with a view to the governing of the affairs of the universe, he assumes immediately by his own inherent powers.

source: रसानां सर्वगन्धानां स्नेहानां प्राणिनां तथा। भूमिर्यानिरिह ज्ञेया यस्यां सर्वं प्रसूयते॥
target: The Earth or land, in which everything is born, is the root of all sorts of taste, of all sorts of scent, of all sorts of liquids, and of all kinds of animals,

source: यश्च वेदप्रसूतात्मा स धर्मो गुणदर्शनः। धर्मप्रत्यय उद्दिष्टो यथाधर्मं कृतात्मभिः॥
target: That Vyavahara (Law), which originates from the Vedas, is Morality or duty. It yields good to persons believing in duty and morality; men of purified souls have spoken of that Vyavahara (Law) as they have done of ordinary law.

source: उष्ट्राश्वतरयुक्तानि यानानि च वहन्ति माम्। सबान्धवः सहामात्यश्चाश्नामि पिशितौदनम्॥
target: Numerous cars to which are attached camels and mules bear me. With all my relatives and friends I now eat food rich with meat.

source: मातापितृसुतस्नेहभाबन्धुमनोरमैः। मोहितोऽयं जनो ध्वस्तः क्लेशं स्वं नावबुध्यते।।१४
target: Down fallen on account of their attachment for their mothers and fathers and sons, and of their desires touching their wives and friends they set small store by labours having the hereafter as their object.

source: अथ व्यूढेष्वनीकेषु प्रेक्ष्य संशप्तकान् रणे॥ क्रुद्धोऽर्जुनोऽभिदुद्राव व्याक्षिपन् गाण्डिवं धनुः।
target: Beholding he Samsaptakas in battle array, Arjuna, worked up with anger, rushed against them, drawing his Gandiva bow.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच ततः केशान् समुत्क्षिप्य वेल्लिताग्राननिन्दितान्। कृष्णान्सूक्ष्मान्मृदुन्दीर्घान् समुद्ग्रथ्य शुचिस्मिता॥ जुगूहे दक्षिणे पार्श्वे मृदूनसितलोचना।
target: Vaishampayana said Then Draupadi, of pleasant smile and of dark eyes, bending her black; glossy, soft, long and fine tresses of crispy ends into a twisted braid, threw it on her right side and kept it concealed (under her cloth).

source: ईक्षितुं च महादेवं न मे शक्तिरभूत् तदा॥ ततो मामब्रवीद् देवः पश्य कृष्ण वदस्व च।
target: I, however, had not the power to look at Mahadeva. The great god then addressed me, saying see, OKrishna, and speak to me!

source: आददानस्य विजयं विग्रहं च युधिष्ठिर। समानधर्मकुशलाः स्थापयन्ति नरेश्वर॥
target: Those men only O Yudhishthira, who behave like robbers, advise a king to undertake wars and acquire victory.

source: आनन्दयति मां भूयः सात्यकिः परवीरहा। माद्रीपुत्रौ च भीमं च राजानं च युधिष्ठिरम्॥
target: Truly valiant Satyaki is thereby affording great delight to me, the twins, twins, king Yudhishthira and Bhima.

source: अहं च पर्वतश्चैव स्वस्त्रीयो मे महामुनिः। वस्तुकामावभिगतौ संजयं जयतां वरम्॥
target: Myself, and my sister's son, the great ascetic Parvata, once came to Srinjaya, that foremost of all victorious kings, for living with him.

source: तत्र भीष्मेण राज्ञा च धर्मप्रणयने कृते। पाण्डवाः समपद्यन्त खाण्डवप्रस्थवासिनः॥
target: Thus inconsequence of the virtuous conduct of Bhishma and the king (Dhritarashtra) the Pandavas became the dwellers of Khandavaprastha.

source: उत्सारयन्तः प्रभया तमस्ते चन्द्ररश्मयः। पर्यगच्छञ्छनैः सर्वा दिशः खंच क्षिति तथा॥
target: Then the rays of that lustrous orb, dispelling the gloom of night gradually spread themselves on the earth, the welkin and the directions of the compass.

source: अजस्त्रमुपयोक्तव्यं फलं गोमिषु भारत। प्रभावयन्ति राष्ट्रं च व्यवहारं कृषि तथा॥
target: The king, O Bharata, should always so treat the Vaishyas that their power to multiply money may be enhanced. The Vaishyas enhance the strength of a kingdom, improve its agriculture, and develop its trade.

source: सूतपुत्रोऽपि समरेपञ्चालन् केकयांस्तथा। सृञ्जयांश्च महेष्वासान् निजधान सहस्रशः॥
target: The Suta's son too began to slay by thousands the mighty bowmen of the Panchalas, the Kaikeyas and the Srinjayas.

source: 'अहं हि नैवास्तरणानि न स्रजो न चन्दनं नाञ्जनपानभोजनम्। न किंचिदिच्छामि न चेह जीवनं न चेदितो गच्छति राघवो वनम्॥
target: If Rāghava do not repair hence into the forest, I will not desire beds, nor garlands, nor sandal paste, nor colyrium, nor drinks, nor life.

source: तच्च दृष्ट्वा धनुःश्रेष्ठं गौरवाद् गिरिसंनिभम्। अभिवाद्य नृपा जग्मुरशक्तास्तस्य तोलने॥
target: Seeing that best of bows in weight resembling a hill, the kings saluting it, go away, unable to move it.

source: एते चान्ये च बहवः प्राच्योदीच्या महीक्षितः। शतशो यानुपाश्रित्य धर्मराजो व्यवस्थितः॥
target: These and many others come from the countries in the east and the north depending on hundreds of them the king Dharma is prepared for battle.

source: श्रुत्वा तु निनदं तेषां वध्यता कर्णसायकैः॥ अथाब्रवीद् वासुदेवं कुन्तीपुत्रो धनंजयः। भार्गवास्त्रं महाघोरं दृष्ट्वा तत्र समीरितम्॥
target: Beholding there the discharge of the dreadful Bhargava weapon and hearing the cries of his men slaughtered by Karna, with arrows Kunti's son Dhananjaya said to Krishna. can

source: राज्ञो बलं दर्शयन्तस्तव पुत्रस्य भारत॥ शिखण्डिनं पुरस्कृत्य त्रातुमैच्छन्महारथाः।
target: And displaying their prowess to your royal son, O descendant of Bharata, desired to rescue Shveta, with Shikhandin at their head.

source: रक्षांसि चापवर्तन्ते स्थिते देवे हुताशने। पूर्वं पिण्डं पितुर्दद्यात् ततो दद्यात् पितामहे॥
target: Sceing the God of Fire at a Shraddha, Rakshasas fly away forin it. The ritual of the Shraddha is that the cake should first be offered to the (departed) father. Next, one should be offered to the grandfather.

source: व्युष्टामेव तु तां रात्रिं दृष्ट्वा तं स्वप्नमप्रियम्। पुत्रो राजाधिराजस्य सुभृशं पर्यतप्यत॥
target: And seeing that evil dream during the short hours, the son of that king of kings exceedingly burned in grief.

source: हिरण्यवर्णं यं गर्भमदितेर्दैत्यनाशनम्। एकं द्वादशधा जज्ञे तस्मै सूर्यात्मने नमः॥
target: You are gold-hued. You are the killer of Asuras. Though One, Aditi gave birth to you in twelve forms. Salutations to you who are the Soul of the Sun.

source: चकार पत्नी कन्यां तु तथा तां गिरिकां नृपः। वसोः पत्नी तु गिरिका कामकालं न्यवेदयत्॥ ऋतुकालमनुप्राप्ता स्नाता पुंसवने शुचिः। तदहः पितरश्चैनमूचुर्जहि मृगानिति॥
target: The king made the daughter of the river who was called Girika his wife; and Girika, the wife of Vasu, purifying herself by a bath when her season of impurity came, told her state to her husband. But that very day the ancestors of Vasu came to him;

source: प्रेक्षन्तः सर्वतस्तौ हि योधा योधमहाद्विपौ। तावकाश्चापरे चैव साधु साध्वित्यपूजयन्॥
target: The warriors of both armies, looking at those two foremost of heroes from every side, lauded them both, saying-well done! well done.

source: एतानि पुरुषव्याघ्र साधुभ्यो देहि नित्यदा। दानानि हि नरं पापान्मोक्षयन्ति न संशयः॥
target: O king, do you always make such gifts, to the righteous. Forsooth, gifts rescue the giver from all his sins.

source: ततः स कथयामास दृष्ट्वा हंसस्य किल्बिषम्। तेषां परमदुःखार्तः स पक्षी सर्वपक्षिणाम्॥
target: Having witnessed the sinful act of the swan, that bird spoke of it to all the other birds in great sorrow.

source: यस्य वीर्येण वीर्यं ते धार्तराष्ट्रोऽवमन्यते। तमद्य पार्थ संग्रामे कर्ण वैकर्तनं जहि॥
target: Do in today's battle kill that Vaikartana Karna, counting upon whose prowess the sons of Dhritarashtra over look your manly virtues.

source: एतं भारत मातङ्गा कर्णेनभिहताः शरैः। आर्तनादान विकुर्वाणा विद्रवन्ति दिशो दश॥
target: Struck by Karna in battle, O Arjuna the elephants are flying away in ten directions yelling cries of pain.

source: बढ्यो दृष्ट्वा शरीराणि क्रोशन्ति विलपन्ति च। पाणिभिश्चापरा घ्नन्ति शिरांसि मृदुपाणयः॥
target: The Earth, filled with heaps of heads and hands and other limbs, the sights of destruction, looks resplendent.

source: नन्वहं तेऽप्रियः पुत्र मातरं पश्य धार्मिकीम्। किं च नालिङ्गसे पुत्र सुकुमार वचो वद॥
target: If, my son, you do not feel kindly to me, do you look up to your virtuous mother. And why, O son, do you not embrace me? Do you speak tender words.

source: मे द्रोण उवाच ध्रुवस्ते विजयो राजन् यस्य मन्त्री हरिस्तव। अहं त्वामभिजानामि रणे शत्रून् विमोक्ष्यसे॥
target: Yudhishthira said O king, victory is certain to you-who have Krishna as your counselor. I wish that you will defeat your enemy in this battle.

source: तप्यमानं तमाज्ञाय वयस्याः प्रियवादिनः। आयासं विनयिष्यन्तः सभायां चक्रिरे कथाः॥
target: And finding him aggrieved, his sweet. speeched associates, endeavouring to chase the heaviness, began to converse on a variety of subjects.

source: भीष्म उवाच शृणु राजन् वचो मह्यं यथा वक्ष्यामि कौरव। बहुशश्च मयोक्तोऽसि न च मे तत् त्वया कृतम्॥ क्रियतां पाण्डवैः सार्धं शमो भरतसत्तम। एतत् क्षेममहं मन्ये पृथिव्यास्तव वा विभो॥
target: Bhishma said Hear, O king, the words that I am going to say to you, O you of the Kuru race. I did frequently address you to the same effect, urging you to conclude peace with the sons of Pandu. I consider this to be profitable both to you and to the earth, O lord.

source: वश्येन्द्रियं जितामात्यं धृतदण्ड विकारिषु। परीक्ष्यकारिणं धीरमत्यर्थं श्रीनिषेवते॥
target: To one who has his senses under control, to one who has gained mastery over his enemies, to one who holds the rod (of punishment) on offenders and to one who does a thing after mature consideration, does prosperity offer great adoration.

source: तथा ब्रह्मर्षिभिश्चैव सदस्यैरुपशोभितम्। तत्र घोरतमं वृत्तमृषीणां मे परिश्रुतम्॥
target: The platform was further adorned with Sadasyas who were all high regenerate Rishis. I have heard from the Rishis that something very awful soon took place in that sacrifice.

source: अपि ायमिहैवान्यैः प्राक्कृतैर्दुःखितो भवेत्। सुखितो दुःखितो वापि दृश्यादृश्यविनिर्णयः॥
target: Another refutation of the doctrine would be that one in this life may rendered miserable by the acts of another in a pristine life, or having become miserable may again become happy. By witnessing however, what actually takes place in the world, a proper conclusion may be drawn regarding the unseen.

source: एतदाचष्ट मे राजन् देवर्षिर्नारदः पुरा। व्यासश्चैव महायोगी संजल्पेषु पदे पदे॥
target: The celestial Rishi Narada and the great Yogin Vyasa had again and again told all this to me in days of yore when the subject was suggested in course of conversation.

source: अवकाशो न साम्नस्तु राक्षसेप्वभिगम्यते। न दानस्य न भेदस्य नैव युद्धस्य दृश्यते॥
target: Opportunity find I none either for conciliation with the Raksasas, or for (winning them over) by gifts, or for sowing dissensions among them, or for conquering them in fight.

source: यानशालां ततो गत्वा प्रच्छन्नं राक्षसाधिपः। सूतं संचोदयामास रथः संयुज्यताममिति ॥
target: And going to the stable in disguise, the lord of the Rākṣasasas commanded the charioteer, saying, Yoke the car.:

source: यस्य यज्ञे महानासीद् यूपः श्रीमान् हिरण्मयः। तं देवाः कर्म कुर्वाणाः शक्रज्येष्ठा उपाश्रयन्॥
target: In one of his sacrifices, the stake was made of gold and and looked highly beautiful. Performing the duties assigned to them, the gods having Shakra for their king, used to seek refuge with that king.

source: व्यानं त्वं मन्यसेऽऽत्मानं यावत् कृष्णौ न पश्यसि। समास्थितावेकरथे सूर्याचन्द्रमसाविव॥
target: You consider yourself a lion for you have not seen Krishna and Arjuna stationed on the same car like the sun and moon.

source: स ददौ पावकं तस्य विधियुक्तं विभीषणः। स्नात्वा चैवाईवस्त्रेण तिलान्दर्भविमिश्रितान्॥ उदकेन च संमिक्षान्प्रदाय विधिपूर्वकम्। ताः स्त्रियोऽनुनयामास सान्त्वयित्वा पुनः पुनः॥
target: Vibhīşaņa according to due rites put fire to his (funeral pyre). Bathing and with wetted cloth, offering duly linseed and sacrificial grass mixed with water and consoling (Ravana's) wives again and again, he entreated them to go back.
