target: That learned man who recites this history on sacred days in the midst of an attentive audience becomes purged of every sin, conquers that celestial region, and attains to the status of Brahma.

source: रौक्मिणेयश्च साम्बश्च क्षीबौ समरदुर्मदौ। दिव्यमाल्याम्बरधरौ विजह्वातेऽमराविव॥
target: There were the son of Rohini and ever furious in battle Samba. Intoxicated with drink, adorned with beautiful garlands and attired in costly robes, they sported there like two celestials.

source: रुद्राक्रीडनिभं दृष्ट्वा तदा विशसनं स्त्रियः। महाहेभ्योऽथ यानेभ्यो विक्रोशन्त्यो निपेतिरे॥
target: Seeing that onslaught which resembled the spectacles seen on the sporting ground of Rudra, the ladies cried and quickly got down from their costly cars. were

source: तामापतन्ती चिच्छेद शकुनिस्तैलपायिना। एतत् कृत्वा महत् कर्म रणेऽद्भुपराक्रमः॥

source: स संतीर्य महाबाहुः श्रीमाञ्छिवमकण्टकम्। प्रापद्यत महामार्गमभयं भयदर्शिनाम्॥
target: Having crossed (the stream), the auspicious and mighty-armed one came upon a safe and goodly-high way capable of inspiring even timid people with confidence.

source: किं नु राज्येन ते कार्यं पितॄन् भ्रातृनपश्यतः। अभिमन्युं च दुर्धर्षं द्रौपदेयांश्च भारत॥
target: What is the use of sovereignty to you, after have your seen your sires and brothers, O Bharata, and the irresistible Abhimanyu and the sons of Draupadi, thus killed.

target: See me, O dear child, how, by following the duties of my own order, I have sent innumerable Kshatriyas to heaven! There are some who are not pleased with me for this.

target: Cutting off the bow of Drona's son with a razor-headed arrows pierced him with a winged shaft. Thereupon the high-souled son of Drona, throwing off that severed bow.

target: On account of this boring of my thigh a pool of thick blood gushed out of my body. For fear of my preceptor I did not move my limb. The Brahmana, on waking, saw it.

target: As that destroyer of hostile heroes, Parikshit, has been born of Abhimanyu, so has this mighty-armed child, my grandson, originated from Suratha.

source: यथाग्निहोत्रं सुहुतं सायं प्रातर्द्विजातिना। तथा दत्तं द्विजातिभ्यो भवत्यथ यतात्मसु।॥
target: One reaps the same merit by making gifts to twiceborn persons of controlled souls which one acquires by properly pouring libations to the sacred fire morning and evening.

source: द्यूतेऽद्वितीयः शकुनि रेषु कुन्तीसुतस्तेन निसृष्टकामः। स्तस्मान्न ते प्रश्नमिमं ब्रवीमि॥
target: Shakuni is matchless in dice. The son of Kunti has still willfully staked with him. The illustrious (Yudhisthira) does not consider that Shakuni played with him deceitfully. Therefore, I am unable to decide this matter.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच वहवः पुरुषा लोके सांख्ययोगविचारणे। नैतदिच्छन्ति पुरुषमेकं कुरुकुलोद्वह॥
target: Vaishampayana said, In the Sankhya and the Yoga Systems many are the Souls spoken of. O preceptor of Kuru's race, those who follow these systems do not wish to assert that there is but one Purusha in the universe.

source: हत्वा तत् पुरुषानीकं भीमः सत्यपराक्रमः॥ धृष्टद्युम्नं पुरस्कृत्य नचिरात् प्रत्यदृश्यत।

source: नभिब्रुवन् मूढ न लज्जसे कथम्। महेन्द्रकल्पान् निरतान् स्वकर्मसु स्थितान् समूहेष्वपि यक्षरक्षसाम्॥
target: O fool, are you not ashamed to use such insulting words to those illustrious and dreadful heroes, each like Indra himself, who all abide by their duties and never wave in fight even with hosts of Yakshas and Rakshasas.

source: शिरसा चरणावेतौ वन्दमानमनिन्दिते। पुनर्द्रक्ष्यसि कल्याणि पुत्रं चन्द्रमिवोदितम्॥
target: I tell you this truly. O blameless one, you will again, O auspicious lady, see your son, like to the new-risen moon, paying homage to your feet with his head.

source: स शोभमानो वरदः खगी बाणी शरासनी॥ प्रदीपयन् रथे तस्थौ त्रील्लोकान् स्वेन तेजसा।
target: That handsome personage, that giver of boons, that holder of the sword, arrow and bow rested upon that car and looked most resplendent with his own energy shedding lustre upon the three worlds.

source: न तत् परस्य संदध्यात् प्रतिकूलं यदात्मनः। एष संक्षेपतो धर्मः कामादन्यः प्रवर्तते॥
target: One should never do that to another which he considers as injurious to his own self. This in brief, is the rule of virtue. One by acting in a different way by giving way to desire, becomes guilty of sin.

source: वासुदेव उवाच स्वयंवरः क्षत्रियाणां विवाहः पुरुषर्षभः। स च संशयितः पार्थ स्वभावस्यानिमित्ततः॥
target: Krishna said: O best of men, Svyaimvara is the marriage form of the Kshatriyas, but, O Partha, that is doubtful, as we do not know her temper and disposition.

source: ततः क्षुभितसर्वाङ्गौ सुरेन्द्रौ पन्नगाविव। तद्रूपमद्भुतं दृष्ट्वा त्याजितौ धैर्यमात्मनः॥ ततस्तस्यां सुरेन्द्रेण स्कन्नं शिरसि पातितम्। अनासाथैव तां नारी संनिवृत्तमथाभवत्॥ ततः सा वानरपतिं जज्ञे वानरमीश्वरम्। अमोघरेतसस्तस्य वासवस्य महात्मनः॥ वालेषु पतितं बीजं वाली नाम बभूव सः। भास्करेणापि तस्यां वै कंदर्पवशवर्तिना॥ बीजं निषिक्तं ग्रीवायां विधानमनुवर्तत। तेनापि सा वरतनुर्नोक्ता किंचिद्वचः शुभम्॥ निवृत्तमदनश्चाथ सूर्योऽपि समपद्यत। ग्रीवायां पतितं बीजं सुग्रीवः समजायत॥ एवमुत्पाद्य तौ वीरौ वानरेन्द्रौ महाबलौ। दत्त्वा तु काञ्चनी मालां वानरेन्द्रस्य वालिनः॥ अक्षय्यां गुणसंपूर्णां शक्रस्तु त्रिदिवं ययौ। सूर्योऽपि स्वसुतस्यैव निरूप्य पवनात्मजम्॥ कृत्येषु व्यवसायेषु जगाम सविताम्बरम्। तस्यां निशायां व्युष्टायामुदिते च दिवाकरे॥ स तद्वानररूपं तु प्रतिपेदे पुनर्नृप। स एव वानरो भूत्वा पुत्रौ स्वस्य प्लवंगमौ॥ पिड्रेक्षणी हरिवरौ बलिनौ कामरूपिणौ। मधून्यमृतकल्पानि पायितौ तेन तौ तदा॥
target: What more, their whole body, as soon as they saw her, was moved and the firmness of the mind shaken. Thereupon Indra begot on her a son named Vālī for he originated from her hairs and the sun beget on her another son, who was named Sugrīva for he originated from her neck. Thus the two highly powerful monkeys being born, Indra went back to his region having conferred upon Vāli an un-ending garland of gold. And having engaged Hanumăn, the Wind god's son in the service of Sugrīva, the sun too went back to the sky. O king, the sun having risen after that night Rkşarajā again obtained his own real monkey shape. Having thus regained his monkey form he made his two highly powerful sons, leading monkeys, assuming shapes at will and having tawny eyes, drink honey like nectar.

source: प्रीतिमात्रं पितुः पुत्रः सर्वं पुत्रस्य वै पिता। शरीरादीनि देयानि पिता त्वेकः प्रयच्छति॥
target: The son is only a source of joy to his father. The father is all in all to a son. The body and all else that the son has he has got from the father alone.

source: छित्त्वा भीमो महाराज नादं सिंह इवानदत्। तौ वृषाविव नर्दन्तौ बलिनौ वासितान्तरे॥

source: निषादी पञ्चपुत्रा तु तस्मिन् भोज्ये यदृच्छया। अन्नार्थिनी समभ्यागात् सपुत्रा कालचोदिता॥ सा पीत्वा मदिरां मत्ता सपुत्रा मदविह्वला। सह सर्वैः सुतै राजंस्तस्मिन्नेव निवेशने॥ सुष्वाप विगतज्ञाना मृतकल्पा नराधिप। अथ प्रवाते तुमुले निशि सुप्ते जने तदा॥ तदुपादीपयद् भीमः शेते यत्र पुरोचनः। ततो जदुगृहद्वारं दीपयामास पाण्डवः॥
target: Impelled by fate, a Nishada woman with her five sons came there with the desire of obtaining food and she enjoyed herself there at pleasure. She drank wine and became drunk and incapable with her sons. O king, she with her sons slept in that house more dead than alive. O king, when all the people fell asleep, a violent storm began to blow on that night. Bhima then set fire to the house where Purochana was asleep; then the Pandava set fire to the door of that lac house.

source: न हि तानश्रुपातांस्तु शक्ता धारयितुं मही॥ गौतमस्त्वव्रवीद् विप्रमुत्तङ्क प्रीतमानसः। कस्मात् तात तवाद्येह शोकोत्तरमिदं मनः। स स्वैरं ब्रूहि विप्रर्षे श्रोतुमिच्छामि तत्त्वतः॥
target: The Earth herself was unable to hold those tear-drops of Utanka. With a pleased heart, Gautama then said to the twice-born Utanka, 'Why, O son, is your mind so afflicted with grief today? Tell me calmly and quietly, O learned Rishi, for I wish to hear it in full.

source: मृण्मये भाजने पक्वे यथा वै नश्यति द्रवः। तथा शरीरं तपसा तप्तं विषयमश्नुते॥
target: As a liquid substance, if kept in a baked earthen pot, does not escape therefrom but remains undiminished similarly, one's body with which one had practised penances enjoys (without rejecting) all objects of pleasure.

target: The former's sojourn to the Rşyamūka, and meeting with Sugrīva; Rāma's raising the confidence of Sugrīva and his friendship with the latter; and the encounter between Vāli and Sugriva.

source: अप्लवो हि महादोषं मुह्यमानो नियच्छति। कामग्राहगृहीतस्य ज्ञानमप्यस्य न प्लवः॥
target: The man shorn of the raft of wisdom in consequence of his having to bear the heavy burden of great faults, sinks down. One that is seized by the crocodile of desire, even if endued with knowledge, can never make knowledge his raft.

source: उष्ट्र उवाच भगवंस्त्वत्प्रसादान्मे दीर्घा ग्रीवा भवेदियम्। योजनानां शतं साग्रं गच्छामि चरितुं विभो॥
target: The camel said Let my neck, O holy one, become long through your favour, so that, O powerful lord, I may be able to get any food that may be even at the end of even a hundred Yojanas.

source: समयं वाजिमेधस्य विदित्वा पुरुषर्षभः। यथोक्तो धर्मपुत्रेण प्रव्रजन् स्वपुरी प्रति॥
target: While leaving that city for returning to his own Dwraka, he had been requested by the son of Dharma to come back. Hence, knowing, that the tiine fixed for the Horse-Sacrifice had come, that foremost of men returned to Hastinapur.

source: यदिष्टं तत् सुखं प्राहुद्देष्यं दुःखमिहेष्यते। कृताकृतस्य तपस: फलं पश्यस्व यादृशम्॥
target: Wheat is agreeable is called happiness. What is disagreeable is called misery. Happiness is the outcome of penances practisted. When they are not practised, the outcome is misery. See the fruits of practising and abstaining from penances.

source: सावित्र्युवाच एवमेतद् यथा वेत्थ संकल्पो नान्यथा हि वः। न हि किंचिद् रहस्यं मे श्रूयतां तथ्यमेव यत्॥
target: Savitri said: It is as you know it to be. Your desire can never prove fruitless. I have nothing to conceal from you. Now hear the true cause of this.

source: पुनरज्ञातचर्यायां कीचकेन पदा वधः। याज्ञसेन्यास्तथा पार्थ न तस्य स्मर्तुमिच्छसि॥ यच्च ते द्रोणभीष्माभ्यां युद्धमासीदरिंदम। मनसैकेन योद्धव्यं तत् ते युद्धमुपस्थितम्॥
target: Nor it is meet, O son of Pritha, and conqueror of your foes, that you should recall the incident of Kichaka's kicking Draupadi, during the period of your exile passed in absolute concealment, nor the incidents of the fight which took place between yourself and Drona and Bhishma. The time has now arrived, when you must fight which each must do single-handed with his mind.

source: मां मावसंस्था द्रौपदीतल्पसंस्थो महारथान् प्रतिहन्मि त्वदर्थे। तेनातिशङ्की भारत निष्ठुरोऽसि त्वत्तः सुखं नाभिजानामि किंचित्॥
target: O Bharata, do you be trifling with me no longer, lying all the while on Draupadi's bed. it is for you that I have been slaying many a mighty car-warrior. Perhaps that has been making you fearless and wanton still. Indeed, I could never feel any happiness from you.

source: संदिष्टौ मुनिना तेन तावुभौ मैथिलीसुतौ। तथैव करवावेति निर्जग्मतुररिंदमौ॥
target: Being thus commanded by the ascetic, Janakis' son, Lava and Kusa, the slayers of enemies, issued out there from saying. So we shall do."

source: क्रौञ्ची भासीं तथा श्येनी धृतराष्ट्री तथा शुकीम्॥ ताम्रा तु सुषुरे कन्याः पञ्चैता लोकविश्रुताः।
target: And Tāmrā gave birth to these five daughters celebrated in the world, Kraunci, Bhāsi, Syeni, Dhrtarastri, and Suki.

source: धर्मोऽहमस्मि भद्रं ते जिज्ञासार्थं तवानघ। प्राप्तः सत्यं च ज्ञात्वा प्रीतिर्मे परमा त्वयि॥
target: O sinless one, I am Dharma! All glory to you! I came here, O truthloving one, to try you, and I am well pleased with you by knowing you to be virtuous.

source: नात्र वाच्यं महाराज सुसूक्ष्ममपि विद्यते। उषिताः स्म सुखं नित्यं भवता परिपालिताः॥
target: There is nothing, O monarch, that is even slightly censurable in the matter of this Yudhishthishta's rule. Protected and ruled by you, we have all lived in great happiness.

source: मामकेन शरीरेण राज्यमेकः प्रशास्तु वः। अहं तन्वाभिनवया युवा काममवाप्नुयाम्॥
target: (Therefore), take any of you my decrepitude and rule the kingdom with my body. I would then enjoy myself with a renovated youthful body.

source: अर्जुन उवाच अहं वै कुरुभिर्योत्स्याम्यवजेष्यामि ते पशून्॥ संकल्पपक्षविक्षेपं बाहुप्राकारतोरणम्।

target: Beholding that highly powerful Rāghava, in a conflict, like to Vāsava in prowess, holding a wonderful bow and followed by Lakşmaņa, who can withstand his prowess resembling the flaming fire?

source: न त्वद्य शक्यमस्माभिरेतत् कर्तुमतोऽन्यथा। नूनं दैवकृतं ह्येतद् यदेवं कृतवानसि॥

target: O lion of a king, O you endued with high intelligence, let us without delay repair hence. And, O foremost of monarchs, do you engage in the sacrifice and commence upon the initiation.

target: Holding Bhindipalas or lances or darts or swords or battle-axes or piked stakes or scimitars or bows or Tomaras.

source: विव्याध चैनं सप्तत्या नाराचानां महाबलः। हताश्वं रथमुत्सृज्य स तु राजा श्रुतायुधः॥ अभ्यद्रवद् रणे पार्थे गदामुद्यम्य वीर्यवान्। वरुणस्यात्मजो वीरः स तु राजा श्रुतायुधः॥ पर्णाशा जननी यस्य शीततोया महानदी। तस्य माताब्रवीद् राजन् वरुणं पुत्रकारणात्॥

Thereupon leaving his chariot of which the steeds were slain, king Shrutayusha endued with great energy rushed againsi Pritha's son, heaving his huge mace over his head. source: निर्ममो निरहंकारो निराशीर्मुक्तबन्धनः। स्वस्थो व्यपेतः पश्यामि भूतानां प्रभवाप्ययौ॥
target: Without attachments, without pride, without desire and hope, freed from all fetters, and dissociated from everything, I am passing my time happily, seeing that appearance and disappearance of all created objects.

source: गतेषु पृथिवीशेषु राजा दशरथः पुनः। प्रविवेश पुरीं श्रीमान् पुरस्कृत्य द्विजोत्तमान्॥
target: When the lords of the earth had gone away, the graceful king Dasaratha re-entered his palace, with the foremost of regenerate ones at his head.

source: धर्मशास्त्राणि वेदाश्च षडङ्गानि नराधिप। श्रेयसोऽर्थे विधीयन्ते नरस्याक्लिष्टकर्मणः॥
target: O king! All the scriptures of righteousness and the Vedas with six angas proceed for the welfare of sinless one.

source: ते शारदाभ्रप्रतिमं श्रीमद्रजतपर्वतम्। शृङ्गवन्तं दरीवन्तमधिरुह्य च वानराः॥

source: उपरुध्यन्ति मे प्राणा दृष्टिभ्रमति राघव। पश्यामि वृक्षान् सौवर्णानुशीरकृतमूर्धजान्॥
target: O Rāghava, my life is about to expire, my eye-sight has grown of mistaken perception, I see trees before me made of gold having hair resembling Usira.

source: तं चैनं परमोदारमुपेक्षसि महाबल। क्षणं हि न भवेत्रः क्रुद्ध त्वयि सुरेश्वर॥
target: Do you therefore not neglect any longer this highly Generous Asura. They self being enraged, O lord of deities, Vſtra shall not live even for a moment.

target: Alas, you being all alive these various woes (render my person emaciated) undermine my system; what can be sadder than this?

source: स हि कृष्ण महातेजाः श्लाघन्निव ममाग्रतः॥ बालभावेन विनयमात्मनोऽकथयत् प्रभुः।
target: He was possessed, O Krishna, of great energy. From a spirit of childishness, that powerful hero, boasting (of his prowess) in my presence, used to speak of his skill (in battle).

source: अट्टहासान्विमुञ्चन्तो घननादसमस्वनाः। वाश्यन्त्यश्च शिवास्तत्र दारुणं घोरदर्शनाः॥
target: And jackals of terrific forms, having voices resembling the roaring of clouds, bursting out into a horse-laugh, began to emit cries frightfully.

source: अथ सभ्याः सभामध्ये समुच्छ्रितकरास्तदा। ऊचुरुद्विग्नमनसः संवेगात् सर्व एव हि॥
target: Vaishampayana said Thereupon those that were present in the Sabha raising up their arms, said in great anxiety of mind and in great emotion.

source: भवेन्न मतिभेदो मे गात्रवैरूप्यतां प्रति। प्रमाणात् परिहीनस्तु भवेदिति मतिर्मम॥
target: There should be no change of my opinion on account of his ugly appearance; rather my opinion is that this one has under gone some change in the body.

source: मप्रियं पार्थिवाः सर्वे ये चिकीर्षन्ति भारत। ते तानावारयिष्यन्ति ऐणेयानिव तन्तुना॥
target: Those rulers of the earth, who wish me well, O Bharata, will get hold of them, as deer are caught by means of a trap.

source: विव्यास वेदान्यस्मात्स तस्माद्व्यास इति स्मृतः। वेदानध्यापयामास महाभारतपञ्चमान्॥
target: Arranged the Vedas and thence he came to be called Vyasa. He then taught the Vedas and the fifth Veda Mahabharata.

source: ते भक्षयन्तो मूलानि फलानि विविधान्यपि। अन्वेषमाणा दुर्धर्षा न्यवसंस्तत्र तत्र ह ॥ स तु देशो दुरन्वेषो गुहागहनवान् महान्। निर्जलं निर्जनं शून्यं गहनं घोरदर्शनम्॥ तादृशान्यप्यरण्यानि विचित्य भृशपीडिताः। स देशश्च दुरन्वेष्यो गुहागहनवान् महान्॥ त्यक्त्वा तु तं ततो देशं सर्वे वै हरियूथपाः। देशमन्यं दुराधर्षं विविशुश्चाकुतोभयाः॥ यत्र वन्ध्यफला वृक्षा विपुष्पाः पर्णवर्जिताः। निस्तोयाः सरितो यत्र मूलं यत्र सुदुर्लभम्॥ न सन्ति महिषा यत्र न मृगा न च हस्तिनः। शार्दूलाः पक्षिणो वापि ये चान्ये वनगोचराः॥
target: And subsisting on various fruits and roots, they were overcome with fatigue, after searching dreadful forests, void of water, still and tenantless, as well as other forests of a similar nature. And having searched that country as well mighty forests containing caves, those leaders of monkeyherds fearlessly explored other places, difficult of access, where the trees are fruitless, and without flowers and foliage; where the streams are waterless, and where roots even are rare; where there are no buffaloes, or deer, or elephants, or tigers, or birds-or any other animals that are found in forests.

source: न सम्पत्स्यति मत्र्येषु पुनस्तस्य तु संततिः। तस्मादपुत्रः पुत्रस्ते भविष्यति स वीर्यवान्॥

Helped by these, slay Shakuni.” At this seven hundred elephants ridden by bowmen and five thousand horse and the valiant Sahadeva and three thousand foot-soldiers and the son of Draupadi, all proceeded against invincible Shakuni.

source: एष प्रत्यागतो मन्त्रोधृतराष्ट्रस्यधीमतः। विदुरः पाण्डुपुत्राणां सुहृद् विद्वान् हिते रतः॥

source: नारद उवाच येनायं सृज्यते जन्तुस्ततोऽन्यः पूर्वमेति तम्। प्राणद्वन्द्वं हि विज्ञेयं तिर्यगूर्ध्वमधश्च यत्॥

source: वैश्यः किल समुद्रान्ते प्रभूतधनधान्यवान्॥ यज्वा दानपति: क्षान्तः स्फकर्मस्थोऽभवच्छुचिः। बहुपुत्रः प्रियापत्यः सर्वभूतानुकम्पकः॥ राज्ञो धर्मप्रधानस्य राष्ट्रे वसति निर्भयः।

source: समागतस्ततो व्यासः शतयूपादिभिर्वृतः। धृतराष्ट्रं महीपालमास्यतामित्यभाषत।॥

source: यं विनिद्रा जितश्वासाः सत्त्वस्थाः संयतेन्द्रियाः। ज्योतिः पश्यन्ति युञ्जानास्तस्मै योगात्मने नमः॥

source: गच्छ संजय जानीहि भ्रातरं विदुरं मम। यदि जीवति रोषेण मया पापेन निथुतः॥
target: Dhritarashtra said : O Sanjaya, go and ascertain whether my brother, Vidura, expelled by my wretched self through anger, still lives or not.

source: अगत्वा निश्चयं राजा कालेन महता महान्। त्रिंशद्वर्षसहस्राणि राज्यं कृत्वा दिवं गतः॥
target: And without being able to ascertain it, the mighty monarch after a long course of time, and having reigned for thirty thousand years, ascended heaven.

source: देवयान्युवाच यद्येतदेवं शर्मिष्ठे न मन्युर्विद्यते मम। अपत्यं यदि ते लब्धं ज्येष्ठाच्छ्रेष्ठाच वै द्विजात्॥
target: Devayani said : O Sharmishtha, If this be true, if you have received this your son from such a great Brahmana, I have then no cause for anger.

source: यामः सर्वे च सम्भूय सवाजिरथकुञ्जराः॥ परित्रातुं महेष्वासान् मद्रराजपदानुगान्।
target: We shall, therefore, all of us, in a body with our cars and horses and elephants, proceed, for rescuing those great bowmen, viz., the followers of the Madra king.

source: अब्रवीच महाबाहुर्भीमसेनमिदं वचः। आवारय महाबाहो धार्तराष्ट्रस्य वाहिनीम्॥
target: O chastiser of foes, the mighty armed son of Pandu then addressed Bhima and thus spoke: "O you of might arms, check the (rushing) host of Dhritarashtra's son.

source: नाचिकेतं पिता दृष्ट्वा पतितं दुःखमूच्छितः। किं मया कृतमित्युक्त्वा निपपात महीतले॥
target: Seeing Nachiketa prostrated upon the earth, his father become senseless with grief. He, too, exclaiming, Alas, what have I done! dropped down on the earth.

source: विस्मयो मे महान् पार्थ तव दृष्ट्वा शरानिमान्। व्यर्थान् निपतितान् संख्ये दुर्योधनरर्थ प्रति॥
target: Seeing all these shafts of yours falling upon Duryodhana's chariots without producing the least effect, o Partha, I have been filled with great surprise.

source: ब्राह्मणैश्चापि ते सार्धं यात्रा भवतु पाण्डव॥ ब्राह्मणा वै परं श्रेयो दिवि चेह च भारत।
target: O son of Pandu, always try to associate with Brahmanas in all your acts! Brahmanas give great benefit both in this world and the next.

source: वरप्राप्ति पितुस्ते तु ज्ञात्वैश्वर्यं तपोबलात्। तपस्तप्तुं गता मेरुं भ्रातरः कृतनिश्चयाः॥
target: And learning that their father had received a boon by virtue of his power proceeding from asceticism, the brothers, firmly resolved, went to Meru for practising penances.

source: धन्यस्ते पुत्र जनको देवो भानुर्विभावसुः। यस्त्वां द्रक्ष्यति दिव्येन चक्षुषा वाहिनीगतम्॥
target: Blessed is indeed your divine father, Bhanu, having effulgence for his wealth, who by means of his celestials sight, beholds you going down the stream.

source: किमियं द्रवते सेना त्रस्तरूपेव भारत। द्रवमाणां च राजेन्द्र नावस्थापयसे रणे॥
target: Approached Duryodhana; and then that son of Drona said these words to the latter-"Why O Bharata, are the troops flying away, as if in fear?

source: प्रीतिमत्सूपविष्टेषु वानरेषु महात्मसु। तं ततः प्रतिसंहष्टः प्रीतियुक्तं महाकपिम्॥ जाम्बवान् कार्यवृत्तान्तमपृच्छदनिलात्मजम्। कथं दृष्टा त्वया देवी कथं वा तत्र वर्तते ॥ तस्यां चापि कथं वृत्तः क्रूरकर्मा दशाननः। तत्त्वतः सर्वमेतन्नः प्रब्रूहि त्वं महाकपे॥
target: And when the high-souled delighted monkeys has sat them down, Jamvaban, glad at heart, asked that offspring of the Wind; the happy Hanumān, all about his proceeding: "How had you seen the worshipful one? How dose she fare there? And how dose the cruel Ten-necked one bear himself towards her? Do you truthfully relate all this to us, O mighty monkey."

source: जग्राह विधिवत् पाणिं तस्या ब्रह्मर्षिसत्तमः। सा च तं पतिमासाद्य परं हर्षमवाप ह॥
target: That foremost of twiceborn Rishis accepted her hand in marriage according to due rites. The princes too was wellpleased at seeing herself the wife of that Brahmana.

source: कार्यसिद्धिं पुरस्कृत्य मन्त्रयध्वं विनिर्णये। नित्यं संनिहितो यत्र रावणो राक्षसाधिपः॥
target: Let us, keeping before us success in the enterprise, consult together for the purpose of arriving at a decision.

source: तथा चेन्द्रजितो वेश्म जगाम हरियूथपः। जम्बुमालेः सुमालेश्च जगाम हरिसत्तमः॥
target: And thus, next into that of Indrajit, and that foremost of monkeys went to the mansion of Jambumāla, and of Sumāla,

source: तेषां तद् वचनं श्रुत्वा देवानां मुनिपुङ्गवः। अब्रवीत् सुमहद् वाक्यं कौशिकः सर्वदेवताः।.२६ ।।
target: Hearing those words of theirs, that best of anchorets, Kausika, in company with the celestials, said these pregnant words.

source: धावतश्चाप्यपश्यामस्तत्र तान् पुरुषर्षभान्॥ नष्टचित्तानिवोन्मत्ताशोकेन भृशपीडितान्।
target: Pressed down with sorrow and be wildered men and women were seen running about like mad people.

source: प्रत्यक्षं तु कुरुश्रेष्ठ त्यज लोभमिहात्मना। त्यक्त्वा लोभं सुखं लोके प्रेत्य चानुचरिष्यसि॥
target: Do you before all persons, avoid covetousness by a strong determination, O Kuru chief. Avoiding covetousness you will acquire happiness both here and in the next world.

source: प्रतीपमिव मे भाति युयुधानेन भारती। व्यस्ता सीमन्तिनी ग्रस्ता प्रमृष्टा दीर्घबाहुना॥
target: The army of the Bharatas appears to me as already fallen down like a woman troubled and afflicted and struck by one of the long arms.

source: शल्यश्च दशभिर्बाणैत्रिभिर्दुःशासनस्तथा। दुर्योधनस्तु विंशत्या शकुनिश्चापि पञ्चभिः॥
target: Drona's son pierced Dhristadyumna with five, Drona himself with five, Shalya with nine and Dushasana with three Vallas.

source: स रराज रथे तस्मिन्राजसूनुर्महाबलः। वृतो नैऋतशार्दूलर्वज्रपाणिरिवामरैः॥
target: That powerful son of the kind surrounded by the Naiſtas looked lovely on that car like the thunder-handed (Deity) engirt by the immortals.

source: हिरण्यदण्ड्या वध्याश्च कर्तव्या देशकालतः॥ प्रातरेव हि पश्येथा ये कुर्युर्व्ययकर्म ते।
target: In the morning you should see those who are employed in making your disbursements. After that you should look to your toilet and then to your food.

source: अव्यक्तं पुरुषे ब्रह्मन् निष्क्रिये सम्प्रलीयते। नास्ति तस्मात् परतरः पुरुषाद् वै सनातनात्॥
target: Unmanifest Nature, 0 Brahmana, disappears into Inactive Purusha (Soul). There is nothing higher than Purusha (Soul) which is Eternal.

source: ये लोका मातृहतॄणां ये चापि पितृघातिनाम्। गुरुदारगतानां ये पिशुनानां च ये सदा॥ साधूनसूयतां ये च ये चापि परिवादिनाम्। ये च निक्षेपहर्तृणां ये च विश्वासघातिनाम्॥ भुक्तपूर्वां स्त्रियं ये च विन्दतामघशंसिनाम्। ब्रह्मघ्नानां च ये लोका ये च गोघातिनामपि॥ पायसं वा यवान्नं वा शाकं कृसरमेव वा। संयावापूपमांसानि ये च लोका वृथाश्नताम्॥
target: Those regions which are allotted to those who ravish their own mothers, to those who slay their fathers, who violate their preceptor's beds and who are malicious; those regions which are reserved for those who harbour hatred against the righteous, who speak maliciously of others, who appropriate the wealth entrusted with them and who betray their trusts; those regions that are for them who abuse others' wives enjoyed by them before or for them that slay Brahmanas or for them that slaughter the kine or for them that drink payasas or eat food prepared from barley or herbs or articles prepared from milk, sesamum and rice and Pupas and other kinds of cakes or meat, without having first offered them to the gods.

source: घोषेण महता घोषं सागरस्य समुच्छ्रितम्। भीममन्तर्दधे भीमा तरन्ती हरिवाहिनी।॥
target: That dreadful array of monkeys crossing over, with its mighty uproar drowned the dreadful roar of the deep, which had been arising.

source: साहं शरणमभ्येमि रोरवीमि च दुःखिता। याचे त्वां चाभिकामाहं तस्मात् कुरु मम प्रियम्। स त्वमात्मप्रदानेन सकामां कर्तुमर्हसि॥
target: Being filled with desire, I woo you. Therefore, do what is agreeable to me. You should gratify my wise by giving up yourself to me.

source: ततः समाजो ववृधे स राजन् दिवसान् बहून्। रत्नप्रदानबहुलः शोभितो नटनर्तकैः॥
target: O king, that assemblage daily increased in bulk,) and it looked gay with (the performances of) actors and dancers. Large presents of wealth were also made.

source: अनन्तविदित ब्रह्मन् नित्य भूतविभावन। कृतकार्य कृतप्रज्ञ धर्मज्ञ विजयावह॥
target: O you that have no end, O you that are known as Brahma, O you that are eternal, and are the protector of all creatures, O you that are ever successful, O you whose understanding is accomplished in all things. O you that are conversant with all righteousness. O you that are ever attended with victory.

source: वन्यैर्माल्यैः फलैर्मूलैः पक्वैाँसैर्यथाविधि। अद्भिर्जपैश्च वेदोक्तैर्दभैश्च ससमित्कुशैः।। तौ तर्पयित्वा भूतानि राघवौ सह सीतया। तदा विविशतुः शालां सुशुभां शुभलक्षणौ।।
target: And having with garlands made of wild flowers, fruits roots, meat cooked according to the ordinance, water, Fapa as prescribed by the Veda, grass, and faggot, worshipped the spirits, those descendants of Raghu, the auspicious Rāma and Lakşmaņa, in company with Sītă entered the graceful mansion.]

source: इतीव सर्वा रजनीचरस्त्रियः परस्परं संपरिरभ्य बाहुभिः। विषेदुरार्तातिभयाभिपीडिता विनेदुरुच्चैश्च तदा सुदारुणम्॥
target: Thus bewailed piteously and loudly-the she demons holding each other by neck and being stricken with fear and grief.

source: गाधोदके मत्स्य इव सुखं विन्देत कस्तदा॥ तदैव वन्ध्यं दिवसमिति विद्याद् विचक्षणः।
target: What man is there who would, like a fish in a shallow water, feel happy? Death approaches a man before all his desires have been fulfilled.

source: किमिदं कथ्यतां पुत्र्यः को धर्ममवमन्यते। कुब्जाः केन कृताः सर्वाश्चेष्टन्त्यो नाभिभाषथ।। एवं राजा विनिःश्वस्य समाधि संदधे ततः॥
target: You daughters, what is this? Who is it that thus disregards virtue? By whom have you all come by this crooked form? And why demonstrating your grief, do you not answer me?' Having said this, the king heaved a deep sigh and became eager to hear all about it.

source: इन्द्र उवाच अस्माभिर्निन्दितावेतौ भवेतां सोमपौ कथम्। देवैर्न सम्मितावेतौ तस्मान्मैवं वदस्व नः॥
target: Indra said The Ashvins have been outcasted by us. How, then, can these be admitted into the sacrificial circle for drinking Soma with the others? They are not classed with the celestials. Do not, therefore, tell us so.

source: हत्वा शालावृकेभ्यश्च प्रायच्छल्लवशः कृतम्। ततो गावो निवृत्तास्ता अगोपा: स्वं निवेशनम्॥
target: They hacked him to pieces and gave his body to be devoured by jackals and wolves. The kine returned to the fold without the cowherd (Kacha).

source: एवमुक्त्वा शान्तनवो निन्दन् वाक्येन पार्थिवान्। अर्जुनं द्रष्टुमिच्छामीत्यभ्यभाषत भारत॥
target: Having thus spoken, and censuring those kings with (cruel) words, Bhishma said, O Bharata I desire to see Arjuna."

source: इत्यक्तुवा सह सौमित्रिरुपस्पृश्याथ राघवः। प्रतिशिश्ये जलनिधिं विधिवत् कुशसंस्तरे॥
target: Saying this, the descendant of Raghu together with the son of Sumitra performed achamana (i.e. touched water thrice as a purifactory ceremony) and duly laid themselves down on a bed of Kusha grass on the sea-shore.

source: तेन सेनासमूहेन समानीतेन कौरवैः। ततस्ते समयं चक्रुः कुरुपाण्डवसोमकाः॥
target: O best of the Bharata race, then the Kurus, the Pandavas and the Somakas made certain agreements and settled some rules regarding the different kinds of fight.

source: क्षेपण्यसिगदाशक्तिशरप्राससमाकुलम्॥ ध्वजभूषणसम्बाधं रत्नपट्टसुसंचितम्।
target: Innumerable maces, dares, arrows and lances form the oars plied on it. It abounds in standards and ornaments and is full of cloths of gold embossed with gems.

source: स मातरिश्वा विभुरश्ववाजी सरश्मिवान् सविता चादिदेवः। तेनासुरा विजिताः सर्व एव तद्विक्रान्तैर्विजितानीह त्रीणि॥
target: It is Krishna who is the god of wind; it is he who is the powerful Ashvins; it is he who is that first of gods, viz., the Sun living a thousand rays. It is he by whom the Asuras have been subjugated. It is he who covered the three worlds with three footsteps.

source: संजय उवाच द्रौणिभूरिश्रवाः शल्यश्चित्रसेनश्च मारिष पुत्रः सांयमनेश्चैव सौभद्रं पर्यवारयन्॥
target: Sanjaya said O sire, Drona's son, Bhurishrava, Shalya, Chitrasena, the son of Samyamani all these fought with Subhadra's son.

source: विविंशस्य सुता राजन् बभूवुर्दश पञ्च च। सर्वे धनुषि विक्रान्ता ब्रह्मण्याः सत्यवादिनः॥ दानधर्मरताः शान्ताः सततं प्रियवादिनः। तेषां ज्येष्ठः खनीनेत्रः स तान् सर्वानपीडयत्॥
target: Vivinsha, O king, had fifteen sons; all of them powerful archers, respecting Brahmanas and speaking the truth, gentle and everspeaking fair. The eldest brother Khaninetra, oppressed all his brothers.

source: भवानपि विविक्तानि तीर्थानि मनुजेश्वर। भ्रातृभिः सहितः सर्वैर्द्रष्टुमर्हत्यरिंदम॥ तीर्थेष्वाप्लुत्य पुण्येषु विपाप्मा विगतज्वरः। राज्यं भोक्ष्यसि राजेन्द्र सुखी विगतकल्मष।॥
target: (You should also tell him) saying, “O foremost of men, O chastiser of foes, you too with all your brothers should see the various sacred shrines. O king of kings, having bathed in various sacred waters, you will be cleansed of your sins and the fever of your heart will abate. You will then be able to enjoy your kingdom in happiness."

source: स कथं पाण्डवं युद्धे भ्राजमानमिव श्रिया। नातरत् संयुगे पार्थ तन्ममाचक्ष्व संजय॥
target: How is it that Karna could not vanquish in battle that son of Pritha, of great effulgence? O Sanjaya tell me all you know about it in detail.

source: नीलादनन्तरश्चैव धृष्टकेतुर्महाबलः॥ चेदिकाशिकरूपैश्च पौरवैरपि संवृतः।
target: Next to Nila stood the great car-warrior Dhrishtakelu backed by the Chedis the Kashis, the Karushas and the Pandavas.

source: न च पुत्रगतं स्नेहं कर्तुमर्हसि पार्थिव॥ अहं ते प्रतिजानामि हतौ तौ विद्धि राक्षसौ। अहं वेनि महात्मानं रामं सत्यपराक्रमम्॥ वसिष्ठोऽपि महातेजा ये चेमे तपसि स्थिताः। यदि ते धर्मलाभं तु यशश्च परमं भुवि॥ स्थिरमिच्छसि राजेन्द्र रामं मे दातुमर्हसि।
target: Nor, o king, ought you to indulge in paternal affection. For ten nights only Rāma is to remain there, with the object of slaying those foes to my sacrifice, those Raksasas disturbing the rites. I tell you, do you consider the Raksasas as already slain. I know full well Rāma of sterling prowess, as also the highly-energetic Vasistha and the other ascetics present here. And if you, O king, set your heart upon acquiring religious merit and high fame on earth, do you then grant me Rāma!

source: तमैलविलमासाद्य धर्मराजो व्यराजत॥ कुबेरसदनं प्राप्य ततो रत्नान्यवाप्य च।
target: That virtuous king shone resplendent even when in the abode of that Ailavila; going to the abode of Kubera he obtained gems and wealth therefrom.

source: आर्जवेन नरं युक्तमार्जवात् सव्यपत्रपम्। अशक्तं मन्यमानास्तु धर्षयन्ति कुबुद्धयः॥
target: Persons of bad intelligence oppress people endued with humility and modesty by reason of that humility, thinking them to be weak.

source: वैशम्पायन उवाच एवमुक्तः स बीभत्सुर्मातुलेन परंतप। दुर्मना दीनवदनो वसुदेवमुवाच ह॥ नाहं वृष्णिप्रवीरेण बन्धुभिश्चैव मातुल। विहीनां पुथिवीं द्रष्टुं शक्यामीह कथंचन।॥

target: See, O Ulupi, this beautiful form of your husband lying prostrate on the ground. How is it that you do not grieve, having cause him to be killed through your son whom you did excite with your words?

source: स्वयं यूपानुपादाय यजन्ते स्वाप्तदक्षिणैः। यस्तथा भावितात्मा स्यात् स गामालब्धुमर्हति॥
target: Creating sacrificial stakes by their willforce, they celebrate many kinds of Sacrifice with profuse presents. One who is of such a purified soul may kill a cow.

source: क्ष्वेडन्तश्च प्लवन्तश्च गर्जन्तश्च प्लवंगमाः। लब्धलक्षा रघुसुतं परिवार्योपतस्थिरे॥
target: And shouting and bounding and roaring, the monkeys at this hour of high joy stood surrounding Raghu's son.* *Descendant, that is.

source: पापान्मुक्तः पुनर्लब्ध्वा बुद्धिं चेतोधनानि च। श्रान्तस्य ते क्षुधार्तस्य परिग्लानस्य नैषध। कः श्रमं राजशार्दूल नाशयिष्यति तेऽनघ॥
target: How will you live without me, when liberated from your curse, you will regain your mind, senses and wealth? O lord of the Nishadhas! O sinless one! O foremost of kings! who will remove your fatigue when you will be worn out with toil, oppressed with hunger and depressed with grief?'

source: सर्वस्वस्यापहारे तु वक्तव्यमनृतं भवेत्। तत्रानृतं भवेत् सत्यं चाप्यनृतं भवेत्॥ तादृशं पश्यते बालो यस्य सत्यमनुष्ठितम्।
target: Where one's entire fortunes are at stake untruth becomes utterable. On these occasions untruth becomes truth and truth untruth. He who is bent upon always practising truth alone is a fool and takes truth to be as it is.

source: शिखण्डिनं पुरस्कृत्य धनुश्चास्य समाच्छिनत्। भीष्मस्य धनुपश्छेदं नामृष्यन्त महारथाः॥
target: And placing Shikhandin before him, he cut off the bow of the latter. Then the following seven mighty car-warriors did not brook that cutting off of Bhishma's bow, warriors namely,

target: If Drona, who was a Brahmana in name, could have been killed by me, why should I not, by my power, kill you today in battle.

source: तेजसा दीप्यमानस्तु वारणोत्तममास्थितः। भगदत्तो ययौ राजा यथा वज्रधरस्तथा॥
target: King Bhagadatta, blazing in his own effulgence, marched on an elephant like the wielder of thunder (Indra).

source: अथैनां राज्ञे पितादादब्रवीच्चैनामेनं राजानं शुश्रूषस्वेति॥
target: Thereupon her father bestowed her upon him and he spoke to her thus, “Wait upon this king."

source: विलपन्त्यो रुदत्यश्च धावमानास्ततस्ततः। शोकेनोपहतज्ञानाः कर्तव्यं न प्रजज्ञिरे॥
target: Weeping and crying and running here and there, deprived of their senses by sorrow, they knew not what to do.

source: ज्येष्ठा शैलेन्द्रदुहिता मानयिष्यति तं सुतम्। उमायास्तद्बहुमतं भविष्यति न संशयः॥
target: And the elder daughter of the Mountain will consider that son as brought forth by Uma; and Uma also will, without doubt, look upon him with regard.'

target: But O King, all those arrows and the successive ones, shot by Arjuna, that contracted brow, were all destroyed by Karna by his own shafts.

source: तथैव भीमसेनस्य द्विषताभिहता गदा। वर्षाप्रदोघे खद्योतैर्वृतो वृक्ष इवाबभौ॥
target: Similarly the mace of Bhimasena being struck against that of his adversary, resembled a tree lighted by fire-flies during the rainy season at night-fall.

source: आवार्य पाण्डवं बाणैर्हन्तुकामो महाबलः॥ विव्याध समरे क्रुद्धो बहुभिः कङ्कपत्रिभिः।
target: Resisting the son of Pandu with his arrows the illustrious Shalya, filled with ire and desirous of killing his antagonist, struck hiin in that battle with innumerable Kanka-feathered arrows.

source: स प्रविष्टो मधुवनं ददर्श हरियूथपान्। विमदानुद्धतान् सर्वान् मेहमानान् मधूदकम्॥
target: And entering that forest he beheld all the leaders of the monkeys spending the hours delightedly, having passed urine, the outcome of honey.

target: O king, Bhimsena however soon with his big sword cut down that sharp arrow which was rushing towards him with great impetuosity.

source: धृष्टद्युम्न उवाच योऽसौ युवा व्यायतलोहिताक्षः कृष्णाजिनी देवसमानरूपः। यः कार्मुकाग्र्यं कृतवानधिज्यं लक्ष्यं च यः पातितवान् पृथिव्याम्॥ असज्जमानश्च ततस्तरस्वी वृतो द्विजाग्र्यैरभिपूज्यमानः। चक्राम वज्रीव दितेः सुतेषु सर्वेश्च देवै ऋषिभिश्च जुष्टः॥
target: Dhrishtaduymna said : The Youth with large and red eyes, who was attired in back deer skin and looked like a celestials in beauty, who stringed the foremost of bows and brought down on earth the mark set on high, was soon surrounded by all the foremost of Brahmanas, who offered him their homage for the feat he had achieved. Incapable of bearing the sight of the foes and endued with great activity, he(the youth) displayed his prowess. Surrounded by the Brahinanas he resembled like the celestials and the Rishis.

source: पत्यभावे यथैव स्त्री देवरं कुरुते पतिम्। एष ते प्रथमः कल्प आपद्यन्यो भवेत् ततः॥
target: As a woman, in the absence of her husband, marries his younger brother, even so the Earth, for the refusal of the Brahmana, has accepted his next-born, viz., the Kshatriya, for her master. This is the first rule. In times, however, of distress, there is exception of this.

source: भूमौ जायन्ति पुरुषा भूमौ निष्ठां व्रजन्ति च। चतुर्विधो हि लोकोऽयं योऽयं भूमिगुणात्मकः॥
target: Living creatures originate from Earth and it is to the Earth that they return when they disappear. Living creatures which are divided into four classes have Earth for their primordial essence.

source: तथा विशसनं कृत्वा पुत्रशत्रुगणस्य ते। प्राद्रवाम रणे स्थातुं न हि शक्यामहे त्रयः॥
target: Having caused this massacre of the sons of our foes, we are flying away because we three cannot fight with them.

source: पार्थोऽपि युधि विक्रम्य कुन्तीपुत्रो धनंजयः॥ शूराणामश्वपृष्ठेभ्यः शिरांसि निचकर्त ह।
target: Kunti's son Dhananjaya, otherwise called Partha, displaying his prowess, sundered the heads of many brave warriors on horse back.

source: पुनः प्रहरणान्येषां कीर्त्यमानानि मे शृणु। शेषैः कृतः पारिषदैपरायुधानां परिग्रहः॥ पाशोद्यतकराः केचिद् व्यादितास्याः खराननाः। पृष्ठाक्षा नीलकण्ठाश्च तथा परिघबाहवः॥ शतघ्नीचक्रहस्ताश्च तथा मुसलपाणयः।
target: I shall describe to you the weapons that were taken by those that came last to Kartikcya. Listen to me. Some had noses of their uplifted arms. Their faces were like those of tigers and asses. Their eyes were on their backs, their throats were blue and their arms resembled spiked clubs. Some were armed with Shataghnis and discs and some had heavy and short clubs. Some had swords and mallets and some were armed with bludgeons, O Bharata.

source: प्रीतात्मा स तु तं वाक्यमिदमाह द्विजर्षभम्। वाग्मी तदा द्विजश्रेष्ठो धर्मः पुरुषविग्रहः॥ शुद्धेन तव दानेन न्यायोपात्तेन धर्मतः। यथाशक्ति विसृष्टेन प्रीतोऽस्मि द्विजसत्तम।
target: With gratified soul, that first of twice-bom persons, endued with great eloquence, who was none else than the deity of Virtue in a human form, then addressed that foremost of Brahmanas and said, 'O best of twice-born oncs, I am highly pleased with this pure gift of yours, this gift of what was acquired by fair mcans by you, and which you did freely part with, accordingly to the rules of virtue.

source: बभूव मुदितो राजन् प्रशंसन् केशवार्जुनौ। निवृत्तेष्वथ देवेषु वागुवाचाशरीरिणी॥

source: अष्टक उवाच अवादीस्त्वं वयसा यः प्रवृद्धः स वैराजन् नाभ्यधिकः कथ्यते च। यो विद्यया तपसा सम्प्रवृद्धः स एव पूज्यो भवति द्विजानाम्॥
target: Ashtaka said : O king, you say that he, who is older in years, deserves the respect and reverence of others. But it is said that he is truly worthy of respect is superior in learning and asceticism.

source: प्रययौ च महेष्वासो नक्षत्रे शुभदैवते। शुभे तिथौ मुहूर्ते च पूज्यमानो द्विजातिभिः॥ मङ्गलैश्च शुभैः स्नातो वाग्भिश्चापि प्रपूजितः। नादयन् रथघोषेण त्रैलोक्यं सचराचरम्॥
target: On an auspicious lunar day and at an auspicious moment and under the influence of a star presided over by an auspicious deity, that mighty bowman, having been honoured by the Brahmanas and bathed with auspicious and holy substances and also worshipped by all, started, filling with the rattle of his car the three worlds with all mobile and immobile objects.

source: हिरण्यगर्भादृषिणा वसिष्ठेन महात्मना। वसिष्ठादृषिशार्दूलान्नारदोऽवाप्तवानिदम्॥
target: This knowledge acquired from Hiranyagarbha by the great Rishi Vashishtha. was From that foremost of Rishis, viz., Vashishtha, it was acquired by Narada.

target: Who are you? And where are you going, O Brahman? We wish to learn all this. And why is it that you range alone this far-off forest?

source: विचित्रमिदमाश्चर्यं मृगहन् प्रतिभाति मे। प्लमानौ हि खचरौ पदातिरनुधावसि॥
target: Slayer of animals, it seems to me wonderfully strange that you who move by your feet in this earth are following wanderers of the sky.

source: उत्कृत्तवदनैर्दैहैः शरीरैः कृत्तबाहुभिः। भुजैश्च पाणिनिर्मुक्तैः पाणिभिर्व्यङ्गुलीकृतैः॥

target: What, indeed, is your object? You should not do it. I can never grant you permission! you should show us mercy.

target: Fearlessly and without a doubt in his mind he goes to the king's palace, with a mind purged of every sin. Within even his own heart he does not see mark of any evil act.

source: कानि श्राद्धानि वानि कानि मूलफलानि च। धान्यजात्यश्च का वास्तन्मे ब्रूहि पितामह॥
target: What deeds should not be done at Shraddha? What are those Shraddhas in which fruits and roots are to be offered? What kinds also of paddy should be avoided in Shraddhas? Tell me all this, O grandfather.

source: सीते राक्षसराजोऽहं रावणो नाम विश्रुतः। मम लङ्का पुरी नाम्ना रम्या पारे महोदधेः॥

target: Sanjaya said As the diadem-decked Arjuna was speaking in this strain, Yudhishthira cheerfully addressed to him these graver words-“Do you ever attain unfading fame, eternal life, ready consummation of hopes, perpetual victory, ceaseless energy and continual success over your enemies!

source: तस्य तत्कुर्वतः कर्म नकुलस्य सुतो रणे। अर्धचन्द्रेण चिच्छेद चापं रत्नविभूषितम्॥
target: When he (i.e. Chitrasena) was achieving this feat, the of Nakula, in that engagement, cut-off, with a cresent-shaped arrow, his shaft furnished with gold.

source: तान् परीप्सस्व राजेन्द्र मा नेशुः पशवस्तव। तच्छ्रुत्वा नृपतिः सेनां मत्स्यानां समयोजयत्।।९।
target: O king of kings, "rescue them speedily so that they may not be lost.” Hearing his words the king collected his Matsya, army.

source: तेजसा वह्निसदृशो वायुवेगसमो जवे। अन्तकप्रतिमः क्रोधे सिंहसंहननो बली॥
target: He is valarous like Agni, swift like the speed of the wind, furious like the Destroyer, strong and powerful like the lion.

source: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच अक्षौहिण्यो दशैका च व्यूढा दृष्ट्वा युधिष्ठिरः। कथमल्पेन सैन्येन प्रत्यव्यूहत पाण्डवः॥
